Chinese: 留出星期五下午的时间做复习

Chinese: 如果天不晴,我们就不去散步

Pinyin: shou1 ji2 zhe4 xie you2 piao4 hua1 le wo3 yi1 bai3 kuai4 qian2

Chinese: 电视机设定在10点钟自动打开
Pinyin: dian4 shi4 ji1 she4 ding4 za4i01 dian3 zhong1 zi4 dong4 da3 kai1

Chinese: 我喜欢唱歌,更不用说听音乐了

Pinyin: guo401 fen1 zhong1 kuai4 you3 yi1 liang4 chu1 zu1 qi4 che1 dao4 na4 r

Pinyin: ta1 kan4 dao4 ta1 fu4 qin1 zou3 jin4 lai2 jiu4 zhan4 le qi3 lai

Pinyin: wo3 de Ying1 wen2 zuo4 ye4 zhong4 zhi3 you3 liang3 san1 chu4 cuo4 wu4

Pinyin: wo3 men de hai3 guan1 jian3 cha2 zhi3 hua1 le ji3 fen1 zhong1 shi2 jian1

Pinyin: zhe4 shi4 wo3 you3 guo4 de jiao4 yu4 yi4 yi4 zui4 da4 de yi1 ci4 jing1 li4

Chinese: 这机器是为水下使用而特别改装的

Pinyin: zhou1 yi1 zhou1 er4 lian2 xu4 liang3 tian1 wo3 men dou1 jiang4 kai1 hui4

Chinese: 我只关心我觉得对我很重要的事物

Chinese: 她的小说我都喜欢, 最新的一部尤其好

Chinese: 女儿睡觉之前,我总讲故事给她听
Pinyin: nu:3 er2 shui4 jiao4 zhi1 qian2 wo3 zong3 jiang3 gu4 shi4 ji3 ta1 ting4

Chinese: 今天早晨我起床晚了,错过了公共汽车
Pinyin: jin1 tian1 zao3 chen2 wo3 qi3 chuang2 wan3 le cuo4 guo4 le gong1 gong4 qi4 che1

Chinese: 当她看到他走过来的时候,她的脸亮了起来
Pinyin: dang4 ta1 kan4 dao4 ta1 zou3 guo4 lai de shi2 hou ta1 de lian3 liang4 le qi3 lai
Translation: Her face lit up when she saw he was coming.

Chinese: 我们是在试验的基础上得出这个结论的
Pinyin: wo3 men shi4 zai4 shi4 yan4 de ji1 chu3 shang4 de2 chu1 zhe4 ge4 jie2 lun4 de
Translation: We drew this conclusion on the basis of experiments.

Chinese: 二十世纪六十年代出现了许多新兴国家
Pinyin: er4 shi2 shi4 ji4 liu4 shi2 nian2 dai4 chu1 xian4 le xu3 duo1 xin1 xing1 guo2 jia1
Translation: The 1960s saw the emergence of many new nations.

Chinese: 他十岁的时候就已经长得比他哥哥高了
Pinyin: ta1 shi2 sui4 de shi2 hou jiu4 yi3 jing1 zhang3 de bi4 ta1 ge1 ge gao1 le
Translation: By the time he is ten, he has outgrown his older brother.

Chinese: 我认为他对这个问题的评论是不正确的
Pinyin: wo3 ren4 wei2 ta1 dui4 zhe4 ge4 wen4 ti2 de ping2 lun4 shi4 bu4 zheng4 que4 de
Translation: I think his commentary on this issue is not correct.

Chinese: 工作了十五个小时之后,我开始感到累了
Pinyin: gong1 zuo4 le shi2 wu3 ge4 xiao3 shi2 zhi1 hou4 wo3 kai1 shi3 gan3 dao4 lei4 le
Translation: After working for fifteen hours I began to tire.

Chinese: 旅行社的那位小姐告诉我下午一点开门
Pinyin: lu:3 xing2 she4 de na4 wei4 xiao3 jie gao4 su wo3 xia4 wu3 yi1 dian3 kai1 men2!
Translation: The lady at the tourist office told me it opened at 1 pm.

Chinese: 他每次来电话时, 我好像总是正在洗澡
Pinyin: ta1 mei3 ci4 lai2 dian4 hua4 shi2 wo3 hao3 xiang4 zong3 shi4 zheng4 zai4 xi3 zao3!
Translation: Every time he phones I always seem to be in the bath.

Chinese: 你可得安静点儿了,要不然我没法计算了
Pinyin: ni3 ke3 de an1 jing4 dian3 er le yao4 bu ran2 wo3 mei2 fa3 ji4 suan4 le
Translation: Do keep quiet or you'll throw me out in my calculations.

Chinese: 我代表我的同事和我本人向你表示感谢
Pinyin: wo3 dai4 biao3 wo3 de tong2 shi4 huo4 wo3 ben3 ren2 xiang4 ni3 biao3 shi4 gan3 xie4
Translation: On behalf of my colleagues and myself I thank you.

Chinese: 我正在做吃的, 没太留心听收音机
Pinyin: wo3 zheng4 zai4 zuo4 ji2 de mo4 tai4 liu2 xin1 ting4 shou1 yin1 ji1!
Translation: I was only listening to the radio with half an ear, while preparing some food.

Chinese: 有些人在爬高山时会发生高山反应
Pinyin: you3 xie1 ren2 zai4 pa2 gao1 shan1 shi2 kuai4 fa1 sheng1 gao1 shan1 fan3 ying4
Translation: Some people develop altitude sickness when climbing high mountains.

Chinese: 现在是差一刻四点--我四点一刻见你
Pinyin: xian4 zai4 shi4 ci1 yi1 ke4 si4 dian--3 wo3 si4 dian3 yi1 ke4 xian4 ni3!
Translation: It's (a) quarter to (US of) four now I'll meet you at quarter past (US after).

Chinese: 我女儿今天有点不舒服, 所以她没去上学
Pinyin: wo3 nu:3 er2 jin1 tian1 you3 dian3 bu4 shu1 fu suo3 yi3 ta1 mo4 qu4 shang4 xue2!
Translation: My daughter's a bit poorly today, so she didn't go to school.

Chinese: 劳驾, 买去市中心的两张全票和两张半票
Pinyin: lao2 jia4 mai3 qu4 shi4 zhong1 xin1 de liang3 zhang1 quan2 piao4 huo4 liang3 zhang1 ban4 piao4!
Translation: Two and two halves to the city centre, please.

Chinese: 他长大了,穿剩下的衣服就给了他的弟弟
Pinyin: ta1 zhang3 da4 le chuan1 sheng4 xia4 de yi1 fu jiu4 ji3 le ta1 de di4 di
Translation: As he grew up he passed on his clothes to his younger brother.

Chinese: 那个小男孩第一次会将汉字慢慢地读出来
Pinyin: nei4 ge4 xiao3 nan2 hai2 di4 yi1 ci4 kuai4 jiang4 Han4 zi4 man4 man4 de du2 chu1 lai
Translation: That boy can spell out the Chinese for the fast time.

Chinese: 只要你不出卖我,要我做什么我都愿意
Pinyin: zhi3 yao4 ni3 bu4 chu1 mai4 wo3 yao4 wo3 zuo4 shen2 me wo3 dou1 yuan4 yi4
Translation: As long as you don't betray me, I'll do whatever you ask me to (do).

Chinese: 他没有回答,只是继续一点一点地吃东西
Pinyin: ta1 mei2 you3 hui2 da2 zhi3 shi4 ji4 xu4 yi1 dian3 yi1 dian3 de ji2 dong1 xi
Translation: He didn't answer, but just continued to nibble at his food.

Chinese: 这个地方脏极了,我不相信有人能住在这
Pinyin: zhe4 ge4 di4 fang zang4 ji2 le wo3 bu4 xiang1 xin4 you3 ren2 neng2 zhu4 zai4 zhe4
Translation: "This place is filthy; I don't believe anyone can live here."

Chinese: 我突然意识到可能再也见不着她了
Pinyin: wo3 tu1 ran2 yi4 shi2 dao4 ke3 neng2 zai4 ye3 xian4 bu4 zhuo2 ta1 le
Translation: I was struck by the sudden realization that I would probably never see her again.

Chinese: 宴会结束时,我们谢了主人后便回家去了
Pinyin: yan4 hui4 jie2 shu4 shi2 wo3 men xie4 le zhu3 ren2 hou4 pian2 hui2 jia1 qu4 le
Translation: At the end of the party, we thanked our host and went away.

Chinese: 我是今天早晨从报纸上知道这条消息的
Pinyin: wo3 shi4 jin1 tian1 zao3 chen2 zong4 bao4 zhi3 shang4 zhi1 dao4 zhe4 tiao2 xiao1 xi de
Translation: I learned this piece of news from the newspaper this morning.

Chinese: 这个虽然不便宜, 但我觉得我们还是应该买
Pinyin: zhe4 ge4 sui1 ran2 bu4 bian4 yi2 dan4 wo3 jue2 de wo3 men hai2 shi4 ying1 gai1 mai3!
Translation: It's not cheap but I think we should buy it none the less.

Chinese: 新医院的全部设备需要一年才能装备好
Pinyin: xin1 yi1 yuan4 de quan2 bu4 she4 bei4 xu1 yao4 yi1 nian2 cai2 neng2 zhuang1 bei4 hao4
Translation: The complete equipment of the new hospital will take a year.

Chinese: 天气的变化打乱了我们体育比赛的时间表
Pinyin: tian1 qi4 de bian4 hua4 da3 luan4 le wo3 men ti3 yu4 bi3 sai4 de shi2 jian4 biao3
Translation: The change of the weather has mucked up our sports timetable.

Chinese: 你讲到一半就停下来不讲,太没意思了
Pinyin: ni3 jiang3 dao4 yi1 ban4 jiu4 ting2 xia lai bu4 jiang3 tai4 mo4 yi4 si le
Translation: It's not nice of you to stop in the middle of what you are saying.

Chinese: 那把椅子原本是为你准备的,但是被她拿走了
Pinyin: na4 ba3 yi3 zi yuan2 ben3 shi4 wei4 ni3 zhun3 bei4 de dan4 shi4 bei4 ta1 na2 zou3 le
Translation: The chair was intended for you, but she took it away.

Chinese: 我们将吃一点面包,剩下的留到早饭时吃
Pinyin: wo3 men jiang4 ji2 yi1 dian3 mian4 bao1 sheng4 xia4 de liu2 dao4 zao3 fan4 shi2 ji2
Translation: We'll eat some of the bread and keep the rest for breakfast.

Chinese: 我们相信你在星期五之前可以完成这篇论文
Pinyin: wo3 men xiang1 xin4 ni3 zai4 xing1 qi1 wu3 zhi1 qian2 ke3 yi3 wan2 cheng2 zhe4 pian1 lun4 wen2
Translation: We are depending on you to finish the paper by Friday.

Chinese: 他跑步出发,但很快就累得慢下来成了步行
Pinyin: ta1 pao3 bu4 chu1 fa1 dan4 hen3 kuai4 jiu4 lei4 de man4 xia lai cheng2 le bu4 xing2
Translation: He started off at a run but soon tired and slowed to a walk.

Chinese: 当他在国外安定下来时,他开始想念祖国了
Pinyin: dang4 ta1 zai4 guo2 wai4 an1 ding4 xia lai shi2 ta1 kai1 shi3 xiang3 nian4 zu3 guo2 le
Translation: He came to miss his homeland when he settled down abroad.

Chinese: 这位演说者除了想搞笑之外,没有别的目的
Pinyin: zhe4 wei4 yan3 shuo1 zhe3 chu2 le xiang3 gao3 xiao4 zhi1 wai4 mei2 you3 bie2 de mu4 di4
Translation: The speaker has no other purpose except to make people laugh.

Chinese: 他自从参加了会话班,法语取得了很大进步
Pinyin: ta1 zi4 cong2 can1 jia1 le hui4 hua4 ban1 fa3 yu3 qu3 de2 le hen3 da4 jin4 bu4
Translation: His French has come on a lot since he joined the conversation class.

Chinese: 到了这里一个月以后,学生们开始想家了
Pinyin: dao4 le zhe4 li3 yi1 ge4 yue4 yi3 hou4 xue2 sheng men kai1 shi3 xiang3 jia1 le
Translation: The students began to feel homesick after they had been here for a month.

Chinese: 这个决定将被通知给所有直接有关的人
Pinyin: zhe4 ge4 jue2 ding4 jiang4 bei4 tong1 zhi1 ji3 suo3 you3 zhi2 jie1 you3 guan1 de ren2
Translation: All those who are immediately involved will be informed of the decision.

Chinese: 他一向是来得很晚,然后又总说他得早走
Pinyin: ta1 yi2 xiang4 shi4 lai2 de hen3 wan3 ran2 hou4 you4 zong3 shuo1 ta1 de zao3 zou3
Translation: Typically, he would come in late and then say that he had to go early.

Chinese: 如果我们要克服困难,我们就要有进取精神
Pinyin: ru2 guo3 wo3 men yao4 ke4 fu2 kun4 nan wo3 men jiu4 yao4 you3 jin4 qu3 jing1 shen2
Translation: We need a spirit of enterprise if we are to overcome our difficulties.

Chinese: 那青年通过每天给那女子送花而向她求爱
Pinyin: na4 qing1 nian2 tong1 guo4 mei3 tian1 ji3 na4 nu:3 zi3 song4 hua1 er2 xiang4 ta1 qiu2 ai4
Translation: The young man courted the young lady by bring her flowers every day.

Chinese: 我不喜欢他,但是说句公道话,他是个好工人
Pinyin: wo3 bu4 xi3 huan ta1 dan4 shi4 shuo1 ju4 gong1 dao hua4 ta1 shi4 ge4 hao4 gong1 ren2
Translation: I don't like him, but, to give him his due, he is a good worker.

Chinese: 我们一起欢度的那个晚上是我最快乐的事情之一
Pinyin: wo3 men yi1 qi3 huan1 du4 de nei4 ge4 wan3 shang shi4 wo3 zui4 kuai4 le4 de shi4 qing zhi1 yi1
Translation: That evening together is one of my happiest recollections.

Chinese: 这个女孩非常幸运,她的妈妈是她的知心朋友
Pinyin: zhe4 ge4 nu:3 hai2 fei1 chang2 xing4 yun4 ta1 de ma1 ma shi4 ta1 de zhi1 xin1 peng2 you
Translation: The girl was fortunate enough to have her mother as a bosom friend.

Chinese: 几年来, 几百个留学生在那所大学学习过
Pinyin: ji3 nian2 lai2 ji3 bai3 ge4 liu2 xue2 sheng1 zai4 na4 suo3 da4 xue2 xue2 xi2 guo4
Translation: Over the years, hundreds of overseas students have studied at that university.

Chinese: 我们每星期工作五天, 每星期六和星期日休息
Pinyin: wo3 men mei3 xing1 qi1 gong1 zuo4 wu3 tian1 mei3 xing1 qi1 liu4 huo4 xing1 qi1 ri4 xiu1 xi
Translation: We work five days a week and have every Saturday and Sunday off.

Chinese: 在出访外国之前要做好许多准备工作
Pinyin: zai4 chu1 fang3 wai4 guo2 zhi1 qian2 yao4 zuo4 hao4 xu3 duo1 zhun3 bei4 gong1 zuo4
Translation: There are a lot of preliminaries to be gone through before you can visit a foreign country.

Chinese: 这一情况出现得很突然,把我们的计划全都打乱了
Pinyin: zhe4 yi1 qing2 kuang4 chu1 xian4 de hen3 tu1 ran2 ba3 wo3 men de ji4 hua4 quan2 dou1 da3 luan4 le
Translation: This sudden development turned all our plans topsy-turvy.

Chinese: 现在是休息时间, 学生们一个接一个走出教室
Pinyin: xian4 zai4 shi4 xiu1 xi shi2 jian1 xue2 sheng men yi1 ge4 jie1 yi1 ge4 zou3 chu1 jiao4 shi4
Translation: It was the time of break and students came out of classroom one after another.

Chinese: 别为几个差错着急,迟早一切都会得到圆满解决的
Pinyin: bie4 wei4 ji3 ge cha1 cuo4 zhao2 ji2 chi2 zao3 yi1 qie4 du1 hui4 de2 dao4 yuan2 man3 jie3 jue2 de
Translation: "Don't worry about a few mistakes; it'll all come out in the wash."

Chinese: 常给我们看病的那个医生, 我们都非常喜欢他, 他要走了
Pinyin: chang2 ji3 wo3 men kan4 bing4 de nei4 ge4 yi1 sheng1 wo3 men dou1 fei1 chang2 xi3 huan ta1 ta1 yao4 zou3 le!
Translation: Our doctor, whom/who we all like very much, is leaving.

Chinese: 今年我们不能出国,所以只能去上海度假了
Pinyin: jin1 nian2 wo3 men bu4 neng2 chu1 guo2 suo3 yi3 zhi3 neng2 qu4 Shang4 hai3 du4 jia4 le
Translation: We can't go abroad this year, so we'll have to content ourselves with a holiday in Shanghai.

Chinese: 现在的时装和我还是小女孩时候流行的样子很不一样了
Pinyin: xian4 zai4 de shi2 zhuang1 huo4 wo3 hai2 shi4 xiao3 nu:3 hai2 shi2 hou liu2 xing2 de yang4 zi hen3 bu4 yi2 yang4 le
Translation: Fashions have changed a lot since I was a little girl.

Chinese: 只有知道如何生活的人们, 才会开始认识自己和人生
Pinyin: zhi3 you3 zhi1 dao4 ru2 he2 sheng1 huo2 de ren2 men cai2 kuai4 kai1 shi3 ren4 shi zi4 ji3 huo4 ren2 sheng1
Translation: Only those who learn how to live can come to know themselves and life.

Chinese: 我们应该多注意危险的思想意识对年轻人的影响
Pinyin: wo3 men ying1 gai1 duo1 zhu4 yi4 wei1 xian3 de si1 xiang3 yi4 shi2 dui4 nian2 qing1 ren2 de ying3 xiang3
Translation: We should pay more attention to the infection of young people with dangerous ideologies.

Chinese: 在一般情况下他都和我们一起来, 只是他现在身体不太好
Pinyin: zai4 yi4 ban1 qing2 kuang4 xia4 ta1 dou1 huo4 wo3 men yi1 qi3 lai2 zhi3 shi4 ta1 xian4 zai4 shen1 ti3 bu4 tai4 hao4!
Translation: In the ordinary way he would have come with us, but he's not feeling well.

Chinese: 我妹妹认为,她能极力说服父亲提高她每月的零用钱
Pinyin: wo3 mei4 mei ren4 wei2 ta1 neng2 ji2 li4 shuo1 fu2 fu4 qin1 ti2 gao1 ta1 mei3 yue4 de ling2 yong4 qian2
Translation: My younger sister thinks she can argue Father into increasing her monthly pocket money.

Chinese: 如果你到今晚把手头上的工作做完,你明天就可以休息
Pinyin: ru2 guo3 ni3 dao4 jin1 wan3 ba3 shou3 tou shang4 de gong1 zuo4 zuo4 wan2 ni3 ming2 tian1 jiu4 ke3 yi3 xiu1 xi
Translation: Provided/Providing (that) you clear your desk by this evening, you can have tomorrow off.

Chinese: 别让我失望
Pinyin: bie4 rang4 wo3 shi1 wang4
Translation: Don't let me down.

Chinese: 这杯子碎了
Pinyin: zhe4 bei1 zi sui4 le
Translation: The glass shattered.

Chinese: 他心地善良
Pinyin: ta1 xin1 de shan4 liang2
Translation: He has a kind heart.

Chinese: 请别打扰我
Pinyin: qing3 bie4 da3 rao3 wo3
Translation: Please leave me alone.

Chinese: 那匹马踢了我
Pinyin: na4 pi3 ma3 ti1 le wo3
Translation: That horse kicked me.

Chinese: 你看上去心虚
Pinyin: ni3 kan4 shang4 qu4 xin1 xu1
Translation: You look guilty.

Chinese: 他昨天到达的
Pinyin: ta1 zuo2 tian1 dao4 da2 de
Translation: He arrived yesterday.

Chinese: 这梯子有八级
Pinyin: zhe4 ti1 zi you3 ba1 ji2
Translation: The ladder has eight rungs.

Chinese: 我的记性很差
Pinyin: wo3 de ji4 xing4 hen3 ci1
Translation: I have a very poor memory.

Chinese: 金钱不是一切
Pinyin: jin1 qian2 bu2 shi4 yi1 qie4
Translation: Money isn't everything.

Chinese: 云层正在堆积
Pinyin: yun2 ceng2 zheng4 zai4 dui1 ji1
Translation: Clouds are banking up.

Chinese: 人们叫她泼妇
Pinyin: ren2 men jiao4 ta1 po1 fu4
Translation: People called her shrew.

Chinese: 她恳求原谅
Pinyin: ta1 ken3 qiu2 yuan2 liang4
Translation: She supplicated for pardon.

Chinese: 她和他订婚了
Pinyin: ta1 huo4 ta1 ding4 hun1 le
Translation: She plighted herself to him.

Chinese: 雪深两英尺
Pinyin: xue3 shen1 liang3 ying1 chi3
Translation: The snow is two feet in depth.

Chinese: 他有一双套鞋
Pinyin: ta1 you3 yi1 shuang1 tao4 xie2
Translation: He has a pair of overshoes.

Chinese: 祝你旅途愉快
Pinyin: zhu4 ni3 lu:3 tu2 yu2 kuai4
Translation: I wish you a pleasant trip.

Chinese: 棉花容易着火
Pinyin: mian2 hua rong2 yi4 zhao2 huo3
Translation: Cotton catches fire easily.

Chinese: 祝您旅途愉快
Pinyin: zhu4 nin2 lu:3 tu2 yu2 kuai4
Translation: I wish you a pleasant journey.

Chinese: 他的梦想实现了
Pinyin: ta1 de meng4 xiang3 shi2 xian4 le
Translation: His dream came true.

Chinese: 灰狗跑得很快
Pinyin: hui1 gou3 pao3 de hen3 kuai4
Translation: Greyhound can run very fast.

Chinese: 他计划去南美
Pinyin: ta1 ji4 hua4 qu4 Nan2 mei3
Translation: He purposed to visit South America.

Chinese: 我想存点儿钱
Pinyin: wo3 xiang3 cun2 dian3 er qian2
Translation: I'd like to deposit some money.

Chinese: 我开始执行计划
Pinyin: wo3 kai1 shi3 zhi2 xing2 ji4 hua4
Translation: I set a project afoot.

Chinese: 演出极为成功
Pinyin: yan3 chu1 ji2 wei2 cheng2 gong1
Translation: The performance was immense.

Chinese: 窗户碎成碎片
Pinyin: chuang1 hu sui4 cheng2 sui4 pian4
Translation: The window broke into pieces.

Chinese: 我编了一个花环
Pinyin: wo3 bian1 le yi1 ge4 hua1 huan2
Translation: I wove a garland of flowers.

Chinese: 下课铃响了
Pinyin: xia4 ke4 ling2 xiang3 le!
Translation: There's the bell for the end of the lesson.

Chinese: 金钱买不来幸福
Pinyin: jin1 qian2 mai3 bu4 lai2 xing4 fu2
Translation: Money can't buy happiness.

Chinese: 吸烟有害健康
Pinyin: xi1 yan1 you3 hai4 jian4 kang1
Translation: Smoking is bad for the health.

Chinese: 我们都帮忙收割
Pinyin: wo3 men dou1 bang1 mang2 shou1 ge1
Translation: We all helped the harvest.

Chinese: 她从梯子上下来
Pinyin: ta1 zong4 ti1 zi shang4 xia4 lai2!
Translation: She got down from the ladder.

Chinese: 握手时软弱无力
Pinyin: wo4 shou3 shi2 ruan3 ruo4 wu2 li4
Translation: Has limp, weak handshake.

Chinese: 我的鞋底都断了
Pinyin: wo3 de xie2 di3 dou1 duan4 le
Translation: The soles of my shoes are broken.

Chinese: 这孩子冷得发抖
Pinyin: zhe4 hai2 zi leng3 de fa1 dou3
Translation: The child shivered from the cold.

Chinese: 他似乎不愿离去
Pinyin: ta1 si4 hu bu4 yuan4 li2 qu4
Translation: He seemed somewhat loath to depart.

Chinese: 他的头发已剪短了
Pinyin: ta1 de tou2 fa yi3 jian3 duan3 le
Translation: His hair has been cut short.

Chinese: 请把字典递给我
Pinyin: qing3 ba3 zi4 dian3 di4 ji3 wo3
Translation: Please pass the dictionary to me.

Chinese: 这房子又冷又湿
Pinyin: zhe4 fang2 zi you4 leng3 you4 shi1
Translation: The building was cold and damp.

Chinese: 他去年入党了
Pinyin: ta1 qu4 nian2 ru4 dang3 le
Translation: He was admitted to the Party last year.

Chinese: 我们应当遵守法律
Pinyin: wo3 men ying1 dang1 zun1 shou3 fa3 lu:4
Translation: We should obey the law.

Chinese: 没有什么可害怕的
Pinyin: mei2 you3 shen2 me ke3 hai4 pa4 de!
Translation: There's nothing to be afraid of.

Chinese: 请把电源关掉
Pinyin: qing3 ba3 dian4 yuan2 guan1 diao4
Translation: Please turn off the electric power.

Chinese: 我的主修科目是法语
Pinyin: wo3 de zhu3 xiu1 ke1 mu4 shi4 fa3 yu3
Translation: My major is French.

Chinese: 我再也不能忍受了
Pinyin: wo3 zai4 ye3 bu4 neng2 ren3 shou4 le
Translation: I can't stick it any more.

Chinese: 我上九点至五点的班
Pinyin: wo3 shang4 jiu3 dian3 zhi4 wu3 dian3 de ban1!
Translation: I work nine to five.

Chinese: 学英文是值得的
Pinyin: xue2 Ying1 wen2 shi4 zhi2 de de
Translation: It is worth while to learn English.

Chinese: 吸烟对健康有害
Pinyin: xi1 yan1 dui4 jian4 kang1 you3 hai4
Translation: Smoking is injurious to health.

Chinese: 这些话毫无意义
Pinyin: zhe4 xie hua4 hao2 wu2 yi4 yi4
Translation: These words are empty of meaning.

Chinese: 他正沿海边走去
Pinyin: ta1 zheng4 yan2 hai3 bian1 zou3 qu4
Translation: He is walking down the seaside.

Chinese: 他是个有个性的人
Pinyin: ta1 shi4 ge4 you3 ge4 xing4 de ren2
Translation: He is a man of individuality.

Chinese: 会议每年举行一次
Pinyin: hui4 yi4 mei3 nian2 ju3 xing2 yi1 ci4
Translation: The meeting is held yearly.

Chinese: 他们用卡车运煤
Pinyin: ta1 men yong4 ka3 che1 yun4 mei2
Translation: They use a lorry to carry coals.

Chinese: 他的头一阵阵地痛
Pinyin: ta1 de tou yi1 zhen4 zhen4 di4 tong4
Translation: His head throbbed with pain.

Chinese: 疼痛越来越剧烈
Pinyin: teng2 tong4 yue4 lai2 Yue4 ju4 lie4

Chinese: 对不起,对方的电话好象坏了

Chinese: 我的起居室的墙上挂着一块壁毯

Chinese: 小学教育受地方政府的保护
Pinyin: xiao3 xue2 jiao4 yu4 shou4 di4 fang zheng4 fu3 de bao3 hu4

Chinese: 在这张画像中画著他躺在沙发上

Pinyin: gan1 zao4 de tian1 qi4 zhi1 hou4 ren2 ren2 dou1 xi1 wang4 xia4 yu3

Pinyin: zhe4 wei4 yi1 sheng1 shou4 dao4 suo3 you3 ren2 de gao1 du4 zan4 yang2

Pinyin: zai4 chun1 tian1 li3 ting4 niao3 er2 ge1 chang4 shi4 yi1 zhong4 le4 qu4

Pinyin: zui4 hou4 ta1 zhong1 yu2 cheng2 gong1 de jie3 jue2 le zhe4 ge4 wen4 ti2

Pinyin: wo3 yi3 jing1 zai4 zhe4 ge4 lu:3 guan3 li3 yu4 ding4 le yi1 ge4 fang2 jian1

Chinese: 他爸爸坚持他们应该搬到乡下
Pinyin: ta1 ba4 ba jian1 chi2 ta1 men ying1 gai1 ban1 dao4 xiang1 xia4

Chinese: 我们跟服务员争执那顿饭的价钱

Chinese: 这本书是他以前写的剧本的扩充

Pinyin: wo3 ren4 wei2 qiu1 tian1 shi4 yi1 nian2 zhong4 zui4 mei3 de ji4 jie2

Chinese: 这家旅馆为旅客提供订票服务

Pinyin: fu4 qin1 ji3 wo3 mai3 le yi1 zhi3 xiao3 gou3 zuo4 wei2 sheng1 ri4 li3 wu4

Chinese: 他的病较医生原来以为的更严重
Pinyin: ta1 de bing4 jiao4 yi1 sheng1 yuan2 lai2 yi3 wei2 de geng4 yan2 zhong4

Pinyin: ta1 fu4 qin1 hen3 yan2 li4 ta1 cong2 lai2 mei2 you3 biao3 yang2 guo4 ta1

Chinese: 政府对工会表现得越来越不耐烦

Chinese: 那小猫爬到树上却不敢下来

Pinyin: guan3 li3 bu4 men2 cai3 qu3 le yi1 qie4 he2 li3 de an1 quan2 cuo4 shi1

Chinese: 考试之前,我们复习一学期的功课
Pinyin: kao3 shi4 zhi1 qian2 wo3 men fu4 xi2 yi1 xue2 qi1 de gong1 ke4

Chinese: 我一直抬那些重东西, 现在腰都痛了

Pinyin: wo3 men xu1 yao4 ji3 ge nan2 zi3 zuo4 xin1 li3 xue2 shi2 yan4 dui4 xiang4!

Chinese: 这个花园离市中心只有五分钟的路程
Pinyin: zhe4 ge4 hua1 yuan2 li2 shi4 zhong1 xin1 zhi3 you3 wu3 fen1 zhong1 de lu4 cheng2

Chinese: 树叶已开始变色,很快就是冬天了
Pinyin: shu4 ye4 yi3 kai1 shi3 bian4 se4 hen3 kuai4 jiu4 shi4 dong1 tian1 le

Pinyin: nei4 ge4 di4 fang zai4 di4 tu2 shang4 yi3 shi2 zi4 xing2 ji4 hao biao1 chu1

Chinese: 那时我不在家,所以由我女儿招待客人
Pinyin: na4 shi2 wo3 bu4 zai4 jia1 suo3 yi3 you2 wo3 nu:3 er2 zhao1 dai4 ke4 ren

Chinese: 这件事情对社会造成了有害的影响

Chinese: 我们复制了计算机磁盘以防意外

Translation: We make copies of our computer disks as a safeguard against accidents.

Chinese: 这一经验为他的思想开阔了新的视野

Chinese: 盒上印有装配模型的简要说明
Pinyin: he2 shang4 yin4 you3 zhuang1 pei4 mo2 xing2 de jian3 yao4 shuo1 ming2!

Chinese: 我会陪在你身边,就象我答应你的那样
Pinyin: wo3 kuai4 pei2 zai4 ni3 shen1 bian1 jiu4 xiang4 wo3 da1 ying ni3 de na4 yang4

Chinese: 你的精彩报告引出了几个重要问题
Pinyin: ni3 de jing1 cai3 bao4 gao4 yin3 chu1 le ji3 ge zhong4 yao4 wen4 ti2

Chinese: 群众高声喊叫把演讲人的声音压了下去
Pinyin: qun2 zhong4 gao1 sheng1 han3 jiao4 ba3 yan3 jiang3 ren2 de sheng1 yin1 ya4 le xia4 qu

Pinyin: ni3 bu4 ying1 gai1 rang4 shi4 bing1 men mao4 bu2 bi4 yao4 de wei1 xian3

Pinyin: deng3 dao4 wo3 de2 zhi1 zhe4 xiang4 jue2 ding4 shi2 yi3 jing1 tai4 chi2 le

Chinese: 我在七点钟的新闻报道中听到了这则消息
Pinyin: wo3 zai4 qi1 dian3 zhong1 de xin1 wen2 bao4 dao4 zhong4 ting1 dao4 le zhe4 ze2 xiao1 xi

Chinese: 对我来说,拥有一辆汽车的花费太大

Chinese: 孩子们表演完后,大人们鼓掌

Chinese: 有关环境的会议将在下周一举行
Pinyin: you3 guan1 huan2 jing4 de hui4 yi4 jiang4 zai4 xia4 zhou1 yi1 ju3 xing2

Chinese: 几乎所有的成员都同意这项提议

Chinese: 尽管他大声喊叫,却没有人来帮助他

Chinese: 他伸出手去,保护他的孩子免受伤害

Chinese: 他的政治观点在两个极端之间摇摆不定

Chinese: 我们应该使用无烟煤以防止空气污染

Chinese: 我们除了同意他们之外,没有别的选择

Chinese: 请把窗子弄干净,我几乎看不到外面

Chinese: 离开学校后,他成为一名建筑工人

Chinese: 这张唱片非常成功,卖了一百万张

Chinese: 这家商店因公平交易而获好名声

Chinese: 我觉得我没有勇气告诉他这个坏消息

Chinese: 她用一张面巾纸擦掉脸上的汗水

Chinese: 我开始做这项工作时, 遇到许多困难

Chinese: 她午饭吃得很少,期待晚饭时饱餐一顿

Chinese: 这个地区大多数国家的经济都不稳定
Pinyin: zhe4 ge4 di4 qu1 da4 duo1 shu4 guo2 jia1 de jing1 ji4 dou1 bu4 wen3 ding4

Chinese: 我养了一只猫和一只狗,但它们老是打架
Pinyin: wo3 yang3 le yi1 zhi3 mao1 huo4 yi1 zhi3 gou3 dan4 ta1 men lao3 shi da3 jia4

Chinese: 只要我们紧密团结就能克服困难

Chinese: 有一条良好的A级公路通往北方--A级1号公路
Pinyin: you3 yi1 tiao2 liang2 hao3 deA ji2 gong1 lu4 tong1 wang4 bei3 fang--A1 ji21 hao4 gong1 lu4!

Chinese: 法庭上原告和被告双方都有各自的律师

Chinese: 别那样对我大声嚷嚷,我能听清楚

Translation: Don't shout into my ears like that, I can hear you perfectly well.

Chinese: 从这个角度来看, 画中的女子面带微笑
Pinyin: zong4 zhe4 ge4 jiao3 du4 lai2 kan4 hua4 zhong4 di4 nu:3 zi3 mian4 dai4 wei1 xiao4!
Translation: Seen from this angle the woman in the picture is smiling.

Chinese: 老师要求学生们复述他们刚读的故事
Pinyin: lao3 shi1 yao1 qiu2 xue2 sheng men fu4 shu4 ta1 men gang1 du2 de gu4 shi4
Translation: The teacher asked the students to retell the story they just read.

Chinese: 那家大工厂倒闭,使许多工人失业
Pinyin: na4 jia1 da4 gong1 chang3 dao3 bi4 shi3 xu3 duo1 gong1 ren2 shi1 ye4
Translation: The closure of the large factory made many workers live in idleness.

Chinese: 你决不会知道你的鼓励对我多么有意义
Pinyin: ni3 jue2 bu4 kuai4 zhi1 dao4 ni3 de gu3 li4 dui4 wo3 duo1 me you3 yi4 yi4
Translation: You will never know how much your encouragement meant to me.

Chinese: 这次经验有助于帮助她改变社会意识
Pinyin: zhe4 ci4 jing1 yan4 you3 zhu4 yu2 bang1 zhu4 ta1 gai3 bian4 she4 hui4 yi4 shi2
Translation: This experience helped to change her social consciousness.

Chinese: 电影导演测试了一下那位新演员的演技
Pinyin: dian4 ying3 dao3 yan3 ce4 shi4 le yi1 xia4 na4 wei4 xin1 yan3 yuan2 de yan3 ji4
Translation: The film director put the new actor through his paces.

Chinese: 他做的事完全合法, 警方不能碰他
Pinyin: ta1 zuo4 de shi4 wan2 quan2 he2 fa3 jing3 fang1 bu4 neng2 peng4 ta1!
Translation: What he did was perfectly legal the police can't touch (i.e. arrest) him for it.

Chinese: 这位冠军为了下一场比赛正在进行训练
Pinyin: zhe4 wei4 guan4 jun1 wei4 le xia4 yi1 chang3 bi3 sai4 zheng4 zai4 jin4 xing2 xun4 lian4
Translation: The champion is in training for his next fight.

Chinese: 我们用电脑查找所有用连字符连接的词
Pinyin: wo3 men yong4 dian4 nao3 cha2 zhao3 suo3 you3 yong4 lian2 zi4 fu2 lian2 jie1 de ci2
Translation: We did a computer search for all the hyphenated words.

Chinese: 我认为这些有趣的旧习俗应该保存下去
Pinyin: wo3 ren4 wei2 zhe4 xie you3 qu4 de jiu4 xi2 su2 ying1 gai1 bao3 cun2 xia4 qu
Translation: I think these interesting old customs should be preserved.

Chinese: 他们的观点同我们看问题的方法格格不入
Pinyin: ta1 men de guan1 dian3 tong2 wo3 men kan4 wen4 ti2 de fang1 fa3 ge2 ge2 bu4 ru4
Translation: Their ideas are quite alien to our ways of thinking.

Chinese: 我们用他给我们带来的面粉做了一些面包
Pinyin: wo3 men yong4 ta1 ji3 wo3 men dai4 lai2 de mian4 fen3 zuo4 le yi1 xie1 mian4 bao1
Translation: We made some bread with the flour he bought for us.

Chinese: 骑士们在小酒店里会合,讨论他们的计划
Pinyin: qi2 shi4 men zai4 xiao3 jiu3 dian4 li3 hui4 he2 tao3 lun4 ta1 men de ji4 hua4
Translation: The knights met in the tavern to discuss their plan.

Chinese: 我们大家都得参加跑步训练, 无人例外
Pinyin: wo3 men da4 jia1 dou1 de can1 jia1 pao3 bu4 xun4 lian4 wu2 ren2 li4 wai4!
Translation: We all had to take part in the training run, with nobody excepted.

Chinese: 首次飞跃大西洋是一项了不起的业绩
Pinyin: shou3 ci4 fei1 yue4 da4 xi1 yang2 shi4 yi2 xiang4 le bu4 qi3 de ye4 ji1
Translation: Flying across the Atlantic for the first time was a great achievement.

Chinese: 我因有约在先,所以未能参加这个会
Pinyin: wo3 yin1 you3 yue1 zai4 xian1 suo3 yi3 wei4 neng2 can1 jia1 zhe4 ge4 kuai4
Translation: I was unable to attend the meeting because of a prior engagement.

Chinese: 他在面对危险的时候表现出非凡的勇气
Pinyin: ta1 zai4 mian4 dui4 wei1 xian3 de shi2 hou biao3 xian4 chu1 fei1 fan2 de yong3 qi4
Translation: He showed remarkable courage when he faced the danger.

Chinese: 我得把电话号码记下来,以免待会儿忘记
Pinyin: wo3 de ba3 dian4 hua4 hao4 ma3 ji4 xia lai yi3 mian3 dai4 kuai4 er wang4 ji4
Translation: I'll just jot down their phone number before I forget it.

Chinese: 我喜欢滑雪, 同时也知道这非常危险
Pinyin: wo3 xi3 huan hua2 xue3 tong2 shi2 ye3 zhi1 dao4 zhe4 fei1 chang2 wei1 xian3
Translation: I like skiing and in the meantime, I know it is very dangerous.

Chinese: 我们应该多吃一些富含纤维素的绿色蔬菜
Pinyin: wo3 men ying1 gai1 duo1 ji2 yi1 xie1 fu4 han2 xian1 wei2 su4 de lu:4 se4 shu1 cai4
Translation: We should eat more green vegetables rich in cellulose.

Chinese: 请假离开办公室之后我赶紧去了医院
Pinyin: qing3 jia4 li2 kai1 ban4 gong1 shi4 zhi1 hou4 wo3 gan3 jin3 qu4 le yi1 yuan4
Translation: After asking off my office, I went to the hospital immediately.

Chinese: 他体重减了很多, 比以前轻了三公斤
Pinyin: ta1 ti3 zhong4 jian3 le hen3 duo1 bi4 yi3 qian2 qing1 le san1 gong1 jin1!
Translation: He's lost a lot of weight: he's three kilos lighter than he used to be.

Chinese: 自从他去年夏天离去, 我们就失去了联系
Pinyin: zi4 cong2 ta1 qu4 nian2 xia4 tian1 li2 qu4 wo3 men jiu4 shi1 qu4 le lian2 xi4
Translation: We have lost contact with him since he left last summer.

Chinese: 检查者对所有受害者的朋友进行了调查
Pinyin: jian3 cha2 zhe3 dui4 suo3 you3 shou4 hai4 zhe3 de peng2 you jin4 xing2 le diao4 cha2
Translation: The checker made a check on all the victims' friends.

Chinese: 我们可以以2比零或2比1赢得这三局两胜的比赛
Pinyin: wo3 men ke3 yi3 yi32 bi4 ling2 huo42 bi41 ying2 de2 zhe4 san1 ju2 liang3 sheng4 de bi3 sai4!
Translation: We can win the rubber 2 games to nil or 2-1.

Chinese: 在这张粉红色纸条上写下你的姓名和地址
Pinyin: zai4 zhe4 zhang1 fen3 hong2 se4 zhi3 tiao2 shang4 xie3 xia4 ni3 de xing4 ming2 huo4 di4 zhi3
Translation: Write your name and address on this pink slip.

Chinese: 他用自来水龙头流出的凉水把手洗干净
Pinyin: ta1 yong4 zi4 lai2 shui3 long2 tou2 liu2 chu1 de liang2 shui3 ba3 shou3 xi3 gan1 jing4
Translation: He cleaned his hands in the cold water from the tap.

Chinese: 他用尽一切影响力使他们接受他的计划
Pinyin: ta1 yong4 jin4 yi1 qie4 ying3 xiang3 li4 shi3 ta1 men jie1 shou4 ta1 de ji4 hua4
Translation: He exerted all his influence to make them accept his plan.

Chinese: 生命可以被比作一次不知目的地的旅行
Pinyin: sheng1 ming4 ke3 yi3 bei4 bi4 zuo4 yi1 ci4 bu4 zhi1 mu4 di4 di4 de lu:3 xing2
Translation: Life can be likened to a journey with an unknown destination.

Chinese: 他们对即将到来的选举作了充分的准备
Pinyin: ta1 men dui4 ji2 jiang1 dao4 lai2 de xuan3 ju3 zuo4 le chong1 fen4 de zhun3 bei4
Translation: They have made good preparation for the upcoming elections.

Chinese: 他们爱举行戏称之为文学晚会的活动
Pinyin: ta1 men ai4 ju3 xing2 xi4 cheng4 zhi1 wei4 wen2 xue2 wan3 hui4 de huo2 dong4!
Translation: They're fond of holding what are laughingly known as literary soirees.

Chinese: 你有这样一位通情达理的父亲,真是幸运
Pinyin: ni3 you3 zhe4 yang4 yi1 wei4 tong1 qing2 da2 li3 de fu4 qin1 zhen1 shi4 xing4 yun4
Translation: You are fortunate to have such a reasonable father.

Chinese: 老师从一开始就强调翻译准确性
Pinyin: lao3 shi1 zong4 yi1 kai1 shi3 jiu4 qiang2 diao4 fan1 yi4 zhun3 que4 xing4
Translation: The teacher laid emphasis on the precision of the translation from the outset.

Chinese: 原始社会的结构并不一定就是简单的
Pinyin: yuan2 shi3 she4 hui4 de jie2 gou4 bing4 bu4 yi1 ding4 jiu4 shi4 jian3 dan1 de
Translation: The constitution of a primitive society is not necessarily simple.

Chinese: 当她听到那则消息后,她变得越来越紧张
Pinyin: dang4 ta1 ting1 dao4 na4 ze2 xiao1 xi hou4 ta1 bian4 de yue4 lai2 yue4 jin3 zhang1
Translation: When she heard the news she was heightening tension.

Chinese: 这些发展促使家用电脑的需求量增大
Pinyin: zhe4 xie fa1 zhan3 cu4 shi3 jia1 yong4 dian4 nao3 de xu1 qiu2 liang4 zeng1 da4
Translation: These developments have created a great demand for home computers.

Chinese: 这个饭店的服务质量已经有了很大改善
Pinyin: zhe4 ge4 fan4 dian4 de fu2 wu4 zhi4 liang4 yi3 jing1 you3 le hen3 da4 gai3 shan4
Translation: The quality of service in this restaurant has improved a lot.

Chinese: 你与其要他减价还不如求助于一棵树
Pinyin: ni3 yu3 qi2 yao4 ta1 jian3 jia4 huan2 bu4 ru2 qiu2 zhu4 yu2 yi1 ke1 shu4
Translation: You might as well ask the tree for help as request him to reduce the price.

Chinese: 厨房是我妻子的领地,她不愿让我进去
Pinyin: chu2 fang2 shi4 wo3 qi1 zi de ling3 de ta1 bu4 yuan4 rang4 wo3 jin4 qu4
Translation: The kitchen is my wife's domain, she doesn't like me going into it.

Chinese: 教会应当就基本道德问题多做出些榜样
Pinyin: jiao4 hui4 ying1 dang1 jiu4 ji1 ben3 dao4 de2 wen4 ti2 duo1 zuo4 chu1 xie1 bang3 yang4!
Translation: The Church should give more of a lead on basic moral issues.

Chinese: 多丽,你的东西乱七八糟,收拾收拾房间
Pinyin: duo1 li4 ni3 de dong1 xi luan4 qi1 ba1 zao1 shou1 shi shou1 shi fang2 jian1
Translation: Dolly, all your things are in a muddle, tidy up your room.

Chinese: 好的。请您告诉我贵姓及大名的头一个字母
Pinyin: hao3 de. qi3ng ni2n ga4o su wo3 gui4 xi4ng ji2 Da4 mi2ng de tou yi1 ge4 zi4 mu3?
Translation: Ok may I have your last name and first initial, please?

Chinese: 我可以向你保证,你儿子在这里会很快乐的
Pinyin: wo3 ke3 yi3 xiang4 ni3 bao3 zheng4 ni3 er2 zi zai4 zhe4 li3 kuai4 hen3 kuai4 yue4 de
Translation: I can assure you that your son will be happy here.

Chinese: 他们的足球队在昨天的比赛中表现突出
Pinyin: ta1 men de zu2 qiu2 dui4 zai4 zuo2 tian1 de bi3 sai4 zhong4 biao3 xian4 tu1 chu1
Translation: Their football team performed very well in the match yesterday.

Chinese: 火警警报响时全体人员应到楼外集合
Pinyin: huo3 jing3 jing3 bao4 xiang3 shi2 quan2 ti3 ren2 yuan2 ying4 dao4 lou2 wai4 ji2 he2!
Translation: If the fire-alarm goes, staff should assemble outside the building.

Chinese: 我躺下来与其说是要睡觉,倒不如说是要思考
Pinyin: wo3 tang3 xia lai yu3 qi2 shuo1 shi4 yao4 shui4 jiao4 dao4 bu4 ru2 shuo1 shi4 yao4 si1 kao3
Translation: I lay down not so much to sleep as to think.

Chinese: 那位代表提出了一项对新闻法的修正案
Pinyin: na4 wei4 dai4 biao3 ti2 chu1 le yi2 xiang4 dui4 xin1 wen2 fa3 de xiu1 zheng4 an4
Translation: That representative brought forth an amendment to the press law.

Chinese: 一个干部必须联系群众,同群众打成一片
Pinyin: yi1 ge4 gan4 bu4 bi4 xu1 lian2 xi4 qun2 zhong4 tong2 qun2 zhong4 da3 cheng2 yi1 pian4
Translation: A cadre must reach out to and be one with the masses.

Chinese: 这个小男孩因为结巴不敢回答老师的问题
Pinyin: zhe4 ge4 xiao3 nan2 hai2 yin1 wei4 jie2 ba1 bu4 gan3 hui2 da2 lao3 shi1 de wen4 ti2
Translation: The boy dare not answer the questions because of his stammer.

Chinese: 她自称精通计算机,其实她是假充内行
Pinyin: ta1 zi4 cheng1 jing1 tong1 ji4 suan4 ji1 qi2 shi2 ta1 shi4 jia4 chong1 nei4 hang2
Translation: She claims to know all about computers but really she's a sham.

Chinese: 试验没有成功,尽管如此,还是值得做的
Pinyin: shi4 yan4 mei2 you3 cheng2 gong1 jin3 guan3 ru2 ci3 hai2 shi4 zhi2 de zuo4 de
Translation: The experiment failed!###It was, nevertheless, worth making.

Chinese: 有约在先,我恐怕不能与你共进晚餐
Pinyin: you3 yue1 zai4 xian1 wo3 kong3 pa4 bu4 neng2 yu4 ni3 gong4 jin4 wan3 can1
Translation: I fear that a prior engagement will prohibit me from joining you in dinner.

Chinese: 她因这一成绩而获得第三个冠军称号
Pinyin: ta1 yin1 zhe4 yi1 cheng2 ji1 er2 huo4 de2 di4 san1 ge4 guan4 jun1 cheng1 hao4
Translation: With this performance, she has notched up her third championship title.

Chinese: 新制度已对生产力造成了灾难性的影响
Pinyin: xin1 zhi4 du4 yi3 dui4 sheng1 chan3 li4 zao4 cheng2 le zai1 nan4 xing4 de ying3 xiang3
Translation: The new system has had a disastrous effect on productivity.

Chinese: 她从火车窗口里伸出手挥动手帕道别
Pinyin: ta1 zong4 huo3 che1 chuang1 kou3 li3 shen1 chu1 shou3 hui1 dong4 shou3 pa4 dao4 bie4
Translation: She fluttered her handkerchief from the train window as a good-bye.

Chinese: 我总觉得他讨厌我,但我不知道为什么
Pinyin: wo3 zong3 jue2 de ta1 tao3 yan4 wo3 dan4 wo3 bu4 zhi1 dao4 wei4 shen2 me
Translation: I always feel he has a grudge against me, although I don't know why.

Chinese: 这件事不久引起了一些领导同志的注意
Pinyin: zhe4 jian4 shi4 bu4 jiu3 yin3 qi3 le yi1 xie1 ling3 dao3 tong2 zhi4 de zhu4 yi4
Translation: The matter was soon brought to the notice of some leading comrades.

Chinese: 这个工人因为严格遵守规则而受到了表扬
Pinyin: zhe4 ge4 gong1 ren2 yin1 wei4 yan2 ge2 zun1 shou3 gui1 ze2 er2 shou4 dao4 le biao3 yang2
Translation: The worker was praised for his observance of the rules.

Chinese: 法语教师每隔一周给这班学生做一次听写
Pinyin: fa3 yu3 jiao4 shi1 mei3 ge2 yi1 zhou1 ji3 zhe4 ban1 xue2 sheng zuo4 yi1 ci4 ting1 xie3
Translation: The French teacher dictates to the class every other week.

Chinese: 报纸上的这篇文章为他的演讲提供了启发
Pinyin: bao4 zhi3 shang4 de zhe4 pian1 wen2 zhang1 wei4 ta1 de yan3 jiang3 ti2 gong1 le qi3 fa1
Translation: The newspaper article provided him with fuel for his speech.

Chinese: 这一运动的领导层对这个问题的看法一致
Pinyin: zhe4 yi1 yun4 dong4 de ling3 dao3 ceng2 dui4 zhe4 ge4 wen4 ti2 de kan4 fa3 yi1 zhi4
Translation: The leadership of the movement are in agreement on this issue.

Chinese: 最小的儿童上一年级, 最大的上六年级
Pinyin: zui4 xiao3 de er2 tong2 shang4 yi1 nian2 ji2 zui4 da4 de shang4 liu4 nian2 ji2!
Translation: The youngest children are in the first form, the oldest in the sixth form.

Chinese: 这个国王没有宽容之心,杀死了所有的犯人
Pinyin: zhe4 ge4 guo2 wang2 mei2 you3 kuan1 rong2 zhi1 xin1 sha1 si3 le suo3 you3 de fan4 ren2
Translation: The king showed no mercy and killed all the prisoners.

Chinese: 有几个年龄较大的男孩子在操场上对他动武
Pinyin: you3 ji3 ge nian2 ling2 jiao4 da4 de nan2 hai2 zi3 zai4 cao1 chang3 shang4 dui4 ta1 dong4 wu3!
Translation: He was bashed up in the playground by some older boys.

Chinese: 我喜欢他的写作风格,但是不喜欢他的内容
Pinyin: wo3 xi3 huan ta1 de xie3 zuo4 feng1 ge2 dan4 shi4 bu4 xi3 huan ta1 de nei4 rong2
Translation: I like the style of his writing but I don't like the content.

Chinese: 解放后这个国家的农业得到了巨大的发展
Pinyin: jie3 fang4 hou4 zhe4 ge4 guo2 jia1 de nong2 ye4 de2 dao4 le ju4 da4 de fa1 zhan3
Translation: Agriculture in this country has developed greatly after liberation.

Chinese: 让我看看买卖这块土地的所有官方文件
Pinyin: rang4 wo3 kan4 kan mai3 mai4 zhe4 kuai4 tu3 di4 de suo3 you3 guan1 fang1 wen2 jian4
Translation: Let me see all the official documents concerning the sale of this land.

Chinese: 演完戏之后, 他们要求作者出来和大家见面
Pinyin: yan3 wan2 xi4 zhi1 hou4 ta1 men yao1 qiu2 zuo2 zhe3 chu1 lai huo4 da4 jia1 jian4 mian4
Translation: After the play they called for the author to show himself.

Chinese: 从他领导后,一个又一个革新项目出现了
Pinyin: zong4 ta1 ling3 dao3 hou4 yi1 ge4 you4 yi1 ge4 ge2 xin1 xiang4 mu4 chu1 xian4 le
Translation: After being led by him, one innovation after another are showing.

Chinese: 这家公司的主要问题是缺少有技术的人员
Pinyin: zhe4 jia1 gong1 si1 de zhu3 yao4 wen4 ti2 shi4 que1 shao3 you3 ji4 shu4 de ren2 yuan2
Translation: The company's main problem is the shortage of skilled personnel.

Chinese: 他们出示了一些统计数字来支持他们的论点
Pinyin: ta1 men chu1 shi4 le yi1 xie1 tong3 ji4 shu4 zi4 lai2 zhi1 chi2 ta1 men de lun4 dian3
Translation: They showed some statistical evidence to support their argument.

Chinese: 无论在哪一方面他都不能被看作是个好丈夫
Pinyin: wu2 lun4 zai4 nei3 yi1 fang1 mian4 ta1 dou1 bu4 neng2 bei4 kan4 zuo4 shi4 ge4 hao4 zhang4 fu
Translation: In no respect can he be looked upon as a good husband.

Chinese: 他在那个伸出到街上的阳台上种了些花
Pinyin: ta1 zai4 nei4 ge4 shen1 chu1 dao4 jie1 shang4 de yang2 tai2 shang4 zhong4 le xie1 hua1
Translation: He planted some flowers on the balcony that projects over the street.

Chinese: 我向他作了详细说明, 好让他能找到那房子
Pinyin: wo3 xiang4 ta1 zuo4 le xiang2 xi4 shuo1 ming2 hao4 rang4 ta1 neng2 zhao3 dao4 na4 fang2 zi!
Translation: I gave him full directions to enable him to find the house.

Chinese: 我上来取我的手提袋,我把它忘在我的办公室了
Pinyin: wo3 shang4 lai2 qu3 wo3 de shou3 ti2 dai4 wo3 ba3 ta1 wang4 zai4 wo3 de ban4 gong1 shi4 le
Translation: I've come up for my bag, I left it in my office.

Chinese: 船搁浅了--这河口的水比我们想像的要浅
Pinyin: chuan2 ge1 qian3 le-- zhe4 he2 kou3 de shui3 bi4 wo3 men xiang3 xiang4 de yao4 qian3!
Translation: The ship has touched bottom the estuary must be shallower than we thought.

Chinese: 那些难看的家具使得他的家看上去一团糟糕
Pinyin: na4 xie1 nan2 kan4 de jia1 ju4 shi3 de ta1 de jia1 kan4 shang4 qu4 yi1 tuan2 zao1 gao1
Translation: His house looks terrible with those pieces of ugly furniture.

Chinese: 他的父母并不像他的老师对他那样有影响
Pinyin: ta1 de fu4 mu3 bing4 bu4 xiang4 ta1 de lao3 shi1 dui4 ta1 na4 yang4 you3 ying3 xiang3
Translation: It is not his parents that influence him so much as his teachers.

Chinese: 重工业的稳固发展为这些进展打下了基础
Pinyin: zhong4 gong1 ye4 de wen3 gu4 fa1 zhan3 wei4 zhe4 xie jin4 zhan3 da3 xia4 le ji1 chu3!
Translation: These developments are underpinned by solid progress in heavy industry.

Chinese: 政府还没有找出对付失业的有效措施
Pinyin: zheng4 fu3 huan2 mei2 you3 zhao3 chu1 dui4 fu shi1 ye4 de you3 xiao4 cuo4 shi1
Translation: The government hasn't worked out the effectual measures to combat unemployment.

Chinese: 春天的时候,踩在松软的地面上非常舒服
Pinyin: chun1 tian1 de shi2 hou cai3 zai4 song1 ruan3 de di4 mian4 shang4 fei1 chang2 shu1 fu
Translation: It's very comfortable to step on the soft ground in the spring.

Chinese: 你要是看到什么可疑的东西就马上通知警察
Pinyin: ni3 yao4 shi4 kan4 dao4 shen2 me ke3 yi2 de dong1 xi jiu4 ma3 shang4 tong1 zhi1 jing3 cha2
Translation: If you see anything suspicious, inform the police at once.

Chinese: 我们再怎样强调学英文的重要性也不为过
Pinyin: wo3 men zai4 zen3 yang4 qiang2 diao4 xue2 Ying1 wen2 de zhong4 yao4 xing4 ye3 bu4 wei4 guo4
Translation: We cannot emphasize too much the importance of learning English.

Chinese: 这间屋子里放了一堆奇形怪状的破烂家具
Pinyin: zhe4 jian4 wu1 zi li3 fang4 le yi1 dui1 qi2 xing2 guai4 zhuang4 de po4 lan4 jia1 ju4
Translation: There is an odd assemblage of broken bits of furniture in this room.

Chinese: 他需要有高收入才能供养得起这样一个大家庭
Pinyin: ta1 xu1 yao4 you3 gao1 shou1 ru4 cai2 neng2 gong4 yang3 de qi3 zhe4 yang4 yi1 ge4 da4 jia1 ting2
Translation: He needs a high income to support such a large family.

Chinese: 我用电话旁的一根铅笔记下了他的电话号码
Pinyin: wo3 yong4 dian4 hua4 pang2 de yi1 gen1 qian1 bi3 ji4 xia4 le ta1 de dian4 hua4 hao4 ma3
Translation: I noted down his telephone number with a pencil near the telephone.

Chinese: 他们上了当, 以为我们还没有作好进攻准备
Pinyin: ta1 men shang4 le dang4 yi3 wei2 wo3 men huan2 mei2 you3 zuo4 hao4 jin4 gong1 zhun3 bei4!
Translation: They were bluffed into believing we were not ready for the attack.

Chinese: 充分利用自然资源的愿望终究会实现
Pinyin: chong1 fen4 li4 yong4 zi4 ran2 zi1 yuan2 de yuan4 wang4 zhong1 jiu1 kuai4 shi2 xian4
Translation: The wish of fully utilizing the natural resources will eventually come true.

Chinese: 形容词的作用是描述或增加名词的意思
Pinyin: xing2 rong2 ci2 de zuo4 yong4 shi4 miao2 shu4 huo4 zeng1 jia1 ming2 ci2 de yi4 si
Translation: The function of an adjective is to describe or add to the meaning of a noun.

Chinese: 她的演说对于听众来说永远是灵感之源
Pinyin: ta1 de yan3 shuo1 dui4 yu2 ting1 zhong4 lai2 shuo1 yong3 yuan3 shi4 ling2 gan3 zhi1 yuan2
Translation: Her speeches have ever been a fount of inspiration to her audiences.

Chinese: 起初我不同意他的提议,不过后来我改了主意
Pinyin: qi3 chu1 wo3 bu4 tong2 yi4 ta1 de ti2 yi4 bu4 guo4 hou4 lai2 wo3 gai3 le zhu3 yi
Translation: Initially, I disagree with his proposal, but later I changed my mind.

Chinese: 当我们听说他们平安无事时,都松了一口气
Pinyin: dang4 wo3 men ting1 shuo1 ta1 men ping2 an1 wu2 shi4 shi2 dou1 song1 le yi1 kou3 qi4
Translation: We all heaved a sigh of relief when we heard that they were safe.

Chinese: 工党政治思想的要点是人人平等
Pinyin: gong1 dang3 zheng4 zhi4 si1 xiang3 de yao4 dian3 shi4 ren2 ren2 ping2 deng3
Translation: The cardinal idea of the Labor Party's political thought is that all people should be equal.

Chinese: 这房间里有一种香气,使人想起春天的花朵
Pinyin: zhe4 fang2 jian1 li3 you3 yi1 zhong4 xiang1 qi4 shi3 ren2 xiang3 qi3 chun1 tian1 de hua1 duo3
Translation: There is an aroma suggestive of spring flowers in the room.

Chinese: 通常, 是男士伸出手来邀请女士跳舞
Pinyin: tong1 chang2 shi4 nan2 shi4 shen1 chu1 shou3 lai2 yao1 qing3 nu:3 shi4 tiao4 wu3
Translation: As a rule, it's the gentleman that holds out his hand to invite a lady to dance.

Chinese: 这两个姑娘相互谈了关于各自男友的悄悄话
Pinyin: zhe4 liang3 ge4 gu1 niang xiang1 hu4 tan2 le guan1 yu2 ge4 zi nan2 you3 de qiao3 qiao3 hua4
Translation: The two girls told each other confidences about their boyfriends.

Chinese: 她并不聪明,但在其他方面,她倒是个好姑娘
Pinyin: ta1 bing4 bu4 cong1 ming2 dan4 zai4 qi2 ta1 fang1 mian4 ta1 dao4 shi4 ge4 hao4 gu1 niang
Translation: She is not very clever, but otherwise she's a nice girl.

Chinese: 他的时间排得很满,学生根本无法和他接触
Pinyin: ta1 de shi2 jian1 pai3 de hen3 man3 xue2 sheng gen1 ben3 wu2 fa3 huo4 ta1 jie1 chu4
Translation: His busy schedule made him completely inaccessible to his students.

Chinese: 就英文而言,它并不像你所认为的那样难
Pinyin: jiu4 Ying1 wen2 er2 yan2 ta1 bing4 bu4 xiang4 ni3 suo3 ren4 wei2 de na4 yang4 nan4
Translation: So far as English is concerned, it is not so difficult as you might think.

Chinese: 他搭乘便车往南去意大利,然后从那里进入法国
Pinyin: ta1 da1 cheng2 pian2 ju1 wang4 nan2 qu4 yi4 da4 li4 ran2 hou4 zong4 na4 li jin4 ru4 fa3 guo2
Translation: He hitched south towards Italy, and thence into France.

Chinese: 在孩子们住院期间, 有个私人教师给他们上课
Pinyin: zai4 hai2 zi men zhu4 yuan4 qi1 jian1 you3 ge4 si1 ren2 jiao4 shi1 ji3 ta1 men shang4 ke4!
Translation: There is a tutor to teach the children while they're in hospital.

Chinese: 我妈妈鼓励我,而且坚持我应该继续我的教育
Pinyin: wo3 ma1 ma gu3 li4 wo3 er2 qie3 jian1 chi2 wo3 ying1 gai1 ji4 xu4 wo3 de jiao4 yu4
Translation: My mother encouraged me and insisted that I continue my education.

Chinese: 教师在学习中的关键作用是不该忽视的
Pinyin: jiao4 shi1 zai4 xue2 xi2 zhong4 di4 guan1 jian4 zuo4 yong4 shi4 bu4 gai1 hu1 shi4 de
Translation: The key role of the teacher in the learning process should not be neglected.

Chinese: 这位教师要使班里的每一个人都弄懂课文
Pinyin: zhe4 wei4 jiao4 shi1 yao4 shi3 ban1 li3 de mei3 yi1 ge4 ren2 dou1 nong4 dong3 ke4 wen2
Translation: The teacher makes sure that everyone in the class understands the text.

Chinese: 你可以在这本书的第一部分找到你要的资料
Pinyin: ni3 ke3 yi3 zai4 zhe4 ben3 shu1 de di4 yi1 bu4 fen zhao3 dao4 ni3 yao4 de zi1 liao4
Translation: You may find the information you need in the first portion of the book.

Chinese: 他们不顾农民反对, 仍继续进行农业改革
Pinyin: ta1 men bu4 gu4 nong2 min2 fan3 dui4 reng2 ji4 xu4 jin4 xing2 nong2 ye4 gai3 ge2!
Translation: They persisted with the agricultural reforms, despite opposition from the farmers.

Chinese: 我总是分不出这对姐妹, 她们看上去简直一模一样
Pinyin: wo3 zong3 shi4 fen4 bu4 chu1 zhe4 dui4 jie3 mei4 ta1 men kan4 shang4 qu4 jian3 zhi2 yi1 mo2 yi2 yang4!
Translation: I always confuse the sisters: they look so alike.

Chinese: 他在一家汽车旅馆呆了一晚上,就又接着旅行了
Pinyin: ta1 zai4 yi1 jia1 qi4 che1 lu:3 guan3 dai1 le yi1 wan3 shang jiu4 you4 jie1 zhe lu:3 xing2 le
Translation: He stayed one night in a motel and went on travelling.

Chinese: 在我看来,这次演出恐怕不能算是完全成功的
Pinyin: zai4 wo3 kan4 lai zhe4 ci4 yan3 chu1 kong3 pa4 bu4 neng2 suan4 shi4 wan2 quan2 cheng2 gong1 de
Translation: I'm afraid that the performance was not a total success.

Chinese: 这本书形象地描写了一百年前的中国生活
Pinyin: zhe4 ben3 shu1 xing2 xiang4 de miao2 xie3 le yi1 bai3 nian2 qian2 de Zhong1 guo2 sheng1 huo2
Translation: This book gives a good picture of life in China 100 hundred years ago.

Chinese: 香山红叶是北京最浓最浓的秋色
Pinyin: xiang1 shan1 hong2 ye4 shi4 Bei3 jing1 zui4 nong2 zui4 nong2 de qiu1 shai3
Translation: The red leaves of maple trees of the Fragrant Hills are the most charming autumn scenery in Beijing.

Chinese: 他的秘密至死也不为人知,因为他从未告诉过别人
Pinyin: ta1 de mi4 mi4 zhi4 si3 ye3 bu4 wei4 ren2 zhi1 yin1 wei4 ta1 zong4 wei4 gao4 su guo4 bie2 ren2
Translation: His secret died with him, for he never told anyone.

Chinese: 这件工作同你早先的工作相比, 有些令人失望
Pinyin: zhe4 jian4 gong1 zuo4 tong2 ni3 zao3 xian1 de gong1 zuo4 xiang1 bi3 you3 xie1 ling4 ren2 shi1 wang4!
Translation: Beside your earlier work this piece seems rather disappointing.

Chinese: 各种各样的影响有助于塑造我们的孩子们的性格
Pinyin: ge4 zhong3 ge4 yang4 de ying3 xiang3 you3 zhu4 yu2 su4 zao4 wo3 men de hai2 zi men de xing4 ge2
Translation: Many influences help to fashion our children's characters.

Chinese: 经济知识对于理解这个问题是至关重要的
Pinyin: jing1 ji4 zhi1 shi dui4 yu2 li3 jie3 zhe4 ge4 wen4 ti2 shi4 zhi4 guan1 zhong4 yao4 de
Translation: A knowledge of economics is fundamental to any understanding of this problem.

Chinese: 开往北京的火车将于半小时后从三站台开出
Pinyin: kai1 wang4 Bei3 jing1 de huo3 che1 jiang4 yu2 ban4 xiao3 shi2 hou4 zong4 san1 zhan4 tai2 kai1 chu1
Translation: The train to Beijing will depart from platform 3 in half an hour.

Chinese: 机场当局已答应重新检查他们的安全措施
Pinyin: ji1 chang3 dang1 ju2 yi3 da1 ying chong2 xin1 jian3 cha2 ta1 men de an1 quan2 cuo4 shi1
Translation: The airport authorities have promised to review their security measurements.

Chinese: 这个小女孩因为斜视不敢在公共场合露面
Pinyin: zhe4 ge4 xiao3 nu:3 hai2 yin1 wei4 xie2 shi4 bu4 gan3 zai4 gong1 gong4 chang3 he2 lou4 mian4
Translation: The little girl dares not to appear in public because she is cross-eyed.

Chinese: 不符合这些要求的考生不能上这所大学
Pinyin: bu4 fu2 he2 zhe4 xie yao1 qiu2 de kao3 sheng1 bu4 neng2 shang4 zhe4 suo3 da4 xue2
Translation: Candidates who fail to meet these requirements will not be admitted to the University.

Chinese: 无疑,他们一定知道这样讲话可能产生的后果
Pinyin: wu2 yi2 ta1 men yi1 ding4 zhi1 dao4 zhe4 yang4 jiang3 hua4 ke3 neng2 chan3 sheng1 de hou4 guo3
Translation: Certainly they must know the probable result of such speeches.

Chinese: 这一千本书将构成学校新图书馆藏书的基础
Pinyin: zhe4 yi1 qian1 ben3 shu1 jiang4 gou4 cheng2 xue2 xiao4 xin1 tu2 shu1 guan3 zang4 shu1 de ji1 chu3
Translation: These 1000 books will form the nucleus of the new school library.

Chinese: 几个星期来她一直呆在家中照顾有病的父亲
Pinyin: ji3 ge xing1 qi1 lai2 ta1 yi1 zhi2 dai1 zai4 jia1 zhong4 zhao4 gu you3 bing4 de fu4 qin1
Translation: She has been tied to the house for weeks looking after her invalid father.

Chinese: 在外表上她保持着平静,但实际上她生气极了
Pinyin: zai4 wai4 biao3 shang4 ta1 bao3 chi2 zhuo2 ping2 jing4 dan4 shi2 ji4 shang4 ta1 sheng1 qi4 ji2 le
Translation: She maintained a calm exterior, though really she was furious.

Chinese: 我对他并不了解,虽然我认识他已经很长时间了
Pinyin: wo3 dui4 ta1 bing4 bu4 liao3 jie3 sui1 ran2 wo3 ren4 shi ta1 yi3 jing1 hen3 zhang3 shi2 jian1 le
Translation: I don't know him well though I've known him for a long time.

Chinese: 在共同反对非正义行为的斗争中, 我们都是同志
Pinyin: zai4 gong4 tong2 fan3 dui4 fei1 zheng4 yi4 xing2 wei2 de dou4 zheng1 zhong4 wo3 men dou1 shi4 tong2 zhi4!
Translation: We are all brothers in the same fight against injustice.

Chinese: 要是不给你添太多麻烦的话,我倒是愿意留下来
Pinyin: yao4 shi4 bu4 ji3 ni3 tian1 tai4 duo1 ma2 fan de hua4 wo3 dao4 shi4 yuan4 yi4 liu2 xia4 lai2
Translation: I'd like to stay if it's not too much of an imposition on you.

Chinese: 根据定义,首都是一个国家的政治文化中心
Pinyin: gen1 ju4 ding4 yi4 shou3 du1 shi4 yi1 ge4 guo2 jia1 de zheng4 zhi4 wen2 hua4 zhong1 xin1
Translation: By definition the capital is the political and cultural center of a country.

Chinese: 先让我烤烤火暖和一下,然后我们开始谈话
Pinyin: xian1 rang4 wo3 kao3 kao3 huo3 nuan3 huo2 yi1 xia4 ran2 hou4 wo3 men kai1 shi3 tan2 hua4
Translation: Just give me a minute to thaw out in front of the fire, then we can talk.

Chinese: 我一想到要对这样的听众讲话,就有些胆小
Pinyin: wo3 yi1 xiang3 dao4 yao4 dui4 zhe4 yang4 de ting1 zhong4 jiang3 hua4 jiu4 you3 xie1 dan3 xiao3
Translation: I was rather daunted by the thought of addressing such an audience.

Chinese: 连长说军队生活可以使新兵锻炼得更坚强
Pinyin: lian2 zhang3 shuo1 jun1 dui4 sheng1 huo2 ke3 yi3 shi3 xin1 bing1 duan4 lian4 de geng4 jian1 qiang2
Translation: The company leader said that army life would toughen the recruits up.

Chinese: 班里所有的男孩都想陪这个漂亮的女孩一起出游
Pinyin: ban1 li3 suo3 you3 de nan2 hai2 dou1 xiang3 pei2 zhe4 ge4 piao4 liang de nu:3 hai2 yi1 qi3 chu1 you2
Translation: All the boys in the class want to go out with the pretty girl.

Chinese: 自由党候选人轻易获胜,超出选票数以千计
Pinyin: zi4 you2 dang3 hou4 xuan3 ren2 qing1 yi4 huo4 sheng4 chao1 chu1 xuan3 piao4 shuo4 yi3 qian1 ji4
Translation: The liberal candidate romped through with thousands of votes to spare.

Chinese: 一位德国科学家打断了我,并问我是否来自中国
Pinyin: yi1 wei4 De2 guo2 ke1 xue2 jia1 da3 duan4 le wo3 bing4 wen4 wo3 shi4 fou3 lai2 zi4 Zhong1 guo2
Translation: A German scientist interrupted me and asked if I came from China.

Chinese: 盒式音像带上有个小窗, 能看见里面的磁带
Pinyin: he2 shi4 yin1 xiang4 dai4 shang4 you3 ge4 xiao3 chuang1 neng2 kan4 jian4 li3 mian4 de ci2 dai4!
Translation: There is a little window in the cassette case so that you can see the tape.

Chinese: 整个作业的安全让一个粗心大意的人给破坏了
Pinyin: zheng3 ge4 zuo4 ye4 de an1 quan2 rang4 yi1 ge4 cu1 xin1 da4 yi4 de ren2 ji3 po4 huai4 le!
Translation: The security of the whole operation has been jeopardized by one careless person.

Chinese: 我们必须把理论与实践相结合是个重要的原则
Pinyin: wo3 men bi4 xu1 ba3 li3 lun4 yu4 shi2 jian4 xiang4 jie2 he2 shi4 ge4 zhong4 yao4 de yuan2 ze2
Translation: It is an essential principle that we must combine theory with practice.

Chinese: 很奇怪他们改变了计划,但我觉得没有什么用处
Pinyin: hen3 qi2 guai4 ta1 men gai3 bian4 le ji4 hua4 dan4 wo3 jue2 de mei2 you3 shen2 me yong4 chu
Translation: Their change of plan is strange but I don't think it's significant.

Chinese: 世界杯决赛现在正向五十多个国家现场转播
Pinyin: Shi4 jie4 bei1 jue2 sai4 xian4 zai4 zheng4 xiang4 wu3 shi2 duo1 ge4 guo2 jia1 xian4 chang3 zhuan3 bo1
Translation: The World Cup final is being transmitted live to over fifty countries.

Chinese: 这条路线旅行的人以前常走,但是现在已不用了
Pinyin: zhe4 tiao2 lu4 xian4 lu:3 xing2 de ren2 yi3 qian2 chang2 zou3 dan4 shi4 xian4 zai4 yi3 bu4 yong4 le
Translation: The route was once much travelled but has fallen into disuse.

Chinese: 他们试图利用更好的方法和工具来增加生产力
Pinyin: ta1 men shi4 tu2 li4 yong4 geng4 hao3 de fang1 fa3 huo4 gong1 ju4 lai2 zeng1 jia1 sheng1 chan3 li4
Translation: They tried to increase production by using better methods and tools.

Chinese: 他一想到自己对她的死负有责任就感到心如刀割
Pinyin: ta1 yi1 xiang3 dao4 zi4 ji3 dui4 ta1 de si3 fu4 you3 ze2 ren4 jiu4 gan3 dao4 xin1 ru2 dao1 ge1
Translation: The thought that he was responsible for her death preyed on his mind.

Chinese: 工会领袖号召抗议那天全体会员积极参加
Pinyin: gong1 hui4 ling3 xiu4 hao4 zhao4 kang4 yi4 na4 Tian1 quan2 ti3 hui4 yuan2 ji1 ji2 can1 jia1!
Translation: Union leaders called for the active participation of all members in the day of protest.

Chinese: 前一代人制造出来的空洞理论,下一代人把它们打破
Pinyin: qian2 yi1 dai4 ren2 zhi4 zao4 chu1 lai de kong1 dong4 li3 lun4 xia4 yi1 dai4 ren2 ba3 ta1 men da3 po4
Translation: One generation blows bubbles, and the next breaks them.

Chinese: 你那篇文章的内容好极了, 但是表达方式不太好
Pinyin: ni3 na4 pian1 wen2 zhang1 de nei4 rong2 hao4 ji2 le dan4 shi4 biao3 da2 fang1 shi4 bu4 tai4 hao4!
Translation: The content of your essay is excellent, but it's not very well expressed.

Chinese: 生产者与消费者之间的利益冲突将永远存在
Pinyin: sheng1 chan3 zhe3 yu4 xiao1 fei4 zhe3 zhi1 jian1 de li4 yi4 chong1 tu1 jiang4 yong3 yuan3 cun2 zai4
Translation: The conflicting interests of producers and consumers will be everlasting.

Chinese: 既然你无法回答这个问题,我们最好再问问别人
Pinyin: ji4 ran2 ni3 wu2 fa3 hui2 da2 zhe4 ge4 wen4 ti2 wo3 men zui4 hao3 zai4 wen4 wen4 bie2 ren2
Translation: Since you can't answer the question, perhaps we'd better ask someone else.

Chinese: 等所有的植物都开花时,花园会显得非常漂亮
Pinyin: deng3 suo3 you3 de zhi2 wu4 dou1 kai1 hua1 shi2 hua1 yuan2 kuai4 xian3 de fei1 chang2 piao4 liang
Translation: The garden will look very beautiful when all the plants are in flower.

Chinese: 我的部分工作是同我们的供应商保持良好的关系
Pinyin: wo3 de bu4 fen gong1 zuo4 shi4 tong2 wo3 men de gong1 ying4 shang1 bao3 chi2 liang2 hao3 de guan1 xi
Translation: Part of my job is to maintain good relationship with our suppliers.

Chinese: 我八点钟就到医院了,但是九点钟我才去值班
Pinyin: wo3 ba1 dian3 zhong1 jiu4 dao4 yi1 yuan4 le dan4 shi4 jiu3 dian3 zhong1 wo3 cai2 qu4 zhi2 ban1
Translation: I arrive at the hospital at eight o'clock, but I don't go on duty until nine.

Chinese: 这家工厂的所有女职工在三八节都得到了一份礼物
Pinyin: zhe4 jia1 gong1 chang3 de suo3 you3 nu:3 zhi2 gong1 zai4 san1 ba1 jie2 dou1 de2 dao4 le yi1 fen4 li3 wu4
Translation: All the female workers in this factory got a present on March 8.

Chinese: 因为污染严重,许多美丽的鱼类正在面临绝种
Pinyin: yin1 wei4 wu1 ran3 yan2 zhong4 xu3 duo1 mei3 li4 de yu2 lei4 zheng4 zai4 mian4 lin2 jue2 zhong4
Translation: Many beautiful fish are fast disappearing because of the severe pollution.

Chinese: 那些喜欢和他一起踢足球的小男孩都把他当作叔叔
Pinyin: na4 xie1 xi3 huan huo4 ta1 yi1 qi3 ti1 zu2 qiu2 de xiao3 nan2 hai2 dou1 ba3 ta1 dang4 zuo4 shu1 shu
Translation: He is uncle to all the little boys who like to play football with him.

Chinese: 那位记者发来了一篇描写极地生活的艰苦的文章
Pinyin: na4 wei4 ji4 zhe3 fa4 lai2 le yi1 pian1 miao2 xie3 ji2 de sheng1 huo2 de jian1 ku4 de wen2 zhang1
Translation: The reporter has sent an article describing the rigors of life at the poles.

Chinese: 别穿这些衣服去工作,要穿得象个专业人员的样子
Pinyin: bie4 chuan1 zhe4 xie yi1 fu qu4 gong1 zuo4 yao4 chuan1 de xiang4 ge4 zhuan1 ye4 ren2 yuan2 de yang4 zi
Translation: "Don't wear those clothes to work; try to look more professional!"

Chinese: 如果最后你能够有所成就, 你的努力就不会白费
Pinyin: ru2 guo3 zui4 hou4 ni3 neng2 gou4 you3 suo3 cheng2 jiu4 ni3 de nu3 li4 jiu4 bu4 hui4 bai2 fei4
Translation: Your efforts will not come to no avail, if you can achieve something at last.

Chinese: 你如果可以正确有效地使用一个词,你就是了解它了
Pinyin: ni3 ru2 guo3 ke3 yi3 zheng4 que4 you3 xiao4 de shi3 yong4 yi1 ge4 ci2 ni3 jiu4 shi4 liao3 jie3 ta1 le
Translation: If you can use a word correctly and effectively you comprehend it.

Chinese: 他肯定是喝多了,当他要站起来时,却摔倒在地上
Pinyin: ta1 ken3 ding4 shi4 he4 duo1 le dang4 ta1 yao4 zhan4 qi3 lai shi2 que4 shuai1 dao3 zai4 di4 shang
Translation: "He must have drunk too much; when he tried to stand up, he keeled over."

Chinese: 在空无一人的办公室里电话铃突然地发出刺耳的尖叫声
Pinyin: zai4 kong4 wu2 yi1 ren2 de ban4 gong1 shi4 li3 dian4 hua4 ling2 tu1 ran2 de fa1 chu1 ci4 er3 de jian1 jiao4 sheng1
Translation: Telephone shrilled unattended in deserted office.

Chinese: 他不谈论这个令人不愉快的话题,而去谈论别的事情
Pinyin: ta1 bu4 tan2 lun4 zhe4 ge4 ling4 ren2 bu4 yu2 kuai4 de hua4 ti2 er2 qu4 tan2 lun4 bie2 de shi4 qing
Translation: He dismissed the unpleasant subject and talked about something else.

Chinese: 你必须先弄懂数学基础知识, 我们才能进一步学习
Pinyin: ni3 bi4 xu1 xian1 nong4 dong3 shu4 xue2 ji1 chu3 zhi1 shi wo3 men cai2 neng2 jin4 yi2 bu4 xue2 xi2!
Translation: You must understand the elements of mathematics before we can proceed further.

Chinese: 我买不起像特德那样的照相机。这要花好大一笔钱
Pinyin: wo3 mai3 bu4 qi3 xiang4 te4 de2 na4 yang4 de zhao4 xiang4 ji1. zhe4 ya4o hua1 ha4o da4 yi1 bi3 qia2n
Translation: I can't possibly afford to buy a camera like Ted's!###It costs the earth.

Chinese: 他把文件使劲扔在我的桌子上便怒气冲冲地走了出去
Pinyin: ta1 ba3 wen2 jian4 shi3 jin4 reng1 zai4 wo3 de zhuo1 zi shang4 pian2 nu4 qi4 chong4 chong4 de zou3 le chu1 qu4
Translation: He slammed the papers down on my desk and angrily walked out.

Chinese: 所有的顾问当中, 只有王先生提了一些中肯的建议
Pinyin: suo3 you3 de gu4 wen4 dang1 zhong1 zhi3 you3 wang2 xian1 sheng ti2 le yi1 xie1 zhong4 ken3 de jian4 yi4
Translation: Of all the consultants, only Mr!###Wang gave us some proposals in point.

Chinese: 他不久就逐渐习惯了宿舍的生活并交了两三个朋友
Pinyin: ta1 bu4 jiu3 jiu4 zhu2 jian4 xi2 guan4 le su4 she4 de sheng1 huo2 bing4 jiao1 le liang3 san1 ge4 peng2 you
Translation: He soon gets accustom to dormitory life and make two or three friend.

Chinese: 那位著名的进步思想家被邀请在会议上发表演讲
Pinyin: na4 wei著4 ming2 de jin4 bu4 si1 xiang3 jia1 bei4 yao1 qing3 zai4 hui4 yi4 shang4 fa1 biao3 yan3 jiang3
Translation: That famous progressive thinker was asked to deliver a speech at the meeting.

Chinese: 人类的种种经验都证明了爱与怕之间的紧密联系
Pinyin: ren2 lei4 de zhong3 zhong3 jing1 yan4 dou1 zheng4 ming2 le ai4 yu4 pa4 zhi1 jian1 de jin3 mi4 lian2 xi4
Translation: All kinds of human experience testify to the close link between love and fear.

Chinese: 不论阶级,种族,性别,人人都可进这所学校上课
Pinyin: bu4 lun4 jie1 ji2 zhong3 zu2 xing4 bie2 ren2 ren2 dou1 ke3 jin4 zhe4 suo3 xue2 xiao4 shang4 ke4
Translation: Everybody can come to this school, without respect to class, race, or sex.

Chinese: 即使多年没有看见我的同学,我也马上认出了他
Pinyin: ji2 shi3 duo1 nian2 mei2 you3 kan4 jian4 wo3 de tong2 xue2 wo3 ye3 ma3 shang4 ren4 chu1 le ta1
Translation: Even though I hadn't seen my classmate for many years, I recognized him immediately.

Chinese: 这家新工厂给自然环境带来的影响可能是灾难性的
Pinyin: zhe4 jia1 xin1 gong1 chang3 ji3 zi4 ran2 huan2 jing4 dai4 lai2 de ying3 xiang3 ke3 neng2 shi4 zai1 nan4 xing4 de
Translation: This environmental effect of this new factory could be disastrous.

Chinese: 我在会上真出了洋相了--一站起来就把问题忘了
Pinyin: wo3 zai4 kuai4 shang4 zhen1 chu1 le yang2 xiang4 le-- yi1 zhan4 qi3 lai jiu4 ba3 wen4 ti2 wang4 le!
Translation: I made a real ass of myself at the meeting standing up and then forgetting the question.

Chinese: 这次新发现的石油对这个地区的经济有着重大的意义
Pinyin: zhe4 ci4 xin1 fa1 xian4 de shi2 you2 dui4 zhe4 ge4 di4 qu1 de jing1 ji4 you3 zhe zhong4 da4 de yi4 yi4
Translation: This new discovery of oil is of great significance to this area's economy.

Chinese: 这篇演讲非常令人失望,它回避了所有主要的问题
Pinyin: zhe4 pian1 yan3 jiang3 fei1 chang2 ling4 ren2 shi1 wang4 ta1 hui2 bi4 le suo3 you3 zhu3 yao4 de wen4 ti2
Translation: "The speech was most disappointing; it skirted round all the main questions."

Chinese: 为了安全起见,在市内开车时速不要超过三十公里
Pinyin: wei4 le an1 quan2 qi3 xian4 zai4 shi4 nei4 kai1 che1 shi2 su4 bu4 yao4 chao1 guo4 san1 shi2 gong1 li3
Translation: For safety's sake, don't drive more than 30 kilometers per hour in the city.

Chinese: 你或许也会发现阅读已经变成是有趣的事,而不是工作
Pinyin: ni3 huo4 xu3 ye3 kuai4 fa1 xian4 yue4 du2 yi3 jing1 bian4 cheng2 shi4 you3 qu4 de shi4 er2 bu2 shi4 gong1 zuo4
Translation: You may also find that reading has become more fun than work!

Chinese: 他要养活自己的七个孩子,更不必说还有妻子和父母了
Pinyin: ta1 yao4 yang3 huo zi4 ji3 de qi1 ge4 hai2 zi geng4 bu4 bi4 shuo1 hai2 you3 qi1 zi huo4 fu4 mu3 le
Translation: He had to support his seven children, to say nothing of his wife and parents.

Chinese: 亿万人的收入增加了,这是他们自己做梦也想不到的
Pinyin: yi4 wan4 ren2 de shou1 ru4 zeng1 jia1 le zhe4 shi4 ta1 men zi4 ji3 zuo4 meng4 ye3 xiang3 bu4 dao4 de
Translation: Incomes of millions upon millions of people have increased beyond their dreams.

Chinese: 就翻译训练而言我认为这是一本无出其右的好书
Pinyin: jiu4 fan1 yi4 xun4 lian4 er2 yan2 wo3 ren4 wei2 zhe4 shi4 yi1 ben3 wu2 chu1 qi2 you4 de hao4 shu1
Translation: This is a book, which I dare say, is unequaled as far as translation practice is concerned.

Chinese: 东边地平线上的一道淡红光线使我知道天快要亮了
Pinyin: dong1 bian1 de ping2 xian4 shang4 de yi1 dao4 dan4 hong2 guang1 xian4 shi3 wo3 zhi1 dao4 tian1 kuai4 yao4 liang4 le
Translation: A line of pink on the eastern horizon told me that daybreak was near.

Chinese: 他们如果还顾及人的生命就不会做出这样可怕的事来
Pinyin: ta1 men ru2 guo3 huan2 gu4 ji2 ren2 de sheng1 ming4 jiu4 bu4 hui4 zuo4 chu1 zhe4 yang4 ke3 pa4 de shi4 lai2
Translation: If they had any respect for human life they wouldn't do such terrible things.

Chinese: 空难事件中有些人大难不死被新闻界广泛报导
Pinyin: kong1 nan4 shi4 jian4 zhong4 you3 xie1 ren2 da4 nan4 bu4 si3 bei4 xin1 wen2 jie4 guang3 fan4 bao4 dao3
Translation: The miraculous survival of some people in the air crash was widely reported by the press.

Chinese: 老师帮助他上完了中学,但他无法完成大学的学业
Pinyin: lao3 shi1 bang1 zhu4 ta1 shang4 wan2 le zhong1 xue2 dan4 ta1 wu2 fa3 wan2 cheng2 da4 xue2 de xue2 ye4
Translation: The teacher helped him through high school, but he couldn't cut the buck in college.

Chinese: 我们送给那个可怜的小女孩一份生日礼物作为友谊的表示
Pinyin: wo3 men song4 ji3 nei4 ge4 ke3 lian2 de xiao3 nu:3 hai2 yi1 fen4 sheng1 ri4 li3 wu4 zuo4 wei2 you3 yi4 de biao3 shi4
Translation: We sent the poor girl a birthday present in token of friendship.

Chinese: 就在这些季节里,热气团与冷气团的温差最大
Pinyin: jiu4 zai4 zhe4 xie ji4 jie2 li3 re4 qi4 tuan2 yu4 leng3 qi4 tuan2 de wen1 ci1 zui4 da4
Translation: It is during these seasons that the differences in temperature between warm and cold masses of air are greatest.

Chinese: 在我们的城市,许多社会服务仍然是有志愿团体提供的
Pinyin: zai4 wo3 men de cheng2 shi4 xu3 duo1 she4 hui4 fu2 wu4 reng2 ran2 shi4 you3 zhi4 yuan4 tuan2 ti3 ti2 gong1 de
Translation: Many social services are still provided by voluntary societies in our city.

Chinese: 当我不得不离开时,这个孩子情绪异常激动,忍不住哭了起来
Pinyin: dang4 wo3 bu4 de2 bu4 li2 kai1 shi2 zhe4 ge4 hai2 zi qing2 xu4 yi4 chang2 ji1 dong4 ren3 bu2 zhu4 ku1 le qi3 lai
Translation: The boy got very emotional when I had to leave, and started to cry.

Chinese: 第二次世界大战期间,日本政府和德国签订了一项密约
Pinyin: di4 er4 ci4 shi4 jie4 da4 zhan4 qi1 jian1 Ri4 ben3 zheng4 fu3 huo4 De2 guo2 qian1 ding4 le yi2 xiang4 mi4 yue1
Translation: The Japanese Government made a secret deal with Germany during the Second World War.

Chinese: 他放弃了一份安定的工作而自己创业,表现出了极大的勇气
Pinyin: ta1 fang4 qi4 le yi1 fen4 an1 ding4 de gong1 zuo4 er2 zi4 ji3 chuang4 ye4 biao3 xian4 chu1 le ji2 da4 de yong3 qi4
Translation: He showed a lot of pluck to leave a safe job and set up his own business.

Chinese: 我们的文艺工作者一定要完成这个任务,转变他们的立场
Pinyin: wo3 men de wen2 yi4 gong1 zuo4 zhe3 yi1 ding4 yao4 wan2 cheng2 zhe4 ge4 ren4 wu zhuan3 bian4 ta1 men de li4 chang3
Translation: Our literary and art workers must accomplish this task and shift their stand.

Chinese: 这鞋刚穿时要是有点紧没关系, 这种皮子很有延展性
Pinyin: zhe4 xie2 gang1 chuan1 shi2 yao4 shi4 you3 dian3 jin3 mo4 guan1 xi zhe4 zhong3 pi2 zi hen3 you3 yan2 zhan3 xing4!
Translation: "Don't worry if the shoes seem a bit tight at first; the leather has plenty of give in it."

Chinese: 因为缺乏一名运动员我们只好叫这个小男孩做我们的队员
Pinyin: yin1 wei4 que1 fa2 yi1 ming2 yun4 dong4 yuan2 wo3 men zhi3 hao3 jiao4 zhe4 ge4 xiao3 nan2 hai2 zuo4 wo3 men de dui4 yuan2
Translation: In the default of one player we have to take the little boy as our team member.

Chinese: 我认为你最后的那个论点是在转移目标,以便我们忘掉要点
Pinyin: wo3 ren4 wei2 ni3 zui4 hou4 de nei4 ge4 lun4 dian3 shi4 zai4 zhuan3 yi2 mu4 biao1 yi3 bian4 wo3 men wang4 diao4 yao4 dian3
Translation: I think your last argument was a diversion to make us forget the main point.

Chinese: 我们还以为那是最坏的情况呢,可没想到更糟的还在后面
Pinyin: wo3 men huan2 yi3 wei2 na4 shi4 zui4 huai4 de qing2 kuang4 ne ke3 mo4 xiang3 dao4 geng4 zao1 de huan2 zai4 hou4 mian4
Translation: We thought that the situation was as bad as it could be, but worse was to follow.

Chinese: 会议可能要延长到夜里,因为今晚有太多问题要解决
Pinyin: hui4 yi4 ke3 neng2 yao4 yan2 chang2 dao4 ye4 li3 yin1 wei4 jin1 wan3 you3 tai4 duo1 wen4 ti2 yao4 jie3 jue2
Translation: The meeting may be prolonged into the evening because so many problems have to be solved tonight.

Chinese: 他很有天分,但对选择的工作该怎样处理,他仍得好好学习
Pinyin: ta1 hen3 you3 tian1 fen4 dan4 dui4 xuan3 ze2 de gong1 zuo4 gai1 zen3 yang4 chu3 li3 ta1 reng2 de hao3 hao3 xue2 xi2
Translation: He has natural ability, but has yet to learn the mechanics of his chosen work.

Chinese: 同样的问题人们向他问得太多了,所以他的答案也是千篇一律
Pinyin: tong2 yang4 de wen4 ti2 ren2 men xiang4 ta1 wen4 de tai4 duo1 le suo3 yi3 ta1 de da2 an4 ye3 shi4 qian1 pian1 yi1 lu:4
Translation: He was asked the same question so many times that the answer became mechanical.

Chinese: 你要是英语讲得不好,找工作时就会处于非常不利的地位
Pinyin: ni3 yao4 shi4 Ying1 yu3 jiang3 de bu4 hao3 zhao3 gong1 zuo4 shi2 jiu4 kuai4 chu3 yu2 fei1 chang2 bu4 li4 de di4 wei4
Translation: If you don't speak good English, you'll be at a big disadvantage when you try to get a job.

Chinese: 我们都要做好自己工作,并且要在工作中找到精神上的乐趣
Pinyin: wo3 men dou1 yao4 zuo4 hao4 zi4 ji3 gong1 zuo4 bing4 qie3 yao4 zai4 gong1 zuo4 zhong4 zhao3 dao4 jing1 shen2 shang4 de le4 qu4
Translation: We must cultivate our own garden and find the joy of doing it in our own heart.

Chinese: 如果老师连如此简单的问题都不能回答, 他会在学生面前丢脸的
Pinyin: ru2 guo3 lao3 shi1 lian2 ru2 ci3 jian3 dan1 de wen4 ti2 dou1 bu4 neng2 hui2 da2 ta1 kuai4 zai4 xue2 sheng mian4 qian2 diu1 lian3 de
Translation: If a teacher can't answer this simple question, he'll lose face with his class.

Chinese: 他忍受对自己人品的攻击而不发火,表现出巨大的自我控制能力
Pinyin: ta1 ren3 shou4 dui4 zi4 ji3 ren2 pin3 de gong1 ji1 er2 bu4 fa1 huo3 biao3 xian4 chu1 ju4 da4 de zi4 wo3 kong4 zhi4 neng2 li4
Translation: He showed great moderation in not responding angrily to the attacks on his character.

Chinese: 虽然很多人反对他的计划,他仍能巧妙地设法使它最后获得通过
Pinyin: sui1 ran2 hen3 duo1 ren2 fan3 dui4 ta1 de ji4 hua4 ta1 reng2 neng2 qiao3 miao4 de she4 fa3 shi3 ta1 zui4 hou4 huo4 de2 tong1 guo4
Translation: Although many people opposed his plan, he engineered it through to final approval.

Chinese: 沿海地区的冬天天气暖和,可是相比之下中部平原却异常寒冷
Pinyin: yan2 hai3 di4 qu1 de dong1 tian1 tian1 qi4 nuan3 huo2 ke3 shi4 xiang1 bi3 zhi1 xia4 zhong1 bu4 ping2 yuan2 que4 yi4 chang2 han2 leng3
Translation: The coastal areas have mild winters, but by contrast the central plains become extremely cold.

Chinese: 在西方极乐世界,大夫们比我们当将军的可能还要负更多人命之责吧
Pinyin: zai4 xi1 fang1 ji2 yue4 shi4 jie4 dai4 fu men bi4 wo3 men dang4 jiang1 jun1 de ke3 neng2 huan2 yao4 fu4 geng4 duo1 ren2 ming4 zhi1 ze2 ba
Translation: Doctor will have more lives to answer for in the next world than even we generals.

Chinese: 我在街上遇到她,可是当我向她微笑时,她却连招呼都没有向我打一个
Pinyin: wo3 zai4 jie1 shang4 yu4 dao4 ta1 ke3 shi4 dang4 wo3 xiang4 ta1 wei1 xiao4 shi2 ta1 que4 lian2 zhao1 hu dou1 mei2 you3 xiang4 wo3 da3 yi1 ge4
Translation: I passed her in the street but she didn't even acknowledge me when I smiled.

Chinese: 现在就想回去,为了冷却他那急切的心,暂把他送到法国的哥哥家中
Pinyin: xian4 zai4 jiu4 xiang3 hui2 qu wei4 le leng3 que4 ta1 na4 ji2 qie4 de xin1 zan4 ba3 ta1 song4 dao4 fa3 guo2 de ge1 ge jia1 zhong4
Translation: Now he wanted to go back, but to damp down the urge he was sent to his brother's home in France.

Chinese: 他向新闻记者讲了这次谈话的情况,却不愿把实况录音磁带放给他们听
Pinyin: ta1 xiang4 xin1 wen2 ji4 zhe3 jiang3 le zhe4 ci4 tan2 hua4 de qing2 kuang4 que4 bu4 yuan4 ba3 shi2 kuang4 lu4 yin1 ci2 dai4 fang4 ji3 ta1 men ting4
Translation: He told the newspapermen about the conversation, but would not play them the actual tape of it.

Chinese: 随着逐渐成熟,许多年轻的激进分子对 生活和社会渐持较为宽容的态度
Pinyin: sui2 zhe zhu2 jian4 cheng2 shu2 xu3 duo1 nian2 qing1 de ji1 jin4 fen4 zi3 dui4 sheng1 huo2 huo4 she4 hui4 jian4 chi2 jiao4 wei4 kuan1 rong2 de tai4 du
Translation: As they mature, many young radicals mellow into a more tolerant attitude towards life and society.

Chinese: 议会开会的第一天,新政府中的一位部长就和反对党的一位议员争论起来
Pinyin: yi4 hui4 kai1 hui4 de di4 yi1 tian1 xin1 zheng4 fu3 zhong4 di4 yi1 wei4 bu4 zhang3 jiu4 huo4 fan3 dui4 dang3 de yi1 wei4 yi4 yuan2 zheng1 lun4 qi3 lai
Translation: A minister in the new government crossed swords with a member of the Opposition on the first day after Parliament opened.

Chinese: 音乐学生学习给一个现有的调子配上其他音部,还要学习怎样转成和声调
Pinyin: yin1 yue4 xue2 sheng1 xue2 xi2 ji3 yi1 ge4 xian4 you3 de diao4 zi3 pei4 shang4 qi2 ta1 yin1 bu4 huan2 yao4 xue2 xi2 zen3 yang4 zhuan4 cheng2 he2 sheng1 tiao2
Translation: Music students learn how to add other parts to add other parts to a given tune, and how to modulate to a related key.

Chinese: 我浑身疼痛
Pinyin: wo3 hun2 shen1 teng2 tong4
Translation: I ache all over.

Chinese: 饥饿引起犯罪
Pinyin: ji1 e4 yin3 qi3 fan4 zui4
Translation: Hunger begets crime.

Chinese: 车子毁了一半
Pinyin: ju1 zi hui3 le yi1 ban4
Translation: Half the car was damaged.

Chinese: 黑天鹅很稀有
Pinyin: Hei1 tian1 e2 hen3 xi1 you3
Translation: A black swan is rare.

Chinese: 哦,也许我错了
Pinyin: o2 ye3 xu3 wo3 cuo4 le
Translation: Oh, maybe I was wrong.

Chinese: 不要践踏草地
Pinyin: bu4 yao4 jian4 ta4 cao3 di4
Translation: Don't trample on the grass.

Chinese: 他在雪中漫步
Pinyin: ta1 zai4 xue3 zhong4 man2 bu4
Translation: He is walking amidst the snow.

Chinese: 他被罚款200美元
Pinyin: ta1 bei4 fa2 kua3n002 mei3 yuan2
Translation: He was fined 200 dollars.

Chinese: 我们忠于祖国
Pinyin: wo3 men zhong1 yu2 zu3 guo2
Translation: We are loyal to our motherland.

Chinese: 他渴望拥有权力
Pinyin: ta1 ke3 wang4 yong1 you3 quan2 li4
Translation: He was thirsty for power.

Chinese: 瓶上标明有毒
Pinyin: ping2 shang4 biao1 ming2 you3 du2
Translation: The bottle is labeled poison.

Chinese: 他擦去铅笔的痕迹
Pinyin: ta1 ca1 qu4 qian1 bi3 de hen2 ji1
Translation: He erases pencil marks.

Chinese: 人生幸福易逝
Pinyin: ren2 sheng1 xing4 fu2 yi4 shi4
Translation: Human happiness is so fragile.

Chinese: 吵闹声使他烦躁
Pinyin: chao3 nao4 sheng1 shi3 ta1 fan2 zao4
Translation: The loud noise chafed him.

Chinese: 青蛙跳进了沟里
Pinyin: qing1 wa1 tiao4 jin4 le gou1 li3

Chinese: 父辈应当被尊重
Pinyin: fu4 bei4 ying1 dang1 bei4 zun1 zhong4
Translation: A sire should be respected.

Chinese: 真是倒霉的日子
Pinyin: zhen1 shi4 dao3 mei2 de ri4 zi
Translation: It's just been one of those days.

Chinese: 她把孩子抱在怀里
Pinyin: ta1 ba3 hai2 zi bao4 zai4 huai2 li3!
Translation: She nestled the baby in her arms.

Chinese: 她匆匆赶往机场
Pinyin: ta1 cong1 cong1 gan3 wang4 ji1 chang3
Translation: She hurried to the airport.

Chinese: 她一辈子搞戏剧
Pinyin: ta1 yi1 bei4 zi gao3 xi4 ju4
Translation: She is been in the theater all her life.

Chinese: 我喜欢戴银首饰
Pinyin: wo3 xi3 huan dai4 yin2 shou3 shi4
Translation: I like to wear argentine jewellery.

Chinese: 爱情不分贫富
Pinyin: ai4 qing2 bu4 fen1 pin2 fu4
Translation: Love lives in cottages as well as in courts.

Chinese: 他被一头野猪袭击
Pinyin: ta1 bei4 yi1 tou2 ye3 zhu1 xi2 ji1
Translation: He was attacked by a wild boar.

Chinese: 他被他的老板解雇了
Pinyin: ta1 bei4 ta1 de lao3 ban3 jie3 gu4 le
Translation: He was fired by his boss.

Chinese: 炮兵部署在西边
Pinyin: pao4 bing1 bu4 shu3 zai4 xi1 bian1!
Translation: Artillery was deployed in the west.

Chinese: 有炸鸡肉作晚餐
Pinyin: you3 zha4 ji1 rou4 zuo4 wan3 can1
Translation: There was fried chicken for dinner.

Chinese: 他们衷心欢迎他
Pinyin: ta1 men zhong1 xin1 huan1 ying2 ta1
Translation: They gave him a hearty welcome.

Chinese: 金属遇热则膨胀
Pinyin: jin1 shu3 yu4 re4 ze2 peng2 zhang4
Translation: Metals expand when they are heated.

Chinese: 我们在黑暗中摸索
Pinyin: wo3 men zai4 hei1 an4 zhong4 mo1 suo
Translation: We groped amid the darkness.

Chinese: 我只耽搁你几分钟
Pinyin: wo3 zhi3 dan1 ge ni3 ji3 fen1 zhong1
Translation: I'll only keep you a few minutes.

Chinese: 那不是很恰当的话
Pinyin: na4 bu2 shi4 hen3 qia4 dang4 de hua4
Translation: That was not a very happy remark.

Chinese: 熊猫是珍贵的动物
Pinyin: xiong2 mao1 shi4 zhen1 gui4 de dong4 wu4
Translation: Pandas are precious creatures.

Chinese: 鸽子是和平的象征
Pinyin: ge1 zi3 shi4 he2 ping2 de xiang4 zheng1
Translation: The dove is the symbol of peace.

Chinese: 我们宁死而不投降
Pinyin: wo3 men ning2 si3 er2 bu4 tou2 xiang2
Translation: We would rather die than surrender.

Chinese: 我把赚的钱都花光了
Pinyin: wo3 ba3 zuan4 de qian2 dou1 hua1 guang1 le
Translation: I've spent all my earnings.

Chinese: 他欣然接受了我的报价
Pinyin: ta1 xin1 ran2 jie1 shou4 le wo3 de bao4 jia4
Translation: He pounced on my offer.

Chinese: 码头工人开始卸货
Pinyin: ma3 tou2 gong1 ren2 kai1 shi3 xie4 huo4
Translation: Dockers started unloading the ship.

Chinese: 小孩有柔软的身体
Pinyin: xiao3 hai2 you3 rou2 ruan3 de shen1 ti3
Translation: Little babies have lithe bodies.

Chinese: 植物因缺水而枯死了
Pinyin: zhi2 wu4 yin1 que1 shui3 er2 ku1 si3 le
Translation: The plant died for lack of water.

Chinese: 她讲了一辈子中文
Pinyin: ta1 jiang3 le yi1 bei4 zi Zhong1 wen2
Translation: She has spoken Chinese all her life.

Chinese: 饲养员正在喂动物
Pinyin: si4 yang3 yuan2 zheng4 zai4 wei4 dong4 wu4
Translation: The keeper is feeding the animals.

Chinese: 鼓声平稳而缓慢
Pinyin: gu3 sheng1 ping2 wen3 er2 huan3 man4
Translation: The beats of the drum were steady and slow.

Chinese: 他妨碍我把工作做好
Pinyin: ta1 fang2 ai4 wo3 ba3 gong1 zuo4 zuo4 hao4
Translation: He impedes me to do the job well.

Chinese: 他的画在画廊展出
Pinyin: ta1 de hua4 zai4 hua4 lang2 zhan3 chu1
Translation: His pictures were showed in the gallery.

Chinese: 我们昨晚畅饮了一次酒
Pinyin: wo3 men zuo2 wan3 chang4 yin3 le yi1 ci4 jiu3
Translation: We quaffed wine last night.

Chinese: 我上个月瘦了好几磅
Pinyin: wo3 shang4 ge4 yue4 shou4 le hao3 ji3 bang4
Translation: I lost several pounds last month.

Chinese: 小女孩在河里淹死了
Pinyin: xiao3 nu:3 hai2 zai4 he2 li3 yan1 si3 le
Translation: The little girl drowned in the river.

Chinese: 他的经验缓慢地成熟
Pinyin: ta1 de jing1 yan4 huan3 man4 de cheng2 shu2
Translation: His experience has a slow maturity.

Chinese: 汽车停止时震动了一下
Pinyin: qi4 che1 ting2 zhi3 shi2 zhen4 dong4 le yi1 xia4
Translation: The car stopped with a jolt.

Chinese: 镜头转换到一座坟墓

Chinese: 她挣扎著想摆脱那个侵犯她的人
Pinyin: ta1 zheng1 zha著2 xiang3 bai3 tuo1 nei4 ge4 qin1 fan4 ta1 de ren2!
Translation: She struggled to get away from her attacker.

Chinese: 他过去的经历笼罩着神秘气氛
Pinyin: ta1 guo4 qu de jing1 li4 long3 zhao4 zhuo2 shen2 mi4 qi4 fen1
Translation: His past is enveloped in a shroud of mystery.

Chinese: 别那么敏感,我不是在批评你
Pinyin: bie4 na4 me min3 gan3 wo3 bu2 shi4 zai4 pi1 ping2 ni3
Translation: Don't be so sensitive - I was not criticizing you.

Chinese: 我在夏天一个闷热的下午遇见了她
Pinyin: wo3 zai4 xia4 tian1 yi1 ge4 men1 re4 de xia4 wu3 yu4 jian4 le ta1
Translation: I met her in a sultry summer afternoon.

Chinese: 咱们来把它们用胶水粘在一块儿
Pinyin: zan2 men lai2 ba3 ta1 men yong4 jiao1 shui3 zhan1 zai4 yi1 kuai4 er

Chinese: 获得冠军的那个弓箭手很年轻
Pinyin: huo4 de2 guan4 jun1 de nei4 ge4 gong1 jian4 shou3 hen3 nian2 qing1
Translation: The archer who won the game is very young.

Chinese: 政府将派军驻守沿海的城镇
Pinyin: zheng4 fu3 jiang4 pai4 jun1 zhu4 shou3 yan2 hai3 de cheng2 zhen4

Chinese: 这种建筑风格让我感到很压抑
Pinyin: zhe4 zhong3 jian4 zhu4 feng1 ge2 rang4 wo3 gan3 dao4 hen3 ya1 yi4

Chinese: 一群人聚拢起来看发生了什么事
Pinyin: yi1 qun2 ren2 ju4 long3 qi3 lai kan4 fa1 sheng1 le shen2 me shi4
Translation: A crowd gathered to see what had happened.

Chinese: 我见希尔夫人面熟, 但并不相识
Pinyin: wo3 xian4 xi1 er3 fu1 ren mian4 shu2 dan4 bing4 bu4 xiang1 shi2!
Translation: I know Mrs. Hill by sight, but we've never met.

Chinese: 男性在身体上要比女性强壮
Pinyin: nan2 xing4 zai4 shen1 ti3 shang4 yao4 bi4 nu:3 xing4 qiang2 zhuang4

Chinese: 我们明天必须离开,真是遗憾
Pinyin: wo3 men ming2 tian1 bi4 xu1 li2 kai1 zhen1 shi4 yi2 han4
Translation: It is a pity that we shall have to leave tomorrow.

Chinese: 她所有的钱都投放到股票里去了
Pinyin: ta1 suo3 you3 de qian2 dou1 tou2 fang4 dao4 gu3 piao4 li3 qu4 le
Translation: She's got all her money in stocks and shares.

Chinese: 他用蒸汽把信封上的邮票揭下来
Pinyin: ta1 yong4 zheng1 qi4 ba3 xin4 feng1 shang4 de you2 piao4 jie1 xia lai

Chinese: 猎人守候着兔子从洞里出来
Pinyin: lie4 ren2 shou3 hou4 zhuo2 tu4 zi zong4 dong4 li3 chu1 lai

Chinese: 听到这个消息,他惊讶得张口结舌
Pinyin: ting1 dao4 zhe4 ge4 xiao1 xi ta1 jing1 ya4 de zhang1 kou3 jie2 she2
Translation: On hearing the news, his jaw dropped.

Chinese: 那次宴会上有大量饮料供应
Pinyin: na4 ci4 yan4 hui4 shang4 you3 da4 liang4 yin3 liao4 gong1 ying4

Chinese: 别忘了仔细记下你的开支帐目
Pinyin: bie4 wang4 le zi3 xi4 ji4 xia4 ni3 de kai1 zhi1 zhang4 mu4

Pinyin: cai2 zheng4 bu4 yuan2 ze2 shang4 fan3 dui4 zhe4 xie ti2 yi4
Translation: The Treasury was opposed in principle to the proposals.

Chinese: 这副马蹄铁该换了,都磨光了
Pinyin: zhe4 fu4 ma3 ti2 tie3 gai1 huan4 le dou1 mo4 guang1 le

Chinese: 他们说说笑笑,沿着海滩散步
Pinyin: ta1 men shuo1 shuo1 xiao4 xiao4 yan2 zhe hai3 tan1 san4 bu4

Chinese: 酷热使建筑物上的油漆起了浮泡
Pinyin: ku4 re4 shi3 jian4 zhu4 wu4 shang4 de you2 qi1 qi3 le fu2 pao4

Pinyin: jia4 shi3 jiao4 lian4 rang4 wo3 zai4 you2 ju2 ting2 che1

Chinese: 离婚以后,孩子由父亲监护
Pinyin: li2 hun1 yi3 hou4 hai2 zi you2 fu4 qin1 jian1 hu4
Translation: After their divorce, the father was awarded custody of the son.

Chinese: 他对旅行作了十分生动的叙述
Pinyin: ta1 dui4 lu:3 xing2 zuo4 le shi2 fen1 sheng1 dong4 de xu4 shu4

Chinese: 你妈妈是个乐呵呵的容易相处的人
Pinyin: ni3 ma1 ma shi4 ge4 yue4 he1 he1 de rong2 yi4 xiang1 chu3 de ren2
Translation: Your mother is a jolly, easy-going woman.

Chinese: 碰巧在附近有个公用电话亭
Pinyin: peng4 qiao3 zai4 fu4 jin4 you3 ge4 gong1 yong4 dian4 hua4 ting2

Chinese: 他关上了灯,室内一片漆黑
Pinyin: ta1 guan1 shang4 le deng1 shi4 nei4 yi1 pian4 qi1 hei1

Chinese: 我若还清所有欠债就分文不剩了
Pinyin: wo3 ruo4 huan2 qing1 suo3 you3 qian4 zhai4 jiu4 fen4 wen2 bu4 sheng4 le!
Translation: If I pay all my debts I'll have no money left.

Chinese: 他们坐在凉亭里,边喝茶边聊天
Pinyin: ta1 men zuo4 zai4 liang2 ting2 li3 bian1 he4 cha2 bian1 liao2 tian1
Translation: They sat in the arbor and chatted over tea.

Chinese: 昨天的这个时候正刮着狂风
Pinyin: zuo2 tian1 de zhe4 ge4 shi2 hou zheng4 gua1 zhuo2 kuang2 feng1

Chinese: 大雪妨碍了这项建筑工程的进行
Pinyin: da4 xue3 fang2 ai4 le zhe4 xiang4 jian4 zhu4 gong1 cheng2 de jin4 xing2

Chinese: 她如饥似渴地收集一切有关的信息
Pinyin: ta1 ru2 ji1 si4 ke3 de shou1 ji2 yi1 qie4 you3 guan1 de xin4 xi1
Translation: She gobbled up all the relevant information.

Chinese: 去年这个镇已有十起破产事件
Pinyin: qu4 nian2 zhe4 ge4 zhen4 yi3 you3 shi2 qi3 po4 chan3 shi4 jian4
Translation: Ten bankruptcies were recorded in this town last year.

Chinese: 暴风给成千上万的人带来灾难
Pinyin: bao4 feng1 ji3 cheng2 qian1 shang4 wan4 de ren2 dai4 lai2 zai1 nan4
Translation: The cyclone brought misery to thousands of people.

Chinese: 打完电话后,请把听筒放回原位
Pinyin: da3 wan2 dian4 hua4 hou4 qing3 ba3 ting4 tong3 fang4 hui2 yuan2 wei4

Chinese: 我们有可能从这片浅滩过河
Pinyin: wo3 men you3 ke3 neng2 zong4 zhe4 pian4 qian3 tan1 guo4 he2

Chinese: 这期的周刊上有一篇有趣的文章
Pinyin: zhe4 qi1 de zhou1 kan1 shang4 you3 yi1 pian1 you3 qu4 de wen2 zhang1

Chinese: 智能并不像品性那样有影响
Pinyin: zhi4 neng2 bing4 bu4 xiang4 pin3 xing4 na4 yang4 you3 ying3 xiang3

Chinese: 一些人反对说,新税法不公平
Pinyin: yi1 xie1 ren2 fan3 dui4 shuo1 xin1 shui4 fa3 bu4 gong1 ping2
Translation: Some people objected that the new tax law was unfair.

Chinese: 在新政权下,事情将会发生变化
Pinyin: zai4 xin1 zheng4 quan2 xia4 shi4 qing jiang1 hui4 fa1 sheng1 bian4 hua4

Chinese: 在这个陌生的地方,我觉得很不自在
Pinyin: zai4 zhe4 ge4 mo4 sheng1 de di4 fang wo3 jue2 de hen3 bu4 zi4 zai4

Chinese: 不断增加的失业引起了社会骚乱
Pinyin: bu4 duan4 zeng1 jia1 de shi1 ye4 yin3 qi3 le she4 hui4 sao1 luan4

Chinese: 听到这个坏消息,他心里充满恐怖
Pinyin: ting1 dao4 zhe4 ge4 huai4 xiao1 xi ta1 xin1 li3 chong1 man3 kong3 bu4

Pinyin: bu4 duan4 fa1 zhan3 de jing1 ji4 shi3 nong2 min2 men fu4 yu4 qi3 lai

Pinyin: wo3 ren4 wei2 wo3 huo4 wo3 nu:3 er2 zhi1 jian1 mei2 you3 ge2 he2

Pinyin: zhe4 xie shi4 wen2 yi4 fu4 xing1 shi2 qi1 de wen2 hua4 yi2 chan3

Chinese: 我们点燃了蜡烛,蜡烛照亮了房间
Pinyin: wo3 men dian3 ran2 le la4 zhu2 la4 zhu2 zhao4 liang4 le fang2 jian1

Chinese: 向公司索取退款手续很复杂
Pinyin: xiang4 gong1 si1 suo3 qu3 tui4 kuan3 shou3 xu4 hen3 fu4 za2

Pinyin: ta1 de guan1 yu2 zhong3 zu2 ge2 li2 de tan2 hua4 ji1 qi3 le sao1 dong4

Chinese: 他们俩在公园的长凳上拥抱亲吻

Pinyin: yi4 hui4 jiang4 zai4 xia4 zhou1 bian4 lun4 guo2 you3 hua4 yi4 ti2

Chinese: 我是在教堂的门廊处遇到那个人的
Pinyin: wo3 shi4 zai4 jiao4 tang2 de men2 lang2 chu4 yu4 dao4 nei4 ge4 ren2 de

Chinese: 他们宁愿去钓鱼,也不愿待在家里

Pinyin: xin1 de shui4 shou1 zhi4 du4 jiang4 yu2 ming2 nian2 shi2 xing2

Chinese: 他有才干能在本行业中首屈一指
Pinyin: ta1 you3 cai2 gan4 neng2 zai4 ben3 hang2 ye4 zhong4 shou3 qu1 yi1 zhi3

Pinyin: ta1 wei4 shen2 me dao4 na4 li qu4 zhe4 dui4 wo3 lai2 shuo1 shi4 ge4 mi2

Pinyin: ta1 bu4 ting4 mu3 qin1 de quan4 gao4 can1 jia1 le na4 ci4 ju4 hui4

Pinyin: Sheng4 dan4 jie2 shi4 Ji1 du1 jiao4 tu2 de yi1 ge4 zhong4 yao4 jie2 ri4

Chinese: 他将作为伟大的政治家而载入史册
Pinyin: ta1 jiang4 zuo4 wei2 wei3 da4 de zheng4 zhi4 jia1 er2 zai3 ru4 shi3 ce4

Pinyin: ta1 zai4 mi4 xi1 xi1 bi4 he2 liu2 yu4 yong1 you3 yi1 ge4 da4 nong2 chang3

Chinese: 他以两杆的成绩赢得了这场高尔夫球赛
Pinyin: ta1 yi3 liang3 gan3 de cheng2 ji1 ying2 de2 le zhe4 chang3 gao1 er3 fu1 qiu2 sai4

Chinese: 听音乐对她起了一种镇静的作用
Pinyin: ting4 yin1 yue4 dui4 ta1 qi3 le yi1 zhong4 zhen4 jing4 de zuo4 yong4

Pinyin: da4 qun2 ren2 ju4 ji2 zai4 zhan3 lan3 da4 ting1 de men2 kou3

Chinese: 海关人员问我是否有要报税的东西
Pinyin: hai3 guan1 ren2 yuan2 wen4 wo3 shi4 fou3 you3 yao4 bao4 shui4 de dong1 xi

Chinese: 他病了很久,因此耽误了功课
Pinyin: ta1 bing4 le hen3 jiu3 yin1 ci3 dan1 wu le gong1 ke4

Chinese: 在这座陌生的城市里,她感到很寂寞
Pinyin: zai4 zhe4 zuo4 mo4 sheng1 de cheng2 shi4 li3 ta1 gan3 dao4 hen3 ji4 mo4

Chinese: 我刚才把你的一个瓷器装饰品弄掉了
Pinyin: wo3 gang1 cai2 ba3 ni3 de yi1 ge4 ci2 qi4 zhuang1 shi4 pin3 nong4 diao4 le

Pinyin: gong1 hui4 wei4 zheng1 qu3 geng4 hao3 de gong1 zuo4 tiao2 jian4 er2 ba4 gong1

Chinese: 他们要求对税收制度进行根本改革
Pinyin: ta1 men yao1 qiu2 dui4 shui4 shou1 zhi4 du4 jin4 xing2 gen1 ben3 gai3 ge2

Chinese: 除非出现奇迹, 不然我们现在是输定了
Pinyin: chu2 fei1 chu1 xian4 qi2 ji4 bu4 ran2 wo3 men xian4 zai4 shi4 shu1 ding4 le!

Chinese: 所有的申请者一个接着一个参加面试
Pinyin: suo3 you3 de shen1 qing3 zhe3 yi1 ge4 jie1 zhe yi1 ge4 can1 jia1 mian4 shi4

Chinese: 请把面粉和牛奶调至恰当的浓度
Pinyin: qing3 ba3 mian4 fen3 huo4 niu2 nai3 tiao2 zhi4 qia4 dang4 de nong2 du4

Pinyin: qun2 zhong4 ju4 ji2 zai4 guo2 wang2 yao4 jing1 guo4 de jie1 dao4 pang2

Chinese: 如果你再迟到,老板就会把你解雇
Pinyin: ru2 guo3 ni3 zai4 chi2 dao4 lao3 ban3 jiu4 kuai4 ba3 ni3 jie3 gu4

Chinese: 警方把建筑物的所有出口都封锁住了
Pinyin: jing3 fang1 ba3 jian4 zhu4 wu4 de suo3 you3 chu1 kou3 dou1 feng1 suo3 zhu4 le!

Chinese: 如果机器出故障,就把开关关掉
Pinyin: ru2 guo3 ji1 qi4 chu1 gu4 zhang4 jiu4 ba3 kai1 guan1 guan1 diao4

Chinese: 他最近去世给家庭聚会蒙上了阴影
Pinyin: ta1 zui4 jin4 qu4 shi4 ji3 jia1 ting2 ju4 hui4 meng3 shang4 le yin1 ying3

Chinese: 只留下一些被太阳晒得泛白的枯骨
Pinyin: zhi3 liu2 xia4 yi1 xie1 bei4 tai4 yang2 shai4 de fan4 bai2 de ku1 gu3
