Pinyin: mei3 zhou1 liu4 qin2 zai4 cun1 li3 de gong1 yong4 cao3 di4 shang4 qi2 ma3

Chinese: 销售经理想在远东开辟新市场
Pinyin: xiao1 shou4 jing1 li3 xiang3 zai4 yuan3 dong1 kai1 pi4 xin1 shi4 chang3

Chinese: 他呆在幕后为了避开公众的注意
Pinyin: ta1 dai1 zai4 mu4 hou4 wei4 le bi4 kai1 gong1 zhong4 de zhu4 yi4

Chinese: 那家商场的西洋梳镜柜看上去很特别
Pinyin: na4 jia1 shang1 chang3 de xi1 yang2 shu1 jing4 ju3 kan4 shang4 qu4 hen3 te4 bie2

Chinese: 这个小镇很适宜于一位青年医生安家
Pinyin: zhe4 ge4 xiao3 zhen4 hen3 shi4 yi2 yu2 yi1 wei4 qing1 nian2 yi1 sheng1 an1 jia1

Chinese: 科学家仍在寻求治疗感冒的方法
Pinyin: ke1 xue2 jia1 reng2 zai4 xun2 qiu2 zhi4 liao2 gan3 mao4 de fang1 fa3

Chinese: 我送给她一条编织的披肩作圣诞礼物
Pinyin: wo3 song4 ji3 ta1 yi1 tiao2 bian1 zhi1 de pi1 jian1 zuo4 Sheng4 dan4 li3 wu4

Chinese: 这座城市已经把旧的电车轨道拆除了
Pinyin: zhe4 zuo4 cheng2 shi4 yi3 jing1 ba3 jiu4 de dian4 che1 gui3 dao4 chai1 chu2 le

Chinese: 他公然蔑视上司,并要求他作出解释
Pinyin: ta1 gong1 ran2 mie4 shi4 shang4 si bing4 yao1 qiu2 ta1 zuo4 chu1 jie3 shi4

Chinese: 政府力图在这个问题上保持低姿态
Pinyin: zheng4 fu3 li4 tu2 zai4 zhe4 ge4 wen4 ti2 shang4 bao3 chi2 di1 zi1 tai4

Chinese: 别把热水倒进玻璃杯里,不然它会炸的
Pinyin: bie4 ba3 re4 shui3 dao4 jin4 bo1 li bei1 li3 bu4 ran2 ta1 kuai4 zha4 de

Chinese: 我们喜欢观赏初升太阳的灿烂光辉
Pinyin: wo3 men xi3 huan guan1 shang3 chu1 sheng1 tai4 yang2 de can4 lan4 guang1 hui1

Chinese: 她太倒霉了,休假第一天就感冒了
Pinyin: ta1 tai4 dao3 mei2 le xiu1 jia4 di4 yi1 tian1 jiu4 gan3 mao4 le
Translation: She was unlucky to catch a cold on the first day of her holiday.

Chinese: 整顿饭都很好, 尤其是葡萄酒更好
Pinyin: zheng3 dun4 fan4 dou1 hen3 hao3 you2 qi2 shi4 pu2 tao jiu3 geng4 hao3!

Chinese: 听到朋友死亡的消息,她难过地哭了
Pinyin: ting1 dao4 peng2 you si3 wang2 de xiao1 xi ta1 nan2 guo4 de ku1 le
Translation: She cried with grief when she heard news of her friend's death.

Chinese: 史密斯教授曾做过总统的特别顾问
Pinyin: shi3 mi4 si1 jiao4 shou4 zeng1 zuo4 guo4 zong3 tong3 de te4 bie2 gu4 wen4
Translation: Professor Smith served as special adviser to the President.

Chinese: 人类是在幼年开始学习第一种语言的
Pinyin: ren2 lei4 shi4 zai4 you4 nian2 kai1 shi3 xue2 xi2 di4 yi1 zhong4 yu3 yan2 de
Translation: Mankind learns its first language in early childhood.

Chinese: 史密斯先生在政府的行政部门工作
Pinyin: shi3 mi4 si1 xian1 sheng zai4 zheng4 fu3 de xing2 zheng4 bu4 men2 gong1 zuo4
Translation: Mr!###Smith works in an executive branch of the government.

Chinese: 这家公司必须克服对采用新技术的阻力
Pinyin: zhe4 jia1 gong1 si1 bi4 xu1 ke4 fu2 dui4 cai3 yong4 xin1 ji4 shu4 de zu3 li4!
Translation: The firm has to overcome its resistance to new technology.

Chinese: 偶然的相遇使两位老朋友重新聚首
Pinyin: ou3 ran2 de xiang1 yu4 shi3 liang3 wei4 lao3 peng2 you chong2 xin1 ju4 shou3
Translation: A chance meeting brought the two old friends together again.

Chinese: 咱们索性把蛋糕吃完吧, 也没剩多少了
Pinyin: zan2 men suo3 xing4 ba3 dan4 gao1 chi1 wan2 ba ye3 mo4 sheng4 duo1 shao le!
Translation: "We might as well finish (up) the cake; there isn't much left."

Chinese: 我希望他成为钢琴家的梦想可以成真
Pinyin: wo3 xi1 wang4 ta1 cheng2 wei2 gang1 qin2 jia1 de meng4 xiang3 ke3 yi3 cheng2 zhen1
Translation: I hope his dream of becoming a pianist will come true.

Chinese: 雇用了没参加工会的工人以结束罢工行动
Pinyin: gu4 yong4 le mo4 can1 jia1 gong1 hui4 de gong1 ren2 yi3 jie2 shu4 ba4 gong1 xing2 dong4!
Translation: Non-union labor was used to end the strike.

Chinese: 在重要的节日, 人们把国旗悬挂在门外
Pinyin: zai4 zhong4 yao4 de jie2 ri4 ren2 men ba3 guo2 qi2 xuan2 gua4 zai4 men2 wai4
Translation: People hang national flags out on important holidays.

Chinese: 基督派基督十二使徒之一宣传他的教义
Pinyin: Ji1 du1 pai4 Ji1 du1 shi2 er4 shi3 tu2 zhi1 yi1 xuan1 chuan2 ta1 de jiao4 yi4
Translation: Apostles were sent out by Christ to spread his teachings.

Chinese: 从资料库借磁带是退而求其次的办法
Pinyin: zong4 zi1 liao4 ku4 jie4 ci2 dai4 shi4 tui4 er2 qiu2 qi2 ci4 de ban4 fa3
Translation: Borrowing tapes from the library would be the next-best thing.

Chinese: 在这场足球赛中,他主罚,踢进了一个球
Pinyin: zai4 zhe4 chang3 zu2 qiu2 sai4 zhong4 ta1 zhu3 fa2 ti1 jin4 le yi1 ge4 qiu2
Translation: He kicked a penalty goal in the football match.

Chinese: 他被家庭束缚,不能再到处去旅游了
Pinyin: ta1 bei4 jia1 ting2 shu4 fu4 bu4 neng2 zai4 dao4 chu4 qu4 lu:3 you2 le
Translation: He was fettered by his family and could not travel any longer.

Chinese: 许多人都相信监禁解决不了犯罪问题
Pinyin: xu3 duo1 ren2 dou1 xiang1 xin4 jian1 jin4 jie3 jue2 bu4 liao3 fan4 zui4 wen4 ti2
Translation: Many people believe that prison isn't a cure for crime.

Chinese: 我们已经收到了对该节目的一连串投诉
Pinyin: wo3 men yi3 jing1 shou1 dao4 le dui4 gai1 jie2 mu4 de yi1 lian2 chuan4 tou2 su4
Translation: We have had a string of complaints about the program.

Chinese: 犯人从大门口的警卫身旁溜过逃走了
Pinyin: fan4 ren2 zong4 da4 men2 kou3 de jing3 wei4 shen1 pang2 liu1 guo4 tao2 zou3 le!
Translation: The prisoner slipped past the guards on the gate and escaped.

Chinese: 那项发现在科学界引起极大的震动
Pinyin: na4 xiang4 fa1 xian4 zai4 ke1 xue2 jie4 yin3 qi3 ji2 da4 de zhen4 dong4
Translation: The discovery caused a tremendous commotion in the scientific world.

Chinese: 那个寄居者在威尔士已经逗留了两个星期
Pinyin: nei4 ge4 ji4 ju1 zhe3 zai4 wei1 er3 shi4 yi3 jing1 dou4 liu2 le liang3 ge4 xing1 qi1
Translation: The sojourner has been in Wales for two weeks.

Chinese: 无轨电车的电能是通过架空线供给的
Pinyin: wu2 gui3 dian4 che1 de dian4 neng2 shi4 tong1 guo4 jia4 kong4 xian4 gong1 gei3 de
Translation: The trolley bus picks up current from an overhead wire.

Chinese: 有些罪犯被释放后有可能重新犯罪
Pinyin: you3 xie1 zui4 fan4 bei4 shi4 fang4 hou4 you3 ke3 neng2 chong2 xin1 fan4 zui4
Translation: Some criminals are likely to offend again when they are released.

Chinese: 勉强他做事不是教育孩子的办法
Pinyin: mian3 qiang3 ta1 zuo4 shi4 bu2 shi4 jiao4 yu4 hai2 zi de ban4 fa3
Translation: It is not the way to educate a child by making him do things against his will.

Chinese: 教士那圆润低沉的声音在教堂里回响
Pinyin: jiao4 shi4 na4 yuan2 run4 di1 chen2 de sheng1 yin1 zai4 jiao4 tang2 li3 hui2 xiang3
Translation: The sonorous voice of the priest resounded in the church.

Chinese: 财务上出现问题延误了我们的建设计画
Pinyin: cai2 wu4 shang4 chu1 xian4 wen4 ti2 yan2 wu4 le wo3 men de jian4 she4 ji4 hua4
Translation: Financial problems have set back our building program.

Chinese: 这个学生敏捷的回答得到了老师的表扬
Pinyin: zhe4 ge4 xue2 sheng min3 jie2 de hui2 da2 de2 dao4 le lao3 shi1 de biao3 yang2
Translation: The student's speedy answers were praised by the teacher.

Chinese: 他们跟她开玩笑, 把她往游泳池里浸了一下
Pinyin: ta1 men gen1 ta1 kai1 wan2 xiao4 ba3 ta1 wang4 you2 yong3 chi2 li3 jin4 le yi1 xia4!
Translation: They dunked her in the swimming-pool as a joke.

Chinese: 他申请出国签证经历了很大的困难
Pinyin: ta1 shen1 qing3 chu1 guo2 qian1 zheng4 jing1 li4 le hen3 da4 de kun4 nan
Translation: He experienced great difficulty in getting a visa to leave the country.

Chinese: 这个勤奋的学生每天天亮以前就起床了
Pinyin: zhe4 ge4 qin2 fen4 de xue2 sheng mei3 tian1 tian1 liang4 yi3 qian2 jiu4 qi3 chuang2 le
Translation: The diligent student gets up before dawn every day.

Chinese: 我大声打了个呵欠,可他还是不停地讲下去
Pinyin: wo3 da4 sheng1 da3 le ge4 he1 qian4 ke3 ta1 hai2 shi4 bu4 ting2 de jiang3 xia4 qu
Translation: I gave a loud yawn, but he just kept on talking.

Chinese: 该足球队员向旁边跨步以避开对方拦截动作
Pinyin: gai1 zu2 qiu2 dui4 yuan2 xiang4 pang2 bian1 kua4 bu4 yi3 bi4 kai1 dui4 fang1 lan2 jie2 dong4 zuo4!
Translation: The footballer side-stepped the tackle.

Chinese: 我在卧室里发现两只袜子, 但不成对
Pinyin: wo3 zai4 wo4 shi4 li3 fa1 xian4 liang3 zhi3 wa4 zi dan4 bu4 cheng2 dui4
Translation: I found a couple of socks in the bedroom, but they don't make a pair.

Chinese: 通过勤查字典,他掌握了这些单词
Pinyin: tong1 guo4 qin2 zha1 zi4 dian3 ta1 zhang3 wo4 le zhe4 xie dan1 ci2
Translation: He mastered these words through the arduous consultation of the dictionary.

Chinese: 精神病院常雇用男护士护理精神病人
Pinyin: jing1 shen2 bing4 yuan4 chang2 gu4 yong4 nan2 hu4 shi hu4 li3 jing1 shen2 bing4 ren2!
Translation: Male nurses are often employed in hospitals for the mentally ill.

Chinese: 你若对我们的报价感兴趣,请与我们联系
Pinyin: ni3 ruo4 dui4 wo3 men de bao4 jia4 gan3 xing4 qu qing3 yu4 wo3 men lian2 xi4
Translation: Should you be interested in our offer, please contact us.

Chinese: 发展的主要障碍是这个国家人口太多
Pinyin: fa1 zhan3 de zhu3 yao4 zhang4 ai4 shi4 zhe4 ge4 guo2 jia1 ren2 kou3 tai4 duo1
Translation: The main impediment to development is the country's large population.

Chinese: 突然窗帘拉了开来,一道强光照了进来
Pinyin: tu1 ran2 chuang1 lian2 la1 le kai1 lai2 yi1 dao4 qiang2 guang1 zhao4 le jin4 lai2
Translation: The curtain was suddenly drawn and a bright light shone in.

Chinese: 警察在小偷的家里发现了一些被盗的财物
Pinyin: jing3 cha2 zai4 xiao3 tou1 de jia1 li3 fa1 xian4 le yi1 xie1 bei4 dao4 de cai2 wu4
Translation: The police found some stolen property in the thief's house.

Chinese: 殖民地的人们拿起武器反抗英国统治者
Pinyin: zhi2 min2 di4 de ren2 men na2 qi3 wu3 qi4 fan3 kang4 Ying1 guo2 tong3 zhi4 zhe1
Translation: The colonists took up weapons to rebel against the British ruler.

Chinese: 部长就局势的最新发展作了另一番解释
Pinyin: bu4 zhang3 jiu4 ju2 shi4 de zui4 xin1 fa1 zhan3 zuo4 le ling4 yi1 pan1 jie3 shi4
Translation: The minister has put a different gloss on recent developments.

Chinese: 在日本,棒球比其他任何运动都受人欢迎
Pinyin: zai4 Ri4 ben3 bang4 qiu2 bi4 qi2 ta1 ren4 he2 yun4 dong4 dou1 shou4 ren2 huan1 ying2
Translation: Baseball is more popular than any other sport in Japan.

Chinese: 风向的突然转变预示着暴风雨即将来临
Pinyin: feng1 xiang4 de tu1 ran2 zhuan3 bian4 yu4 shi4 zhuo2 bao4 feng1 yu3 ji2 jiang1 lai2 lin2
Translation: A sudden shift in the wind warned of the coming storm.

Chinese: 政治和宗教是人们平常交谈的主要话题
Pinyin: zheng4 zhi4 huo4 zong1 jiao4 shi4 ren2 men ping2 chang2 jiao1 tan2 de zhu3 yao4 hua4 ti2
Translation: Politics and religion are daily topics of conversation.

Chinese: 他新拍摄的电影确实受到评论家严厉的批评
Pinyin: ta1 xin1 pai1 she4 de dian4 ying3 que4 shi2 shou4 dao4 ping2 lun4 jia1 yan2 li4 de pi1 ping2
Translation: His new film was really panned by the critics.

Chinese: 这名记者因为试图揭露一个阴谋而被杀害
Pinyin: zhe4 ming2 ji4 zhe3 yin1 wei4 shi4 tu2 jie1 lu4 yi1 ge4 yin1 mou2 er2 bei4 sha1 hai4
Translation: The reporter was killed because he tried to expose a plot.

Chinese: 她抬起头来,凝望着十二月份阴沉沉的天空
Pinyin: ta1 tai2 qi3 tou lai2 ning2 wang4 zhuo2 shi2 er4 yue4 fen4 yin1 chen2 chen2 de tian1 kong1
Translation: She looked up staring at the somber December sky.

Chinese: 根据解剖结果,此人死于心脏病发作
Pinyin: gen1 ju4 jie3 pou1 jie2 guo3 ci3 ren2 si3 yu2 xin1 zang4 bing4 fa1 zuo4
Translation: According to the result of the dissection, the man died from heart attack.

Chinese: 你只要一看见她的脸就会明白,她是无辜的
Pinyin: ni3 zhi3 yao4 yi1 kan4 jian4 ta1 de lian3 jiu4 kuai4 ming2 bai ta1 shi4 wu2 gu1 de
Translation: A glimpse of her face will tell you that she is innocent.

Chinese: 很多种类的动物现在已经从地球上绝迹了
Pinyin: hen3 duo1 zhong3 lei4 de dong4 wu4 xian4 zai4 yi3 jing1 zong4 di4 qiu2 shang4 jue2 ji1 le
Translation: Many types of animals have now vanished from the earth.

Chinese: 那是一个以几种语言叙述的古老的故事
Pinyin: na4 shi4 yi1 ge4 yi3 ji3 zhong4 yu3 yan2 xu4 shu4 de gu3 lao3 de gu4 shi4
Translation: It's an ancient tale which appears in various guises in several languages.

Chinese: 我们可以听到远处传来的车辆往来的嗡嗡声
Pinyin: wo3 men ke3 yi3 ting1 dao4 yuan3 chu4 zhuan4 lai2 de che1 liang4 wang3 lai2 de weng1 weng1 sheng1
Translation: We could hear the distant drone of the traffic.

Chinese: 他并没有把这首诗的意义真正揭示出来
Pinyin: ta1 bing4 mei2 you3 ba3 zhe4 shou3 shi1 de yi4 yi4 zhen1 zheng4 jie1 shi4 chu1 lai!
Translation: The meaning of the poem doesn't really come out in his interpretation.

Chinese: 我请求他从新疆回来时给我带些葡萄干
Pinyin: wo3 qing3 qiu2 ta1 zong4 xin1 jiang1 hui2 lai shi2 ji3 wo3 dai4 xie1 pu2 tao gan4
Translation: I asked him to bring me some raisins when he returns from Xinjiang.

Chinese: 这家公司现在使用电脑来计算所有的帐目
Pinyin: zhe4 jia1 gong1 si1 xian4 zai4 shi3 yong4 dian4 nao3 lai2 ji4 suan4 suo3 you3 de zhang4 mu4
Translation: The company now uses a computer to do all its account.

Chinese: 我们经济的决定性因素是控制通货膨胀
Pinyin: wo3 men jing1 ji4 de jue2 ding4 xing4 yin1 su4 shi4 kong4 zhi4 tong1 huo4 peng2 zhang4
Translation: The determinate factor of our economy is to control inflation.

Chinese: 因为我的愚蠢,我不得不站起来听他的批评
Pinyin: yin1 wei4 wo3 de yu2 chun3 wo3 bu4 de2 bu4 zhan4 qi3 lai ting4 ta1 de pi1 ping2
Translation: I have to stand up listening to his criticism of my foolishness.

Chinese: 在以后的岁月中,他一直记着她临别时的一吻
Pinyin: zai4 yi3 hou4 de sui4 yue4 zhong4 ta1 yi1 zhi2 ji4 zhuo2 ta1 lin2 bie4 shi2 de yi1 wen3
Translation: He remembered her parting kiss in the following years.

Chinese: 他有个主意,以纯白为背景给他们拍摄
Pinyin: ta1 you3 ge4 zhu3 yi yi3 chun2 bai2 wei4 bei4 jing3 ji3 ta1 men pai1 she4
Translation: He had the idea of shooting them against a complete plain white background.

Chinese: 警方还未得到可捉拿这个罪犯的足够情报
Pinyin: jing3 fang1 huan2 wei4 de2 dao4 ke3 zhuo1 na2 zhe4 ge4 zui4 fan4 de zu2 gou4 qing2 bao4
Translation: The police haven't got enough information to catch the criminal.

Chinese: 这次聚会一定没意思--咱们想个法子别去了
Pinyin: zhe4 ci4 ju4 hui4 yi1 ding4 mo4 yi4 si-- zan2 men xiang3 ge4 fa3 zi bie4 qu4 le!
Translation: It's bound to be a boring party let's try to wangle out of it/going.

Chinese: 我们送些酬劳,对您的大力协助聊表谢意
Pinyin: wo3 men song4 xie1 chou2 lao2 dui4 nin2 de da4 li4 xie2 zhu4 liao2 biao3 xie4 yi4
Translation: We are sending you some money in acknowledgement of your valuable help.

Chinese: 据说法国人是世界上最浪漫的民族之一
Pinyin: ju4 shuo1 fa3 guo2 ren2 shi4 shi4 jie4 shang4 zui4 lang4 man4 de min2 zu2 zhi1 yi1
Translation: It is said that Frenchmen are among the most romantic people in the world.

Chinese: 我在街道对面的连锁商店里买了这只面包
Pinyin: wo3 zai4 jie1 dao4 dui4 mian4 de lian2 suo3 shang1 dian4 li3 mai3 le zhe4 zhi3 mian4 bao1
Translation: I bought this loaf of bread in the chain store opposite the street.

Chinese: 女主人给我们端上来一大盘热气腾腾的饺子
Pinyin: nu:3 zhu3 ren2 ji3 wo3 men duan1 shang4 lai2 yi1 da4 pan2 re4 qi4 teng2 teng2 de jiao3 zi
Translation: Our hostess served up a large plate of steaming hot dumplings.

Chinese: 他打了个呵欠,揉了揉眼睛,就到前边屋里去了
Pinyin: ta1 da3 le ge4 he1 qian4 rou2 le rou2 yan3 jing1 jiu4 dao4 qian2 bian1 wu1 li3 qu4 le
Translation: He yawned, rubbed his eyes and went into the front room.

Chinese: 你或许有权要求退回去年你交付的部分税金
Pinyin: ni3 huo4 xu3 you3 quan2 yao1 qiu2 tui4 hui2 qu nian2 ni3 jiao1 fu4 de bu4 fen shui4 jin1
Translation: You may be entitled to reclaim some of the tax you paid last year.

Chinese: 我们应该团结起来为消除贫穷和疾病而斗争
Pinyin: wo3 men ying1 gai1 tuan2 jie2 qi3 lai wei4 xiao1 chu2 pin2 qiong2 huo4 ji2 bing4 er2 dou4 zheng1!
Translation: We should unite in fighting/unite to fight poverty and disease.

Chinese: 我们从悬崖顶上的高处能看到城市的全景
Pinyin: wo3 men zong4 xuan2 ya2 ding3 shang4 de gao1 chu4 neng2 kan4 dao4 cheng2 shi4 de quan2 jing3
Translation: From our perch up there on top of the cliff we can see the whole town.

Chinese: 英格兰队如果不改进打法, 就会输掉这场比赛
Pinyin: ying1 ge2 lan2 dui4 ru2 guo3 bu4 gai3 jin4 da3 fa3 jiu4 kuai4 shu1 diao4 zhe4 chang3 bi3 sai4!
Translation: Unless England improve their game they're going to lose the match.

Chinese: 年轻姑娘必须言词谨慎,衣着得体,行为端庄
Pinyin: nian2 qing1 gu1 niang bi4 xu1 yan2 ci2 jin3 shen4 yi1 zhuo2 de ti3 xing2 wei2 duan1 zhuang1
Translation: Young girls must be modest in speech, dress and behavior.

Chinese: 天气干旱了这么久,这场雨成了农民的救星
Pinyin: tian1 qi4 gan1 han4 le zhe4 me jiu3 zhe4 chang3 yu3 cheng2 le nong2 min2 de jiu4 xing1
Translation: After so much dry weather, the rain has been the farmer's salvation.

Chinese: 我对发生的每件事的细枝末节都记得清清楚楚
Pinyin: wo3 dui4 fa1 sheng1 de mei3 jian4 shi4 de xi4 zhi1 mo4 jie2 dou1 ji4 de qing1 qing1 chu chu3
Translation: I had remembered in minute detail everything that had happened.

Chinese: 想在这样大的暴风雪中去爬山简直是疯狂
Pinyin: xiang3 zai4 zhe4 yang4 da4 de bao4 feng1 xue3 zhong4 qu4 pa2 shan1 jian3 zhi2 shi4 feng1 kuang2
Translation: It would be madness to try to climb the mountain in such a snowstorm.

Chinese: 签定这一协议是两国关系加强的序幕
Pinyin: qian1 ding4 zhe4 yi1 xie2 yi4 shi4 liang3 guo2 guan1 xi jia1 qiang2 de xu4 mu4
Translation: The signing of the agreement was a prologue to better relations between the two countries.

Chinese: 新法令授予警察可以在街上截停任何人的权利
Pinyin: xin1 fa3 ling4 shou4 yu3 jing3 cha2 ke3 yi3 zai4 jie1 shang4 jie2 ting2 ren4 he2 ren2 de quan2 li4
Translation: The new laws empower the police to stop anybody in the street.

Chinese: 他们在恶劣的天气条件下登上了山的顶峰
Pinyin: ta1 men zai4 e4 lie4 de tian1 qi4 tiao2 jian4 xia4 deng1 shang4 le shan1 de ding3 feng1
Translation: They climbed up the last part of the mountain in formidable weather conditions.

Chinese: 他们把自己的家变成了无家可归的孤儿们的避难所
Pinyin: ta1 men ba3 zi4 ji3 de jia1 bian4 cheng2 le wu2 jia1 ke3 gui1 de gu1 er2 men de bi4 nan2 suo3
Translation: They have made their home a haven for the homeless orphans.

Chinese: 将军推测说敌人将于今天晚上突袭我们
Pinyin: jiang1 jun1 tui1 ce4 shuo1 di2 ren2 jiang4 yu2 jin1 tian1 wan3 shang tu1 xi2 wo3 men
Translation: The general conjectures that the enemy will launch an attack against us this night.

Chinese: 他们探索过各种途径,但是没有找到解决的办法
Pinyin: ta1 men tan4 suo3 guo4 ge4 zhong3 tu2 jing4 dan4 shi4 mei2 you3 zhao3 dao4 jie3 jue2 de ban4 fa3
Translation: They exploded every avenue but could not find a solution.

Chinese: 他因未对事故进行汇报而受到委员会的批评
Pinyin: ta1 yin1 wei4 dui4 shi4 gu4 jin4 xing2 hui4 bao4 er2 shou4 dao4 wei3 yuan2 hui4 de pi1 ping2
Translation: He was criticized by the committee for failing to report the accident.

Chinese: 我父母发现窗子被打破后,一定会有一番斥责
Pinyin: wo3 fu4 mu3 fa1 xian4 chuang1 zi3 bei4 da3 po4 hou4 yi1 ding4 kuai4 you3 yi1 pan1 chi4 ze2
Translation: There is sure to be a fuss when my parents find the window is broken.

Chinese: 政府在独立的问题上采取了毫不妥协的态度
Pinyin: zheng4 fu3 zai4 du2 li4 de wen4 ti2 shang4 cai3 qu3 le hao2 bu2 tuo3 xie2 de tai4 du
Translation: The government adopted an uncompromising posture on the issue of independence.

Chinese: 税务法非常复杂,只有专家才能解释清楚
Pinyin: shui4 wu4 fa3 fei1 chang2 fu4 za2 zhi3 you3 zhuan1 jia1 cai2 neng2 jie3 shi4 qing1 chu
Translation: The tax laws are so complicated that only an expert can provide enlightenment.

Chinese: 她戴了那么多首饰,看上去象是包在金子里似的
Pinyin: ta1 dai4 le na4 me duo1 shou3 shi4 kan4 shang4 qu4 xiang4 shi4 bao1 zai4 jin1 zi li3 si4 de
Translation: She wore so much jewellery that she seemed to be covered in gold.

Chinese: 我们正考虑在这样的事情上给他们更多的发言权
Pinyin: wo3 men zheng4 kao3 lu:4 zai4 zhe4 yang4 de shi4 qing shang4 ji3 ta1 men geng4 duo1 de fa1 yan2 quan2
Translation: We are considering giving them greater say in such matters.

Chinese: 拉丁语系, 例如法语, 意大利语, 都起源于拉丁语
Pinyin: La1 ding1 yu3 xi4 li4 ru2 fa3 yu3 yi4 da4 li4 yu4 dou1 qi3 yuan2 yu2 La1 ding1 yu3
Translation: The Roman languages such as French, Italian, are all derived from Latin.

Chinese: 在合作社中, 利润是在全体劳动者中进行分配的
Pinyin: zai4 he2 zuo4 she4 zhong4 li4 run4 shi4 zai4 quan2 ti3 lao2 dong4 zhe zhong4 jin4 xing2 fen1 pei4 de!
Translation: In a co-operative profits are distributed among the work-force.

Chinese: 他从巴黎回来,发现他的办公室被别人占了
Pinyin: ta1 zong4 Ba1 li2 hui2 lai fa1 xian4 ta1 de ban4 gong1 shi4 bei4 bie2 ren2 zhan4 le
Translation: He returned from Paris and found his office was under someone else's occupation.

Chinese: 她在科学方面的倾向性在孩童时代就已显现出来
Pinyin: ta1 zai4 ke1 xue2 fang1 mian4 de qing1 xiang4 xing4 zai4 hai2 tong2 shi2 dai4 jiu4 yi3 xian3 xian4 chu1 lai
Translation: Her scientific bias showed itself in early childhood.

Chinese: 他同时具有创造性想象力和真正的治学谨严学风
Pinyin: ta1 tong2 shi2 ju4 you3 chuang4 zao4 xing4 xiang3 xiang4 li4 huo4 zhen1 zheng4 de zhi4 xue2 jin3 yan2 xue2 feng1
Translation: He combines creative imagination and true scholarship.

Chinese: 这个国家同意为了共同的安全而与邻国结盟
Pinyin: zhe4 ge4 guo2 jia1 tong2 yi4 wei4 le gong4 tong2 de an1 quan2 er2 yu4 lin2 guo2 jie2 meng2
Translation: The country agreed to confederate with the neighboring country for mutual safety.

Chinese: 这个地方笼罩在神秘气氛下,继续使游览者着迷
Pinyin: zhe4 ge4 di4 fang long3 zhao4 zai4 shen2 mi4 qi4 fen1 xia4 ji4 xu4 shi3 you2 lan3 zhe3 zhao2 mi2
Translation: The place continues to fascinate visitors, cloaked in its mystery.

Chinese: 看到我的生日礼物受到极大的赞赏,我感到高兴
Pinyin: kan4 dao4 wo3 de sheng1 ri4 li3 wu4 shou4 dao4 ji2 da4 de zan4 shang3 wo3 gan3 dao4 gao1 xing4
Translation: I was gratified to see how much my birthday present was appreciated.

Chinese: 我们只能做些较小的让步,但这就可能打破僵局
Pinyin: wo3 men zhi3 neng2 zuo4 xie1 jiao4 xiao3 de rang4 bu4 dan4 zhe4 jiu4 ke3 neng2 da3 po4 jiang1 ju2
Translation: We can only make minor concessions, but it might break the deadlock.

Chinese: 许多富商靠极其残酷地践踏别人而爬了上去
Pinyin: xu3 duo1 fu4 shang1 kao4 ji2 qi2 can2 ku4 de jian4 ta4 bie2 ren2 er2 pa2 le shang4 qu4
Translation: Many a rich businessman reached the top by trampling on others in the most brutal way.

Chinese: 组织这样大规模的聚会要花费许多时间和精力
Pinyin: zu3 zhi1 zhe4 yang4 da4 gui1 mo2 de ju4 hui4 yao4 hua1 fei4 xu3 duo1 shi2 jian1 huo4 jing1 li4
Translation: The organization of such a large-scale party takes a lot of time and energy.

Chinese: 不论何时我到台北,我一定去参观故宫博物院
Pinyin: bu4 lun4 he2 shi2 wo3 dao4 Tai2 bei3 wo3 yi1 ding4 qu4 can1 guan1 gu4 gong1 bo2 wu4 yuan4
Translation: Whenever I go to Taipei, I make a point of visiting the National Palace Museum.

Chinese: 他这个人很没意思, 在聚会上我总是对他退避三舍
Pinyin: ta1 zhe4 ge4 ren2 hen3 mo4 yi4 si zai4 ju4 hui4 shang4 wo3 zong3 shi4 dui4 ta1 tui4 bi4 san1 she4!
Translation: He's so boring that I always try to give him a wide berth at parties.

Chinese: 因为地震,每天飞往这个城市的航班暂停了
Pinyin: yin1 wei4 di4 zhen4 mei3 tian1 fei1 wang4 zhe4 ge4 cheng2 shi4 de hang2 ban1 zan4 ting2 le
Translation: The daily flight to the city has been temporarily suspended because of the earthquake.

Chinese: 他们正在恶狠狠地争吵,我想他们可能要打架了
Pinyin: ta1 men zheng4 zai4 wu4 hen3 hen3 de zheng1 chao3 wo3 xiang3 ta1 men ke3 neng2 yao4 da3 jia4 le
Translation: They were having a fierce argument and I thought they might hit each other.

Chinese: 我申请加入排球队时给教练留下了良好的印象
Pinyin: wo3 shen1 qing3 jia1 ru4 pai2 qiu2 dui4 shi2 ji3 jiao4 lian4 liu2 xia4 le liang2 hao3 de yin4 xiang4
Translation: I had made on the coach a good impression when I went out for volleyball.

Chinese: 他还告诉我说你的辅导课和讨论课出勤率不高
Pinyin: ta1 huan2 gao4 su wo3 shuo1 ni3 de fu3 dao3 ke4 huo4 tao3 lun4 ke4 chu1 qin2 shuai4 bu4 gao1
Translation: He also tells me that your attendance at his tutorial and seminar have been poor.

Chinese: 抵押款提高了,其中一部分可由免税额增加而抵消
Pinyin: di3 ya2 kuan3 ti2 gao1 le qi2 zhong1 yi1 bu4 fen ke3 you2 mian3 shui4 e2 zeng1 jia1 er2 di3 xiao1
Translation: Higher mortgage rates are partly offset by increased tax allowances.

Chinese: 社会公益服务机构和当地医生应该加强协作
Pinyin: she4 hui4 gong1 yi4 fu2 wu4 ji1 gou4 huo4 dang1 di4 yi1 sheng1 ying1 gai1 jia1 qiang2 xie2 zuo4
Translation: There should be a lot more interaction between the social services and local doctors.

Chinese: 如果班上的人数多,老师就不能给予个别辅导了
Pinyin: ru2 guo3 ban1 shang4 de ren2 shu4 duo1 lao3 shi1 jiu4 bu4 neng2 gei3 yu3 ge4 bie2 fu3 dao3 le
Translation: A teacher can't give individual attention to each pupil if his class is large.

Chinese: 最近的丑闻给政府的反对派提供了大量的炮弹
Pinyin: zui4 jin4 de chou3 wen2 ji3 zheng4 fu3 de fan3 dui4 pai4 ti2 gong1 le da4 liang4 de pao4 dan4
Translation: The recent scandal has provided the government's opponents with plenty of ammunition.

Chinese: 一位稀有昆虫采集家将给我们看一些他的最新发现
Pinyin: yi1 wei4 xi1 you3 kun1 chong2 cai3 ji2 jia1 jiang4 ji3 wo3 men kan4 yi1 xie1 ta1 de zui4 xin1 fa1 xian4
Translation: A collector of rare insects will show us some of his latest discoveries.

Chinese: 他偷脚踏车是事实,但他并不像你所想的那样坏
Pinyin: ta1 tou1 jue2 ta4 ju1 shi4 shi4 shi2 dan4 ta1 bing4 bu4 xiang4 ni3 suo3 xiang3 de na4 yang4 huai4
Translation: It is true that he stole the bicycle, but he is not so bad as you might think.

Chinese: 我认为直截了当地告诉他这个坏消息倒是友好的行为
Pinyin: wo3 ren4 wei2 zhi2 jie2 le dang1 di4 gao4 su ta1 zhe4 ge4 huai4 xiao1 xi dao4 shi4 you3 hao3 de xing2 wei2
Translation: I think it would be a kindness to tell him the bad news straight away.

Chinese: 干旱少雨使原本就很严重的粮食短缺问题更加严重
Pinyin: gan1 han4 shao4 yu3 shi3 yuan2 ben3 jiu4 hen3 yan2 zhong4 de liang2 shi duan3 que1 wen4 ti2 geng4 jia1 yan2 zhong4
Translation: The lack of rain aggravated the already serious shortage of food.

Chinese: 医生定期到这家进行拜访,检查婴儿有没有问题
Pinyin: yi1 sheng1 ding4 qi1 dao4 zhe4 jia1 jin4 xing2 bai4 fang3 jian3 cha2 ying1 er2 you3 mei2 you3 wen4 ti2
Translation: The doctor made periodic visit to the house to see if the baby was all right.

Chinese: 我认为咱们不在家时不能把孩子都硬塞给你父母看管
Pinyin: wo3 ren4 wei2 zan2 men bu4 zai4 jia1 shi2 bu4 neng2 ba3 hai2 zi dou1 ying4 se4 ji3 ni3 fu4 mu3 kan4 guan3
Translation: I don't think we can wish the children on your parents while we're away.

Chinese: 节目涉及从流行音乐到京剧这样形形色色的题材
Pinyin: jie2 mu4 she4 ji2 zong4 liu2 xing2 yin1 yue4 dao4 jing1 ju4 zhe4 yang4 xing2 xing2 shai3 shai3 de ti2 cai2
Translation: The program deals with subjects as diverse as pop music and Beijing Opera.

Chinese: 恰恰就在我登上公共汽车踏板的时候,车子开动了
Pinyin: qia4 qia4 jiu4 zai4 wo3 deng1 shang4 gong1 gong4 qi4 che1 ta4 ban3 de shi2 hou ju1 zi kai1 dong4 le
Translation: At the precise moment that I put my foot on the step, the bus started.

Chinese: 她的考试成绩令人失望,但却装出若无其事的样子
Pinyin: ta1 de kao3 shi4 cheng2 ji1 ling4 ren2 shi1 wang4 dan4 que4 zhuang1 chu1 ruo4 wu2 qi2 shi4 de yang4 zi
Translation: Her exam result was disappointing but she tried to put a brave face on it.

Chinese: 经过连续几次的失败,他最后终于通过了驾驶考试
Pinyin: jing1 guo4 lian2 xu4 ji3 ci4 de shi1 bai4 ta1 zui4 hou4 zhong1 yu2 tong1 guo4 le jia4 shi3 kao3 shi4
Translation: After a series of unsuccessful attempts, he has finally passed the driving test.

Chinese: 起初她威胁要解雇我们所有的人,但是后来她态度软化了
Pinyin: qi3 chu1 ta1 wei1 xie2 yao4 jie3 gu4 wo3 men suo3 you3 de ren2 dan4 shi4 hou4 lai2 ta1 tai4 du ruan3 hua4 le
Translation: At first she threatened to dismiss us all, but later she relented.

Chinese: 国民财富在很大程度上取决于一个国家的教育水准
Pinyin: guo2 min2 cai2 fu4 zai4 hen3 da4 cheng2 du4 shang4 qu3 jue2 yu2 yi1 ge4 guo2 jia1 de jiao4 yu4 shui3 zhun3
Translation: National wealth depends to a high degree on a country's educational standard.

Chinese: 我的周末过得很无聊--只是在屋子里 转转或者看看电视
Pinyin: wo3 de zhou1 mo4 guo4 de hen3 wu2 liao--2 zhi3 shi4 zai4 wu1 zi li3 zhuan4 zhuan4 huo4 zhe3 kan4 kan dian4 shi4!
Translation: My weekend was boring I just floated about (the house) or watched TV.

Chinese: 马路上来往的车辆声音不断地破坏我们家的安宁
Pinyin: ma3 lu4 shang4 lai2 wang4 de che1 liang4 sheng1 yin1 bu4 duan4 de po4 huai4 wo3 men jia1 de an1 ning2
Translation: The noise of cars passing along the road is a continual disturbance to our quiet at home.

Chinese: 她用毫无表情的声调回答问题,甚至连眼睛都不抬起
Pinyin: ta1 yong4 hao2 wu2 biao3 qing2 de sheng1 diao4 hui2 da2 wen4 ti2 shen4 zhi4 lian2 yan3 jing1 dou1 bu4 tai2 qi3
Translation: She answered in a flat little voice and didn't even raised her eyes.

Chinese: 今天的报纸上有一篇关于办公室里的性骚扰的报道
Pinyin: jin1 tian1 de bao4 zhi3 shang4 you3 yi1 pian1 guan1 yu2 ban4 gong1 shi4 li3 de xing4 sao1 rao3 de bao4 dao4
Translation: There is a report about a sexual harassment in the office on this newspaper.

Chinese: 他们支持日本接管德国以前在山东省的所有权益
Pinyin: ta1 men zhi1 chi2 Ri4 ben3 jie1 guan3 De2 guo2 yi3 qian2 zai4 shan1 dong1 sheng3 de suo3 you3 quan2 yi4
Translation: They supported Japan's take over of all the former German interests in Shandong Province.

Chinese: 我愿借此机会感谢每一位为这个项目辛勤工作的人
Pinyin: wo3 yuan4 jie4 ci3 ji1 hui4 gan3 xie4 mei3 yi1 wei4 wei4 zhe4 ge4 xiang4 mu4 xin1 qin2 gong1 zuo4 de ren2
Translation: I'd like to take this opportunity to thank everyone for their hard work on the project.

Chinese: 首都一片平静,然而据报道在别的地方仍有持续的骚乱
Pinyin: shou3 du1 yi1 pian4 ping2 jing4 ran2 er2 ju4 bao4 dao4 zai4 bie2 de di4 fang reng2 you3 chi2 xu4 de sao1 luan4
Translation: The capital is calm, but continuing disorder has been reported elsewhere.

Chinese: 学习英语和德语等现代语言比学习拉丁语更为有用
Pinyin: xue2 xi2 Ying1 yu3 huo4 de2 yu3 deng3 xian4 dai4 yu3 yan2 bi4 xue2 xi2 La1 ding1 yu3 geng4 wei4 you3 yong4
Translation: It's more useful to learn modern languages, such as English and German, than Latin.

Chinese: 我怀疑在我有生之年这个国家会不会出现一位女总统
Pinyin: wo3 huai2 yi2 zai4 wo3 you3 sheng1 zhi1 nian2 zhe4 ge4 guo2 jia1 kuai4 bu4 hui4 chu1 xian4 yi1 wei4 nu:3 zong3 tong3
Translation: I doubt if there will be a female president in this country in my lifetime.

Chinese: 节目中的暴力场面和难听的粗话使许多观众感到震惊
Pinyin: jie2 mu4 zhong4 di4 bao4 li4 chang3 mian4 huo4 nan4 ting4 de cu1 hua4 shi3 xu3 duo1 guan1 zhong4 gan3 dao4 zhen4 jing1
Translation: The violence and bad language in the program shocked many of the viewers.

Chinese: 陪审团的全体成员,你们现在必须退下去考虑应如何裁决
Pinyin: pei2 shen3 tuan2 de quan2 ti3 cheng2 yuan2 ni3 men xian4 zai4 bi4 xu1 tui4 xia4 qu kao3 lu:4 ying4 ru2 he2 cai2 jue2
Translation: Members of the jury, you must now retire to consider your verdict.

Chinese: 中国人民正在努力工作,把国家建设得更加富饶美丽
Pinyin: Zhong1 guo2 ren2 min2 zheng4 zai4 nu3 li4 gong1 zuo4 ba3 guo2 jia1 jian4 she4 de geng4 jia1 fu4 rao2 mei3 li4
Translation: Chinese people are working hard to make the country richer and more beautiful.

Chinese: 若非认识我们这位好朋友,我们的生活一定十分不妙
Pinyin: ruo4 fei1 ren4 shi wo3 men zhe4 wei4 hao4 peng2 you wo3 men de sheng1 huo2 yi1 ding4 shi2 fen1 bu4 miao4
Translation: Our lives would have been greatly impoverished, if we had not known our dear friend.

Chinese: 这个政治家发现饥饿的孩子们可怜的哭声让人不忍心听下去
Pinyin: zhe4 ge4 zheng4 zhi4 jia1 fa1 xian4 ji1 e4 de hai2 zi men ke3 lian2 de ku1 sheng1 rang4 ren2 bu4 ren3 xin1 ting4 xia4 qu
Translation: The politician found the piteous cries of the starving children unbearable.

Chinese: 当他穿着全套大礼服露面的时候,显得和整个场合很不协调
Pinyin: dang4 ta1 chuan1 zhuo2 quan2 tao4 da4 li3 fu2 lou4 mian4 de shi2 hou xian3 de huo4 zheng3 ge4 chang3 he2 hen3 bu4 xie2 tiao2
Translation: He looked rather out of place when he turned up in full ceremonial rig.

Chinese: 当一个人一旦认为自己是有意思的时候,他就不再是有意思的人了
Pinyin: dang4 yi1 ge4 ren2 yi1 dan4 ren4 wei2 zi4 ji3 shi4 you3 yi4 si de shi2 hou ta1 jiu4 bu4 zai4 shi4 you3 yi4 si de ren2 le
Translation: The minute a man is convinced that he is interesting, he is not.

Chinese: 撞船事故发生地区的所有船只都参加了搜寻幸存者的工作
Pinyin: zhuang4 chuan2 shi4 gu4 fa1 sheng1 di4 qu1 de suo3 you3 chuan2 zhi1 dou1 can1 jia1 le sou1 xun2 xing4 cun2 zhe3 de gong1 zuo4
Translation: All the ships in the vicinity of the crash joined in the search for survivors.

Chinese: 第一只小鸟醒来了,男孩还能听见珍珠鸡在他的前边叫着
Pinyin: di4 yi1 zhi3 xiao3 niao3 xing3 lai2 le nan2 hai2 huan2 neng2 ting1 jian4 zhen1 zhu1 ji1 zai4 ta1 de qian2 bian1 jiao4 zhuo2
Translation: The first bird woke and the boy could hear the guinea-fowl calling ahead of him.

Chinese: 他们谈到人们如何在政治问题上使用及滥用数字来混淆视听
Pinyin: ta1 men tan2 dao4 ren2 men ru2 he2 zai4 zheng4 zhi4 wen4 ti2 shang4 shi3 yong4 ji2 lan4 yong4 shu4 zi4 lai2 hun4 xiao2 shi4 ting4
Translation: They talked about how the uses and abuses of figures to prove things in politics.

Chinese: 他由于忘了带钥匙,便以简单的应急办法从窗户爬进屋里
Pinyin: ta1 you2 yu2 wang4 le dai4 yao4 shi pian2 yi3 jian3 dan1 de ying4 ji2 ban4 fa3 zong4 chuang1 hu pa2 jin4 wu1 li3
Translation: As he had forgot his keys, he got into the house by the simple expedient of climbing through the window.

Chinese: 那只外星来的宇宙飞船在公园上空盘旋了一会儿之后就不见了
Pinyin: na4 zhi3 wai4 xing1 lai2 de yu3 zhou4 fei1 chuan2 zai4 gong1 yuan2 shang4 kong1 pan2 xuan2 le yi1 huir4 zhi1 hou4 jiu4 bu4 jian4 le
Translation: After the alien spacecraft had hovered over the park for a short time, it vanished.

Chinese: 一旦迈克采取了防卫态度,就很难使他相信没有什么可怕的
Pinyin: yi1 dan4 mai4 ke4 cai3 qu3 le fang2 wei4 tai4 du jiu4 hen3 nan4 shi3 ta1 xiang1 xin4 mei2 you3 shen2 me ke3 pa4 de
Translation: Once Mike's taken up a defensive attitude, it's difficult to persuade him that's nothing to be afraid of.

Chinese: 他活动于社交甚严的社交圈内,而且属于那些最不愿吸收外人的俱乐部
Pinyin: ta1 huo2 dong4 yu2 she4 jiao1 shen4 yan2 de she4 jiao1 quan1 nei4 er2 qie3 shu3 yu2 na4 xie1 zui4 bu4 yuan4 xi1 shou1 wai4 ren2 de ju4 yue4 bu4
Translation: He moves in exclusive social circles and belongs to the most exclusive clubs.

Chinese: 她新找的这份工作星期六放假,而原来的那份工作周末是隔周放假
Pinyin: ta1 xin1 zhao3 de zhe4 fen4 gong1 zuo4 xing1 qi1 liu4 fang4 jia4 er2 yuan2 lai2 de na4 fen4 gong1 zuo4 zhou1 mo4 shi4 ge2 zhou1 fang4 jia4
Translation: She get Saturday off in her new job as against work alternate weekend in her last one.

Chinese: 关于宇宙起源的新理论被世界上很多著名的天文学家批得体无完肤
Pinyin: guan1 yu2 yu3 zhou4 qi3 yuan2 de xin1 li3 lun4 bei4 shi4 jie4 shang4 hen3 duo著1 ming2 de tian1 wen2 xue2 jia1 pi1 de ti3 wu2 wan2 fu1
Translation: The new theory of the origin of the universe was pulled to pieces by many of the world leading astronomers.

Chinese: 我一整天围着火热的炉子辛辛苦苦地做出这顿饭,可是他们现在几乎一点儿也没有吃
Pinyin: wo3 yi1 zheng3 tian1 wei2 zhao2 huo3 re4 de lu2 zi xin1 xin1 ku3 ku3 de zuo4 chu1 zhe4 dun4 fan4 ke3 shi4 ta1 men xian4 zai4 ji1 hu1 yi1 dianr3 ye3 mei2 you3 ji2
Translation: I slaved away all day over a hot stove to produce this meal, and now they've hardly eaten any of it.

Chinese: 什么也不能推动一个按钟头收费的人,对他的平静的心情来说,时间的消逝是多么甜蜜啊
Pinyin: shen2 me ye3 bu4 neng2 tui1 dong4 yi1 ge4 an4 zhong1 tou2 shou1 fei4 de ren2 dui4 ta1 de ping2 jing4 de xin1 qing2 lai2 shuo1 shi2 jian1 de xiao1 shi4 shi4 duo1 me tian2 mi4 a
Translation: "Nothing can move a man who is paid by the hour; how sweet the flight of time seem to his calm mind."

Chinese: 不要嘲笑他
Pinyin: bu4 yao4 chao2 xiao4 ta1
Translation: Don't laugh at him.

Chinese: 摆锤能摆动
Pinyin: bai3 chui2 neng2 bai3 dong4!
Translation: A pendulum oscillates.

Chinese: 外面在下冰雹
Pinyin: wai4 mian zai4 xia4 bing1 bao2
Translation: It's hailing outside.

Chinese: 她体重为60公斤
Pinyin: ta1 ti3 zhong4 wei604 gong1 jin1!
Translation: She weighs 60 kilos.

Chinese: 他有音乐天赋
Pinyin: ta1 you3 yin1 yue4 tian1 fu4
Translation: He has a gift for music.

Chinese: 猪是一种家畜
Pinyin: zhu1 shi4 yi1 zhong4 jia1 chu4
Translation: A pig is a domestic animal.

Chinese: 请不要嘲笑他
Pinyin: qing3 bu4 yao4 chao2 xiao4 ta1
Translation: Please don't laugh at him.

Chinese: 满月呈圆形
Pinyin: man3 yue4 cheng2 yuan2 xing2
Translation: The full moon has a circular form.

Chinese: 城堡的墙很厚
Pinyin: cheng2 bao3 de qiang2 hen3 hou4
Translation: The castle walls are very thick.

Chinese: 我喜欢节奏快的音乐
Pinyin: wo3 xi3 huan jie2 zou4 kuai4 de yin1 yue4
Translation: I like fast music.

Chinese: 我要报一宗盗窃案
Pinyin: wo3 yao4 bao4 yi1 zong1 dao4 qie4 an4
Translation: I want to report a theft.

Chinese: 她的两只胳膊麻痹
Pinyin: ta1 de liang3 zhi3 ge1 bo ma2 bi4
Translation: She is paralyzed in both arms.

Chinese: 汗从毛孔中渗出
Pinyin: han4 zong4 mao2 kong3 zhong4 shen4 chu1!
Translation: Sweat exudes through the pores.

Chinese: 牛奶可制成凝乳
Pinyin: niu2 nai3 ke3 zhi4 cheng2 ning2 ru3
Translation: Milk can be made into curds.

Chinese: 空气中烟雾弥漫
Pinyin: kong1 qi4 zhong4 yan1 wu4 mi2 man4
Translation: The air was thick with smoke.

Chinese: 他的歌充满了忧伤
Pinyin: ta1 de ge1 chong1 man3 le you1 shang1
Translation: His songs are full of dirge.

Chinese: 他发誓永远爱她
Pinyin: ta1 fa1 shi4 yong3 yuan3 ai4 ta1
Translation: He swore to love her for evermore.

Chinese: 尸体躺在血泊中
Pinyin: shi1 ti3 tang3 zai4 xue4 bo2 zhong.4
Translation: The body was lying in a pool of blood.

Chinese: 玉米不久就要结穗了
Pinyin: yu4 mi3 bu4 jiu3 jiu4 yao4 jie2 sui4 le
Translation: The corn will soon ear.

Chinese: 他是那个团的耻辱
Pinyin: ta1 shi4 nei4 ge4 tuan2 de chi3 ru4
Translation: He was a dishonor to his regiment.

Chinese: 花发出一阵幽香
Pinyin: hua1 fa1 chu1 yi1 zhen4 you1 xiang1
Translation: The flowers gave off a fragrant odor.

Chinese: 鹿的斑点是黄色的

Translation: We must multiply our efforts to clear up the mystery.

Chinese: 噪音令人讨厌,尤其当你想睡觉的时候
Pinyin: zao4 yin1 ling4 ren2 tao3 yan4 you2 qi2 dang4 ni3 xiang3 shui4 jue2 de shi2 hou
Translation: Noise is unpleasant, especially when you are trying to sleep.

Chinese: 我希望我的告诫会促使她作出更大的努力
Pinyin: wo3 xi1 wang4 wo3 de gao4 jie4 kuai4 cu4 shi3 ta1 zuo4 chu1 geng4 da4 de nu3 li4
Translation: I hoped my warning would stimulate her to greater efforts.

Chinese: 这只汉堡包不但气味好闻而且味道好吃
Pinyin: zhe4 zhi3 han4 bao3 bao1 bu4 dan4 qi4 wei4 hao4 wen2 er2 qie3 wei4 dao hao3 chi1
Translation: The hamburger not only smells good but (also) tastes delicious.

Chinese: 辐射泄露的消息引起了公众的普遍恐慌
Pinyin: fu2 she4 xie4 lou4 de xiao1 xi yin3 qi3 le gong1 zhong4 de pu3 bian4 kong3 huang1
Translation: The news of the radiation leak caused widespread public alarm.

Chinese: 那热气腾腾的蛋糕对这个饥饿的男孩是个诱惑
Pinyin: na4 re4 qi4 teng2 teng2 de dan4 gao1 dui4 zhe4 ge4 ji1 e4 de nan2 hai2 shi4 ge4 you4 huo4
Translation: The steaming cake was a bait for the hungry boy.

Chinese: 流行歌星总是抱怨他们受到歌迷的包围
Pinyin: liu2 xing2 ge1 xing1 zong3 shi4 bao4 yuan4 ta1 men shou4 dao4 ge1 mi2 de bao1 wei2
Translation: Pop stars are always moaning about being mobbed by their fans.

Chinese: 你总是随心所欲而不考虑我们的情感
Pinyin: ni3 zong3 shi4 sui2 xin1 suo3 yu4 er2 bu4 kao3 lu:4 wo3 men de qing2 gan3
Translation: You always follow your own inclination instead of thinking of our feelings.

Chinese: 顺着这条大路走,在路的分岔口向右拐
Pinyin: shun4 zhuo2 zhe4 tiao2 da4 lu4 zou3 zai4 lu4 de fen4 cha4 kou3 xiang4 you4 guai3
Translation: Follow the main road until it branches, and then turn to the right.

Chinese: 他听到的唯一的声音就是那台机器的嗡嗡声
Pinyin: ta1 ting1 dao4 de wei2 yi1 de sheng1 yin1 jiu4 shi4 na4 tai2 ji1 qi4 de weng1 weng1 sheng1
Translation: The only sound he heard was the hum of the machine.

Chinese: 他用一支笔在地图上标出了波斯湾的位置
Pinyin: ta1 yong4 yi1 zhi1 bi3 zai4 di4 tu2 shang4 biao1 chu1 le Bo1 si1 wan1 de wei4 zhi
Translation: He indicated the location of the Persian Gulf with a pen on the map.

Chinese: 这位科学家在许多知识领域中都是杰出的
Pinyin: zhe4 wei4 ke1 xue2 jia1 zai4 xu3 duo1 zhi1 shi ling3 yu4 zhong4 dou1 shi4 jie2 chu1 de
Translation: The scientist is distinguished in many spheres of knowledge.

Chinese: 战士们唱起了歌颂他们英勇战斗的凯歌
Pinyin: zhan4 shi4 men chang4 qi3 le ge1 song4 ta1 men ying1 yong3 zhan4 dou4 de kai3 ge1
Translation: The soldiers sang a song of victory, describing their prowess in battle.

Chinese: 他的建议在理论上可以, 但不能付诸实现
Pinyin: ta1 de jian4 yi4 zai4 li3 lun4 shang4 ke3 yi3 dan4 bu4 neng2 fu4 zhu1 shi2 xian4
Translation: His proposition is good in theory but cannot be put into practice.

Chinese: 电视已成为传播政治思想的重要媒介
Pinyin: dian4 shi4 yi3 cheng2 wei2 chuan2 bo1 zheng4 zhi4 si1 xiang3 de zhong4 yao4 mei2 jie4
Translation: Television has become an important vehicle for spreading political ideas.

Chinese: 他仅有的消遣是喝啤酒和在花园里种花草
Pinyin: ta1 jin3 you3 de xiao1 qian3 shi4 he4 pi2 jiu3 huo4 zai4 hua1 yuan2 li3 zhong4 hua1 cao3
Translation: His only recreations are drinking beer and working in the garden.

Chinese: 郁金香在春天开出颜色鲜亮的杯状的花朵
Pinyin: yu4 jin1 xiang1 zai4 chun1 tian1 kai1 chu1 yan2 se4 xian3 liang4 de bei1 zhuang4 de hua1 duo3
Translation: Tulip grows large brightly-colored cup-shaped flower in spring.

Chinese: 汤姆每次转身都把被子往他那边再拉一些
Pinyin: tang1 mu3 mei3 ci4 zhuan3 shen1 dou1 ba3 bei4 zi wang4 ta1 na4 bian zai4 la1 yi1 xie1
Translation: Every time Tom rolled over he pulled more of the bedclothes to his side.

Chinese: 这位将军被誉为领导全国赢得胜利的人
Pinyin: zhe4 wei4 jiang1 jun1 bei4 yu4 wei4 ling3 dao3 quan2 guo2 ying2 de2 sheng4 li4 de ren2
Translation: The general was extolled as the man who had led the country to victory.

Chinese: 杰克不仅是个好学生,而且还是名篮球队员
Pinyin: jie2 ke4 bu4 jin3 shi4 ge4 hao4 xue2 sheng er2 qie3 hai2 shi4 ming2 lan2 qiu2 dui4 yuan2
Translation: Jack is not only a good student but also a basketball player.

Chinese: 一般人也许会嘲笑他的音乐,但我们更了解它
Pinyin: yi1 ban1 ren2 ye3 xu3 kuai4 chao2 xiao4 ta1 de yin1 yue4 dan4 wo3 men geng4 liao3 jie3 ta1
Translation: The multitude may laugh at his music, but we know better.

Chinese: 我非常恼怒,以致觉得非给报社写封信不可
Pinyin: wo3 fei1 chang2 nao3 nu4 yi3 zhi4 jue2 de fei1 ji3 bao4 she4 xie3 feng1 xin4 bu4 ke3
Translation: I was so annoyed that I felt impelled to write a letter to the paper.

Chinese: 他把派克大衣兜帽两边都绑得紧紧的来挡住雪
Pinyin: ta1 ba3 Pai4 ke4 da4 yi1 dou1 mao4 liang3 bian1 dou1 bang3 de jin3 jin3 de lai2 dang4 zhu4 xue3
Translation: He held both sides of the parka hood closed against the snow.

Chinese: 由于投资少,我们的工业生产一直停滞不前
Pinyin: you2 yu2 tou2 zi1 shao4 wo3 men de gong1 ye4 sheng1 chan3 yi1 zhi2 ting2 zhi4 bu4 qian2
Translation: Due to low investment, our industrial output has remained stagnant.

Chinese: 她沾湿了一块纸巾,轻轻擦去项链上的灰尘
Pinyin: ta1 zhan1 shi1 le yi1 kuai4 zhi3 jin1 qing1 qing1 ca1 qu4 xiang4 lian4 shang4 de hui1 chen2
Translation: She moistened a tissue and gently wiped the dust off the necklace.

Chinese: 他听到汽车刹车发出的尖锐的声音,然后就摔倒了
Pinyin: ta1 ting1 dao4 qi4 che1 sha1 che1 fa1 chu1 de jian1 rui4 de sheng1 yin1 ran2 hou4 jiu4 shuai1 dao3 le
Translation: He heard a screech of brakes and then fell down.

Chinese: 木匠量了一下棚屋的尺寸, 立刻估计出它的大小
Pinyin: mu4 jiang4 liang4 le yi1 xia4 peng2 wu1 de chi3 cun li4 ke4 gu1 ji4 chu1 ta1 de da4 xiao3
Translation: The carpenter ran his ruler over the shed and sized it up at once.

Chinese: 做试验前,老师给我们每个人发了一张滤纸
Pinyin: zuo4 shi4 yan4 qian2 lao3 shi1 ji3 wo3 men mei3 ge4 ren2 fa4 le yi1 zhang1 lu:4 zhi3
Translation: The teacher gave each of us a piece of filter paper before doing the experiment.

Chinese: 魔术师口中念念有词, 把兔子从礼帽中掏了出来
Pinyin: mo2 shu4 shi1 kou3 zhong4 nian4 nian4 you3 ci2 ba3 tu4 zi zong4 li3 mao4 zhong4 tao1 le chu1 lai!
Translation: `Abracadabra,' said the conjuror as he pulled the rabbit from the hat.

Chinese: 我觉得你嘲笑他说英语的方式刺伤了他的自尊心
Pinyin: wo3 jue2 de ni3 chao2 xiao4 ta1 shuo1 Ying1 yu3 de fang1 shi4 ci4 shang1 le ta1 de zi4 zun1 xin1
Translation: I think you hurt his pride by laughing at the way he speaks English.

Chinese: 这个百万富翁已把他一半的股票移交给他的长子
Pinyin: zhe4 ge4 bai3 wan4 fu4 weng1 yi3 ba3 ta1 yi1 ban4 de gu3 piao4 yi2 jiao1 ji3 ta1 de Zhang3 zi3
Translation: The millionaire has handed over 50 percent of his stock to his first son.

Chinese: 其他地方更优厚的薪金待遇诱使他离开了公司
Pinyin: qi2 ta1 di4 fang geng4 you1 hou4 de xin1 jin1 dai4 yu4 you4 shi3 ta1 li2 kai1 le gong1 si1
Translation: He was seduced into leaving the company by the offer of higher pay elsewhere.

Chinese: 他们的主要出口货物是纺织品,特别是丝绸和棉布
Pinyin: ta1 men de zhu3 yao4 chu1 kou3 huo4 wu4 shi4 fang3 zhi1 pin3 te4 bie2 shi4 si1 chou2 huo4 mian2 bu4
Translation: Their main exports are textiles, especially silk and cotton.

Chinese: 他不敢把令人不快的真情告诉他们。他是条哑吧狗
Pinyin: ta1 bu4 gan3 ba3 ling4 ren2 bu4 kuai4 de zhen1 qing2 gao4 su ta1 men. ta1 shi4 tia2o ya3 ba go3u
Translation: He is afraid to tell them the unpalatable truths!###He is a dumb dog.

Chinese: 这栋房子对我们来说不够大,而且离城太远了
Pinyin: zhe4 dong4 fang2 zi dui4 wo3 men lai2 shuo1 bu4 gou4 da4 er2 qie3 li2 cheng2 tai4 yuan3 le
Translation: This house is not large enough for us, and further, it is too far from the town.

Chinese: 大部分印第安人生活在联邦政府建立的保留地上
Pinyin: da4 bu4 fen yin4 di4 an1 ren2 sheng1 huo2 zai4 lian2 bang1 zheng4 fu3 jian4 li4 de bao3 liu2 di4 shang
Translation: Most Indian live on reservation establish by the federal government.

Chinese: 无论报纸上刊登什么荒谬的东西,总有人相信
Pinyin: wu2 lun4 bao4 zhi3 shang4 kan1 deng1 shen2 me huang1 miu4 de dong1 xi zong3 you3 ren2 xiang1 xin4
Translation: Whatsoever nonsense the newspaper prints, some people always believe it.

Chinese: 这幅画表现了牛在溪边饮水的迷人的田园风光
Pinyin: zhe4 fu2 hua4 biao3 xian4 le niu2 zai4 xi1 bian1 yin3 shui3 de mi2 ren2 de tian2 yuan2 feng1 guang1
Translation: The picture showed a charming pastoral scene of cows drinking from a stream.

Chinese: 孩子喂饱后不哭不闹的满足状使疲惫的母亲很满意
Pinyin: hai2 zi wei4 bao3 hou4 bu4 ku1 bu4 nao4 de man3 zu2 zhuang4 shi3 pi2 bei4 de mu3 qin1 hen3 man3 yi4
Translation: The quiet contentment of a well-fed child satisfied the tired mother.

Chinese: 父亲想到乡下去,可是孩子们吵着要去海滨
Pinyin: fu4 qin1 xiang3 dao4 xiang1 xia4 qu4 ke3 shi4 hai2 zi men chao3 zhuo2 yao4 qu4 hai3 bin1
Translation: Father wanted to go to the country, but the children were whooping it up for the beach.

Chinese: 最近,许多州坚持中学应该教学生如何开车
Pinyin: zui4 jin4 xu3 duo1 zhou1 jian1 chi2 zhong1 xue2 ying1 gai1 jiao4 xue2 sheng1 ru2 he2 kai1 che1
Translation: Recently, many states have insisted that high schools teach students how to drive.

Chinese: 那人太阳穴上贴了一块膏药,看上去像个卡通人物
Pinyin: na4 ren2 tai4 yang2 xue2 shang4 tie1 le yi1 kuai4 gao1 yao4 kan4 shang4 qu4 xiang4 ge4 ka3 tong1 ren2 wu4
Translation: The man looks like a cartoon character with a plaster on his temple.

Chinese: 那架喷气式飞机低飞掠过房顶, 隆隆声把大家吓了一跳
Pinyin: na4 jia4 pen4 qi4 shi4 fei1 ji1 di1 fei1 lu:e4 guo4 fang2 ding3 long2 long2 sheng1 ba3 da4 jia1 xia4 le yi1 tiao4!
Translation: The jet zoomed low over the houses, frightening everyone.

Chinese: 这些优异的成绩给我们全体工作人员带来了莫大的光荣
Pinyin: zhe4 xie you1 yi4 de cheng2 ji1 ji3 wo3 men quan2 ti3 gong1 zuo4 ren2 yuan2 dai4 lai2 le mo4 da4 de guang1 rong2!
Translation: These excellent results reflect great credit on all our staff.

Chinese: 庄园主宅第是一栋环抱在美丽的花园中的大理石房子
Pinyin: zhuang1 yuan2 zhu3 zhai2 di4 shi4 yi1 dong4 huan2 bao4 zai4 mei3 li4 de hua1 yuan2 zhong4 di4 da4 li3 shi2 fang2 zi
Translation: The manor is a marble house surrounded by a beautiful garden.

Chinese: 这块地毯已经脏得辨认不出原来的颜色了
Pinyin: zhe4 kuai4 di4 tan3 yi3 jing1 zang4 de bian4 ren4 bu4 chu1 yuan2 lai2 de yan2 se4 le!
Translation: The carpet was badly stained, to such an extent that (i.e. so much that) you couldn't tell its original color.

Chinese: 各反对党指责修建新机场是浪费纳税人的金钱
Pinyin: ge4 fan3 dui4 dang3 zhi3 ze2 xiu1 jian4 xin1 ji1 chang3 shi4 lang4 fei4 na4 shui4 ren2 de jin1 qian2
Translation: The opposition parties have condemned the new airport as a waste of taxpayers' money.

Chinese: 开出鲜艳花朵的爬藤植物瀑布般悬挂在花园墙上
Pinyin: kai1 chu1 xian1 yan4 hua1 duo3 de pa2 teng2 zhi2 wu4 pu4 bu4 ban1 xuan2 gua4 zai4 hua1 yuan2 qiang2 shang4
Translation: Climbing plants with their bright flowers hung in cascades over the garden wall.

Chinese: 美国的公共教育史起源于早期拓荒者的社会
Pinyin: Mei3 guo2 de gong1 gong4 jiao4 yu4 shi3 qi3 yuan2 yu2 zao3 qi1 tuo4 huang1 zhe3 de she4 hui4
Translation: The history of public education in the United States dates from the society of the early pioneers.

Chinese: 工会运动旨在争取更高的工资和更好的工作条件
Pinyin: gong1 hui4 yun4 dong4 zhi3 zai4 zheng1 qu3 geng4 gao1 de gong1 zi1 huo4 geng4 hao3 de gong1 zuo4 tiao2 jian4
Translation: The Trade Union Movement works to obtain higher wages and better conditions.

Chinese: 如果你们不是很熟的话,问别人薪水多少是很不礼貌的
Pinyin: ru2 guo3 ni3 men bu2 shi4 hen3 shu2 de hua4 wen4 bie2 ren2 xin1 shui3 duo1 shao shi4 hen3 bu4 li3 mao4 de
Translation: It's bad manners to ask other's salary if you are not very familiar.

Chinese: 热天穿棉布之类有渗透性的材料制成的衣服最为适宜
Pinyin: re4 tian1 chuan1 mian2 bu4 zhi1 lei4 you3 shen4 tou4 xing4 de cai2 liao4 zhi4 cheng2 de yi1 fu zui4 wei2 shi4 yi2
Translation: In hot weather cloths made of a porous material like cotton are best.

Chinese: 美利坚合众国保证合众国各州实行共和政体
Pinyin: mei3 li4 jian1 he2 zhong4 guo2 bao3 zheng4 he2 zhong4 guo2 ge4 zhou1 shi2 xing2 gong4 he2 zheng4 ti3
Translation: The United States shall guarantee to every state in this union a republican form of government.

Chinese: 吉姆在物理考试中作弊却逃避了惩罚, 麦克则受到责备
Pinyin: ji2 mu3 zai4 wu4 li3 kao3 shi4 zhong4 zuo4 bi4 que4 tao2 bi4 le cheng2 fa2 mai4 ke4 ze2 shou4 dao4 ze2 bei4
Translation: Jim got away with cheating in the physics test, while Mike was scolded.

Chinese: 他们这些颠覆性的思想是对我们年轻人的精神污染
Pinyin: ta1 men zhe4 xie dian1 fu4 xing4 de si1 xiang3 shi4 dui4 wo3 men nian2 qing1 ren2 de jing1 shen2 wu1 ran3
Translation: They are contaminating the minds of our young people with these subversive ideas.

Chinese: 现在场景转到仓库,行凶者正埋伏在那里伺机行动
Pinyin: xian4 zai4 chang3 jing3 zhuan4 dao4 cang1 ku4 xing4 xiong1 zhe3 zheng4 mai2 fu2 zai4 na4 li si4 ji1 xing2 dong4
Translation: And now the scene shifts to the warehouse, where the murderer is lying in wait.

Chinese: 财务董事派人带话说,她因不能出席会议而向大家道歉
Pinyin: cai2 wu4 dong3 shi4 pai4 ren2 dai4 hua4 shuo1 ta1 yin1 bu4 neng2 chu1 xi2 hui4 yi4 er2 xiang4 da4 jia1 dao4 qian4
Translation: The Finance Director sends her apology and is unable to attend the meeting.

Chinese: 我不知道他着了什么魔,在那条热闹的街上把车子开得这么快
Pinyin: wo3 bu4 zhi1 dao4 ta1 zhuo2 le shen2 me mo2 zai4 na4 tiao2 re4 nao de jie1 shang4 ba3 ju1 zi kai1 de zhe4 me kuai4
Translation: I don't know what possessed him to drive so fast down that busy street.

Chinese: 我们赢得了合同,但是却经过了多次不屈不挠的谈判才达到目的
Pinyin: wo3 men ying2 de2 le he2 tong dan4 shi4 que4 jing1 guo4 le duo1 ci4 bu4 qu1 bu4 nao2 de tan2 pan4 cai2 da2 dao4 mu4 di4
Translation: We won the contract but only through a lot of tough negotiating.

Chinese: 这种炎热的天气在夜晚尚能忍受,但白天就令人感到呼吸困难
Pinyin: zhe4 zhong3 yan2 re4 de tian1 qi4 zai4 ye4 wan3 shang4 neng2 ren3 shou4 dan4 bai2 tian1 jiu4 ling4 ren2 gan3 dao4 hu1 xi1 kun4 nan
Translation: The heat was tolerable at night but suffocating during the day.

Chinese: 那是我以前最喜欢的饭馆,但近来烹饪水平已大不如前了
Pinyin: na4 shi4 wo3 yi3 qian2 zui4 xi3 huan de fan4 guan3 dan4 jin4 lai2 peng1 ren4 shui3 ping2 yi3 da4 bu4 ru2 qian2 le
Translation: It used to be my favorite restaurant but the standard of cooking has fallen off recently.

Chinese: 我真希望我们能够看到更多新的电视节目,而不是翻来覆去的那几个老节目
Pinyin: wo3 zhen1 xi1 wang4 wo3 men neng2 gou4 kan4 dao4 geng4 duo1 xin1 de dian4 shi4 jie2 mu4 er2 bu2 shi4 fan1 lai2 fu4 qu4 de na4 ji3 ge lao3 jie2 mu4
Translation: I wish we could see more new programs on television, not repeats all the time.

Chinese: 有人指定拉姆奇夫人把钱装在一只纸盒子里,并把纸板盒放在她的门外边
Pinyin: you3 ren2 zhi3 ding4 la1 mu3 qi2 fu1 ren ba3 qian2 zhuang1 zai4 yi1 zhi3 zhi3 he2 zi li3 bing4 ba3 zhi3 ban3 he2 fang4 zai4 ta1 de men2 wai4 bian
Translation: Mrs. Ramsay was instructed to place the money in a cardboard box and to leave it outside her door.

Chinese: 我已写一封抱怨信给国家铁路部门,总得有人要支持提高服务标准
Pinyin: wo3 yi3 xie3 yi1 feng1 bao4 yuan4 xin4 ji3 guo2 jia1 tie3 lu4 bu4 men2 zong3 dei3 you3 ren2 yao4 zhi1 chi2 ti2 gao1 fu2 wu4 biao1 zhun3
Translation: "I've written a letter of complaint to State Rail; somebody has got to carry the banner for better standards of service."

Chinese: 规范语法阐述的是该派语法学家认为的某语言的口语或书面语的标准形式
Pinyin: gui1 fan4 yu3 fa3 chan3 shu4 de shi4 gai1 pai4 yu3 fa3 xue2 jia1 ren4 wei2 de mou3 yu3 yan2 de kou3 yu3 huo4 shu1 mian4 yu3 de biao1 zhun3 xing2 shi4!
Translation: A normative grammar of a language describes how its authors think the language should be spoken or written.

Chinese: 我的未完成的过去,从后边缠绕到我身上,使我难于死去。请从它那里释放了我吧
Pinyin: wo3 de wei4 wan2 cheng2 de guo4 qu zong4 hou4 bian1 chan2 rao3 dao4 wo3 shen1 shang4 shi3 wo3 nan4 yu2 si3 qu4. qi3ng zo4ng ta1 na4 li shi4 fa4ng le wo3 ba
Translation: Release me from my unfulfilled past clinging to me from behind making death difficult.

Chinese: 这世上有些人把整个时间花费于搜寻正义,却腾不出时间来付诸实践
Pinyin: zhe4 shi4 shang4 you3 xie1 ren2 ba3 zheng3 ge4 shi2 jian1 hua1 fei4 yu2 sou1 xun2 zheng4 yi4 que4 teng2 bu4 chu1 shi2 jian1 lai2 fu4 zhu1 shi2 jian4
Translation: Some folks in this world spend their whole time hunting after righteousness and can not find any time to practice it.

Chinese: 你疯了吗？
Pinyin: ni3 feng1 le ma?!
Translation: Are you insane?

Chinese: 你住在哪儿？
Pinyin: ni3 zhu4 zai4 na3 r?!
Translation: Where do you live?

Chinese: 多好的主意！
Pinyin: duo1 hao3 de zhu3 yi!
Translation: What a swell idea!

Chinese: 你太过分了！
Pinyin: ni3 tai4 guo4 fen4 le!
Translation: You've gone too far!

Chinese: 接着怎么样了?
Pinyin: jie1 zhe zen3 me yang4 le?
Translation: What happened then?

Chinese: 你想喝茶吗?
Pinyin: ni3 xiang3 he4 cha2 ma?
Translation: Would you like a cup of tea?

Chinese: 那儿怎么样？
Pinyin: na4 r zen3 me yang4?
Translation: What is it like there?

Chinese: 这里谁负责？
Pinyin: zhe4 li3 shei2 fu4 ze2?
Translation: Who is in charge here?

Chinese: 我说清楚了吗?
Pinyin: wo3 shuo1 qing1 chu le ma?
Translation: Am I making myself clear?

Chinese: 你做什么工作？
Pinyin: ni3 zuo4 shen2 me gong1 zuo4?
Translation: What's your job?

Chinese: 猪已喂过了吗?
Pinyin: zhu1 yi3 wei4 guo4 le ma?
Translation: Have the pigs been fed yet?

Chinese: 你懂挪威语吗？
Pinyin: ni3 dong3 nuo2 wei1 yu4 ma?!
Translation: Do you know Norwegian?

Chinese: 这是谁的钢笔？
Pinyin: zhe4 shi4 shei2 de gang1 bi3?
Translation: Whose pen is this?

Chinese: 你要橘子水吗?
Pinyin: ni3 yao4 ju2 zi shui3 ma?
Translation: Would you like some orange?

Chinese: 我看上去怎么样？
Pinyin: wo3 kan4 shang4 qu4 zen3 me yang4?
Translation: How do I look?

Chinese: 我能试穿一下吗？
