Chinese: 他坐在操场上,聆听远处的蛙鸣
Pinyin: ta1 zuo4 zai4 cao1 chang3 shang4 ling2 ting1 yuan3 chu4 de wa1 ming2
Translation: He sat on the playground listening to the distant croak.

Chinese: 那次行进速度很快, 到中午已抵达伦敦
Pinyin: na4 ci4 xing2 jin4 su4 du4 hen3 kuai4 dao4 zhong1 wu3 yi3 di3 da2 lun2 dun1!
Translation: It was good going to reach London by midday.

Chinese: 克里斯托弗·哥伦布是伟大的探险家
Pinyin: ke4 li3 si1 tuo1 fu·2 ge1 lun2 bu4 shi4 wei3 da4 de tan4 xian3 jia1
Translation: Christopher Columbus was one of the great explorers.

Chinese: 他们在外国保持多少个军事基地？
Pinyin: ta1 men zai4 wai4 guo2 bao3 chi2 duo1 shao ge4 jun1 shi4 ji1 di4?
Translation: How many military bases are they maintaining on foreign soil?

Chinese: 我想请你下星期日去参加舞会好吗？
Pinyin: wo3 xiang3 qing3 ni3 xia4 xing1 qi1 ri4 qu4 can1 jia1 wu3 hui4 hao4 ma?!
Translation: I would like to invite you to a ball next Sunday.

Chinese: 你去开会之前,咱们能私下说句话吗？
Pinyin: ni3 qu4 kai1 hui4 zhi1 qian2 zan2 men neng2 si1 xia4 shuo1 ju4 hua4 ma?!
Translation: Could we have a word before you go to the meeting?

Chinese: 我喜欢夏天吃莴苣,我的兔子也喜欢
Pinyin: wo3 xi3 huan xia4 tian1 ji2 wo1 ju4 wo3 de tu4 zi ye3 xi3 huan
Translation: I like to eat lettuce in summer, and so does my rabbit.

Chinese: 咒语将青蛙和老鼠又变回成了人
Pinyin: zhou4 yu3 jiang4 qing1 wa1 huo4 lao3 shu3 you4 bian4 hui2 cheng2 le ren2
Translation: The magic spell changed the frogs and rats back into men.

Chinese: 火蜥蜴曾被认为能生活于火中
Pinyin: huo3 xi1 yi4 zeng1 bei4 ren4 wei2 neng2 sheng1 huo2 yu2 huo3 zhong4
Translation: Salamanders once were thought to be capable of living in fire.

Chinese: 这个悬而未决的问题什么时候能解决呢？
Pinyin: zhe4 ge4 xuan2 er2 wei4 jue2 de wen4 ti2 shen2 me shi2 hou neng2 jie3 jue2 ne?!
Translation: When will the pendent problem be solved?

Chinese: 公爵命令仆人把一封信送给国王
Pinyin: gong1 jue2 ming4 ling4 pu2 ren2 ba3 yi1 feng1 xin4 song4 ji3 guo2 wang2
Translation: The duke ordered the servant to send a letter to the king.

Chinese: 你的意见是否代表其他学生的意见？
Pinyin: ni3 de yi4 jian4 shi4 fou3 dai4 biao3 qi2 ta1 xue2 sheng de yi4 jian4?
Translation: Are your opinions representative of the other students?

Chinese: "这是您的车吗,先生？” 警察问道
Pinyin: zhe4 shi4 ni2n de ju ma, xia1n sheng？”  ji3ng cha2 we4n da4o1
Translation: Is this your vehicle, sir? asked the policeman."

Chinese: 我建议刚开始爬山的人使用拐杖
Pinyin: wo3 jian4 yi4 gang1 kai1 shi3 pa2 shan1 de ren2 shi3 yong4 guai3 zhang4
Translation: When climbing a mountain I advise beginners to use a staff.

Chinese: 衣, 食, 住所是生活的基本必需品
Pinyin: yi4 si4 zhu4 suo3 shi4 sheng1 huo2 de ji1 ben3 bi4 xu1 pin3!
Translation: Food, clothing and shelter are all basic necessities of life.

Chinese: 空气中有熏衣草和迷迭香花的味道
Pinyin: kong1 qi4 zhong4 you3 xun1 yi4 cao3 huo4 mi2 die2 xiang1 hua1 de wei4 dao
Translation: There is a lavender scent and rosemary scent in the air.

Chinese: 父亲有时候带着手杖出去散步
Pinyin: fu4 qin1 you3 shi2 hou dai4 zhu1 shou3 zhang4 chu1 qu4 san4 bu4
Translation: My father sometimes goes out for a stroll with a stick in his hand.

Chinese: 你读了有关信息革命的那篇文章没有？
Pinyin: ni3 du2 le you3 guan1 xin4 xi1 ge2 ming4 de na4 pian1 wen2 zhang1 mei2 you3?
Translation: Have you read the article on information revolution?

Chinese: 五, 四, 三, 二, 一, 零!###我们升空了!
Pinyin: wu3 si4 san1 er4 yi1 ling2!
Translation: wo3 men she1ng ko1ng le! Five, four, three, two, one, zero!###We have lift-off!

Chinese: 你把玩具玩儿完了以後放进柜子里去
Pinyin: ni3 ba3 wan2 ju4 wanr2 wan2 le yi後3 fang4 jin4 gui4 zi li3 qu4!
Translation: Put your toys away in the cupboard, when you've finished playing.

Chinese: 她爱市场上的生趣,喧哗与多姿多彩
Pinyin: ta1 ai4 shi4 chang3 shang4 de sheng1 qu4 xuan1 hua2 yu4 duo1 zi1 duo1 cai3
Translation: She loved the life, noise, and color of the market.

Chinese: 他日夜祈求上帝赋予他虔敬的心
Pinyin: ta1 ri4 ye4 qi2 qiu2 shang4 di4 fu4 yu3 ta1 qian2 jing4 de xin1
Translation: He prayed to God night and day to endue him with the spirit of holiness.

Chinese: 最初她只是微笑,後来才放声大笑
Pinyin: zui4 chu1 ta1 zhi3 shi4 wei1 xiao4 後 lai2 cai2 fang4 sheng1 da4 xiao4
Translation: First of all she just smiled, then she started to laugh.

Chinese: 想到还需重新考试,我就感到沮丧
Pinyin: xiang3 dao4 huan2 xu1 chong2 xin1 kao3 shi4 wo3 jiu4 gan3 dao4 ju3 sang4
Translation: The thought of having to take the exam again depressed me.

Chinese: 她晚了一个钟头了吧? 她就是这样
Pinyin: ta1 wan3 le yi1 ge4 zhong1 tou2 le ba? ta1 jiu4 shi4 zhe4 yang4!
Translation: She was an hour late, was she? That's about par for the course for her.

Chinese: 公园对大城市的居民是大有裨益的设施
Pinyin: gong1 yuan2 dui4 da4 cheng2 shi4 de ju1 min2 shi4 da4 you3 bi4 yi4 de she4 shi1
Translation: Parks are a great boon to people in big cities.

Chinese: 我们刚才看见的那位同志是你的老师吗？
Pinyin: wo3 men gang1 cai2 kan4 jian4 de na4 wei4 tong2 zhi4 shi4 ni3 de lao3 shi1 ma?!
Translation: Be the comrade whom we see just now your teacher?

Chinese: 她与原来的丈夫离婚十年後又复婚了
Pinyin: ta1 yu4 yuan2 lai2 de zhang4 fu li2 hun1 shi2 nian後2 you4 fu4 hun1 le!
Translation: She remarried her former husband ten years after their divorce.

Chinese: 玛丽不但清扫房间而且也洗刷窗子
Pinyin: Ma3 li4 bu4 dan4 qing1 sao3 fang2 jian1 er2 qie3 ye3 xi3 shua1 chuang1 zi3
Translation: Mary not only cleaned the room but (also) washed the window.

Chinese: 你能相信我只花了25美元就买了一台电视吗?
Pinyin: ni3 neng2 xiang1 xin4 wo3 zhi3 hua1 le52 mei3 yuan2 jiu4 mai3 le yi1 tai2 dian4 shi4 ma?
Translation: Can you believe that I bought a TV for $25?

Chinese: 作者从每本卖出的书中可得10%的版税
Pinyin: zuo2 zhe3 zong4 mei3 ben3 mai4 chu1 de shu1 zhong4 ke3 de0%1 de ban3 shui4
Translation: The writer gets a 10% royalty on each copy sold of his book.

Chinese: 今天早晨报上有什么有趣的新闻吗？
Pinyin: jin1 tian1 zao3 chen2 bao4 shang4 you3 shen2 me you3 qu4 de xin1 wen2 ma?!
Translation: Are there any interesting news items in the paper this morning?

Chinese: 我们真的处于困境——没人照顾婴儿
Pinyin: wo3 men zhen1 de chu3 yu2 kun4 jing——4 mo4 ren2 zhao4 gu ying1 er2
Translation: We are in a real fix - there is nobody to look after the baby.

Chinese: 处理这种困难你有什么具体的想法？
Pinyin: chu3 li3 zhe4 zhong3 kun4 nan ni3 you3 shen2 me ju4 ti3 de xiang3 fa3?
Translation: Have you any concrete thoughts on how to deal with this difficulty?

Chinese: 新闻——当有人咬狗,或者打劫酒店之时
Pinyin: xin1 wen——2 dang4 you3 ren2 yao3 gou3 huo4 zhe3 da3 jie2 jiu3 dian4 zhi1 shi2
Translation: News- when a man bite a dog or rob a hotel.

Chinese: 德语中有三性: 阳性, 阴性和中性
Pinyin: de2 yu3 zhong4 you3 san1 xing:4 yang2 xing4 yin1 xing4 huo4 zhong1 xing4!
Translation: There are three genders in German: masculine, feminine and neuter.

Chinese: 公众的利益高於个人的利益
Pinyin: gong1 zhong4 de li4 yi4 gao1 yu1 ge4 ren2 de li4 yi4!
Translation: The needs of the community must take precedence over (i.e. must be met before) individual requirements.

Chinese: 我父亲总是对我做事的方式百般挑剔
Pinyin: wo3 fu4 qin1 zong3 shi4 dui4 wo3 zuo4 shi4 de fang1 shi4 bai3 ban1 tiao1 ti
Translation: My father is always finding fault with the way I do things.

Chinese: 古埃及的许多法老相信他们可以永生
Pinyin: gu3 Ai1 ji2 de xu3 duo1 fa3 lao3 xiang1 xin4 ta1 men ke3 yi3 yong3 sheng1
Translation: Many Pharaohs in ancient Egypt believe they can live forever.

Chinese: 她踩到一块松动的石头上,扭伤了脚踝
Pinyin: ta1 cai3 dao4 yi1 kuai4 song1 dong4 de shi2 tou shang4 niu3 shang1 le jiao3 huai2
Translation: She stepped on a loose stone and twisted her ankle.

Chinese: "如果你同意我的意见,就明白地回答""是”"
Pinyin: "ru2 guo3 ni3 tong2 yi4 wo3 de yi4 jian4 jiu4 ming2 bai de hui2 da""2 shi”4 "
Translation: Answer with a plain yes if you agree with me.

Chinese: 他买了一个鳕鱼罐头和一个三明治作晚饭
Pinyin: ta1 mai3 le yi1 ge4 xue3 yu2 guan4 tou huo4 yi1 ge4 san1 ming2 zhi4 zuo4 wan3 fan4
Translation: He bought a canned cod and a sandwich as supper.

Chinese: 听到煤气的嘶嘶声,他冲进来把它关掉
Pinyin: ting1 dao4 mei2 qi4 de si1 si1 sheng1 ta1 chong1 jin4 lai2 ba3 ta1 guan1 diao4
Translation: Hearing the hiss of gas, he rushed in and turned it off.

Chinese: 他在外面犹豫徘徊, 因过於胆怯而不敢进去
Pinyin: ta1 zai4 wai4 mian4 you2 yu4 pai2 huai2 yin1 guo4 yu1 dan3 qie4 er2 bu4 gan3 jin4 qu4!
Translation: He hovered about outside, too afraid to go in.

Chinese: 我们(各处)找了半天, 却找不到那本书
Pinyin: wo3 men (ge4 chu)4 zhao3 le ban4 tian1 que4 zhao3 bu4 dao4 na4 ben3 shu1!
Translation: We searched (around) for hours, but couldn't find the book.

Chinese: "她把新歌剧院叫作 ""那讨厌的庞然大物”"
Pinyin: ta1 ba3 xin1 ge1 ju4 yuan4 jiao4 zuo4  na4 ta3o ya4n de pang ra2n da4 wu4”2
Translation: She calls the new opera house that hideous erection.

Chinese: 此款项将用於建设新学校(的开销)
Pinyin: ci3 kuan3 xiang4 jiang4 yong4 yu1 jian4 she4 xin1 xue2 xiao4 (de kai1 xiao)1!
Translation: The money will go towards (the cost of) building a new school.

Chinese: 他是一个随和的人,但就是喜欢自吹自擂
Pinyin: ta1 shi4 yi1 ge4 sui2 he de ren2 dan4 jiu4 shi4 xi3 huan zi4 chui1 zi4 lei4
Translation: He is an agreeable fellow, but likes to blow his own horn.

Chinese: 天气多好哇,咱们何不开车到海边玩玩？
Pinyin: tian1 qi4 duo1 hao4 wa1 zan2 men he2 bu4 kai1 che1 dao4 hai3 bian1 wan4 wan4?
Translation: "It's a lovely sunny day; why don't we run down to the coast?"

Chinese: 这沙土地利於排水, 适於种植块根作物
Pinyin: zhe4 sha1 tu3 de li4 yu1 pai2 shui3 shi4 yu1 zhong4 zhi2 kuai4 gen1 zuo4 wu4!
Translation: This gravelly soil is well drained and good for growing root crops.

Chinese: 摩托车手必须戴头盔保护自己免受伤害
Pinyin: mo2 tuo1 che1 shou3 bi4 xu1 dai4 tou kui1 bao3 hu4 zi4 ji3 mian3 shou4 shang1 hai4
Translation: Motorcyclists must wear helmets to shield them from injury.

Chinese: 许多人到国外时,都感受到文化震撼
Pinyin: xu3 duo1 ren2 dao4 guo2 wai4 shi2 dou1 gan3 shou4 dao4 wen2 hua4 zhen4 han4
Translation: Many people suffered from cultural shock when they came abroad.

Chinese: (谚)今天能够做的事,切莫拖延到明天
Pinyin: (yan4) jin1 tian1 neng2 gou4 zuo4 de shi4 qie4 mo4 tuo1 yan2 dao4 ming2 tian1
Translation: Never put off till tomorrow what you can do today.

Chinese: 北极熊虽然会游泳,但也是陆栖动物
Pinyin: bei3 ji2 xiong2 sui1 ran2 kuai4 you2 yong3 dan4 ye3 shi4 lu4 xi1 dong4 wu4
Translation: Although they can swim, the polar bears are terrestrial animals.

Chinese: 我的铅笔钝了,你能借我把刀子削一削吗？
Pinyin: wo3 de qian1 bi3 dun4 le ni3 neng2 jie4 wo3 ba3 dao1 zi xue1 yi1 xue1 ma?!
Translation: My pencil is blunt, could you lend me a knife to sharpen it?

Chinese: 戴维觉得(与别的孩子)交朋友是很难的事
Pinyin: Dai4 wei2 jue2 de (yu4 bie2 de hai2 zi) jiao1 peng2 you shi4 hen3 nan4 de shi4!
Translation: David finds it hard to make friends (with other children).

Chinese: 那种新的发式的确使她好看一些[好看多了]
Pinyin: na4 zhong4 xin1 de fa4 shi4 di2 que4 shi3 ta1 hao3 kan4 yi1 xie[1 hao3 kan4 duo1 le]!
Translation: That new hairstyle really does something/a lot for her.

Chinese: 大火扑灭之後, 工厂只剩下个空架子了
Pinyin: da4 huo3 pu1 mie4 zhi後1 gong1 chang3 zhi3 sheng4 xia4 ge4 kong4 jia4 zi le!
Translation: Only the shell of the factory was left after the fire had been put out.

Chinese: 在凉爽的天气里轻松地散步令人心旷神怡
Pinyin: zai4 liang2 shuang3 de tian1 qi4 li3 qing1 song1 de san4 bu4 ling4 ren2 xin1 kuang4 shen2 yi2
Translation: A brisk walk in cool weather is invigorating.

Chinese: 我们需要具有真知灼见的人来领导这个党
Pinyin: wo3 men xu1 yao4 ju4 you3 zhen1 zhi1 zhuo2 jian4 de ren2 lai2 ling3 dao3 zhe4 ge4 dang3
Translation: We need someone with real vision to lead the party.

Chinese: 雪崩发生的时候我们的处境多么危险啊！
Pinyin: xue3 beng1 fa1 sheng1 de shi2 hou wo3 men de chu3 jing4 duo1 me wei1 xian3 a!
Translation: What a precarious situation we were in when the avalanche started!

Chinese: 我喜欢吃水果,比如苹果,梨子,香蕉等等
Pinyin: wo3 xi3 huan ji2 shui3 guo3 bi3 ru2 ping2 guo3 li2 zi3 xiang1 jiao1 deng3 deng3
Translation: I like fruits, such as apples, pears, bananas...

Chinese: 你撞到了我的手肘,弄坏了我正在画的图画
Pinyin: ni3 zhuang4 dao4 le wo3 de shou3 zhou3 nong4 huai4 le wo3 zheng4 zai4 hua4 de tu2 hua4
Translation: You jogged my elbow and spoiled what I was drawing.

Chinese: 我送给玛丽一个苹果换我最喜欢吃的香蕉
Pinyin: wo3 song4 ji3 Ma3 li4 yi1 ge4 ping2 guo3 huan4 wo3 zui4 xi3 huan ji2 de xiang1 jiao1
Translation: I gave Mary an apple in exchange for my favorite banana.

Chinese: 在大家到齐之後两小时,她终於姗姗来到
Pinyin: zai4 da4 jia1 dao4 qi2 zhi後1 liang3 xiao3 shi2 ta1 zhong1 yu1 shan1 shan1 lai2 dao4
Translation: She finally drifted in two hours after everyone else.

Chinese: 他思忖著要是没有这些孩子, 将来又如何
Pinyin: ta1 si1 cun著3 yao4 shi4 mei2 you3 zhe4 xie hai2 zi jiang1 lai2 you4 ru2 he2!
Translation: He contemplated what the future would be like without the children.

Chinese: 英国广播公司计画播放莎士比亚的全部戏剧
Pinyin: Ying1 guo2 guang3 bo1 gong1 si1 ji4 hua4 bo1 fang4 suo1 shi4 Bi3 ya4 de quan2 bu4 xi4 ju4
Translation: The BBC plans to televise all Shakespeare's plays.

Chinese: 这帮匪徒通过他们的 连锁饭店洗赃款
Pinyin: zhe4 bang1 fei3 tu2 tong1 guo4 ta1 men de lian2 suo3 fan4 dian4 xi3 zang1 kuan3!
Translation: The gang laundered the stolen money through their chain of restaurants.

Chinese: 她还没做出什麽成绩来。但她确实很努力
Pinyin: ta1 huan2 mo4 zuo4 chu1 shi2 mo2 cheng2 ji1 lai2. da4n ta1 que4 shi2 he3n nu3 li4
Translation: She hasn't had much success yet!###Mark you, she does try hard.

Chinese: 你认为总统会对恐怖分子的要求让步吗？
Pinyin: ni3 ren4 wei2 zong3 tong3 kuai4 dui4 kong3 bu4 fen4 zi3 de yao1 qiu2 rang4 bu4 ma?!
Translation: Do you think the President will give in to the terrorists' demand?

Chinese: 你在发动引擎时,一定要让汽车处于空档
Pinyin: ni3 zai4 fa1 dong4 yin3 qing2 shi2 yi1 ding4 yao4 rang4 qi4 che1 chu3 yu2 kong4 dang4
Translation: When you start the engine, be sure the car is in neutral.

Chinese: 这护士照顾这位病人彷佛在照顾她爸爸似的
Pinyin: zhe4 hu4 shi zhao4 gu zhe4 wei4 bing4 ren2 pang2 fu2 zai4 zhao4 gu ta1 ba4 ba si4 de
Translation: The nurse attends on the patient as if he were her father.

Chinese: 你并不认为我会相信那个可鄙的借口,是吧？
Pinyin: ni3 bing4 bu4 ren4 wei2 wo3 kuai4 xiang1 xin4 nei4 ge4 ke3 bi3 de jie4 kou3 shi4 ba?!
Translation: You don't expect me to believe that pitiful excuse, do you?

Chinese: 从三楼掉下而没有受伤,这怎么可能呢？
Pinyin: zong4 san1 lou2 diao4 xia4 er2 mei2 you3 shou4 shang1 zhe4 zen3 me ke3 neng2 ne?!
Translation: How was it possible to fall down from the third floor without being hurt?

Chinese: 他的脚稍有先天畸形,走起路来一瘸一拐
Pinyin: ta1 de jue2 shao1 you3 xian1 tian1 ji1 xing2 zou3 qi3 lu4 lai2 yi1 que2 yi1 guai3
Translation: He was born with a slight deformity of the feet which made him limp.

Chinese: 你需用泵著实抽吸几分钟, 才能把油箱灌满
Pinyin: ni3 xu1 yong4 beng著4 shi2 chou1 xi1 ji3 fen1 zhong1 cai2 neng2 ba3 you2 xiang1 guan4 man3!
Translation: You will need to pump hard for several minutes to fill the tank.

Chinese: 法律禁止向18岁以下的人出售含有酒精的饮料
Pinyin: fa3 lu:4 jin4 zhi3 xia4ng81 sui4 yi3 xia4 de ren2 chu1 shou4 han2 you3 jiu3 jing1 de yin3 liao4
Translation: The law forbids the sale of alcohol to people under 18.

Chinese: 这台泵通过这个阀门把(容器中的)空气抽出
Pinyin: zhe4 tai2 beng4 tong1 guo4 zhe4 ge4 fa2 men2 ba3 (rong2 qi4 zhong4 di)4 kong1 qi4 chou1 chu1!
Translation: The pump sucks air out (of the vessel) through this valve.

Chinese: 我们要是买不起汽车, 也就只好不用(汽车)了
Pinyin: wo3 men yao4 shi4 mai3 bu4 qi3 qi4 che1 ye3 jiu4 zhi3 hao3 bu4 yong4 (qi4 che)1 le!
Translation: If we can't afford a car, we'll just have to do without (one).

Chinese: 对于他们枪杀无辜平民,人们感到义愤填膺
Pinyin: dui4 yu2 ta1 men qiang1 sha1 wu2 gu1 ping2 min2 ren2 men gan3 dao4 yi4 fen4 tian2 ying1
Translation: People are indignant by their shooting of innocent civilians.

Chinese: 他由於一件表现出精湛技艺的作品而受到赞扬
Pinyin: ta1 you2 yu1 yi1 jian4 biao3 xian4 chu1 jing1 zhan4 ji4 yi4 de zuo4 pin3 er2 shou4 dao4 zan4 yang2!
Translation: He was complimented on a very professional piece of work.

Chinese: 我的女儿十八岁了,已经长成为美丽的淑女
Pinyin: wo3 de nu:3 er2 shi2 ba1 sui4 le yi3 jing1 zhang3 cheng2 wei2 mei3 li4 de淑 nu:3
Translation: My daughter is eighteen years old and has grown into a beautiful lady.

Chinese: 我们有不同的派,例如苹果,樱桃和草莓派
Pinyin: wo3 men you3 bu4 tong2 de pai4 li4 ru2 ping2 guo3 ying1 tao2 huo4 cao3 mei2 pai4
Translation: We have different pies, such as apple, cherry, and strawberry pies.

Chinese: 她的卧室是这座嘈杂房屋中一个难得的安静之处
Pinyin: ta1 de wo4 shi4 shi4 zhe4 zuo4 cao2 za2 fang2 wu1 zhong4 yi1 ge4 nan2 de2 de an1 jing4 zhi1 chu4
Translation: Her bedroom is an oasis of calm in the noisy house.

Chinese: 那两个女孩经常一起在那棵大山楂树下玩耍
Pinyin: na4 liang3 ge4 nu:3 hai2 jing1 chang2 yi1 qi3 zai4 na4 ke1 da4 shan1 zha1 shu4 xia4 wan4 shua3
Translation: The two girls always play together under the large hawthorn.

Chinese: 我以前从未听到过这个词语,是最近新造的吗？
Pinyin: wo3 yi3 qian2 zong4 wei4 ting1 dao4 guo4 zhe4 ge4 ci2 yu3 shi4 zui4 jin4 xin1 zao4 de ma?!
Translation: "I hadn't heard that expression before ; is it a recent coinage?"

Chinese: 天竺葵是种开红,粉红或白色花的花园植物
Pinyin: tian1 zhu2 kui2 shi4 zhong4 kai1 hong2 fen3 hong2 huo4 bai2 se4 hua1 de hua1 yuan2 zhi2 wu4
Translation: The geranium is a garden plant with red, pink or white flowers.

Chinese: 即使是最聪明的人也会陷入琐事与混乱之中
Pinyin: ji2 shi3 shi4 zui4 cong1 ming2 de ren2 ye3 kuai4 xian4 ru4 suo3 shi4 yu4 hun4 luan4 zhi1 zhong1
Translation: The most brilliant person may be mired in detail and confusion.

Chinese: 这位医生颇为炫耀地带着我们参观了他的医院
Pinyin: zhe4 wei4 yi1 sheng1 po1 wei4 xuan4 yao4 di4 dai4 zhuo2 wo3 men can1 guan1 le ta1 de yi1 yuan4
Translation: The doctor showed us about his hospital with much flourish.

Chinese: 那项要求很有意思,可是你有证件加以证明吗？
Pinyin: na4 xiang4 yao1 qiu2 hen3 you3 yi4 si ke3 shi4 ni3 you3 zheng4 jian4 jia1 yi3 zheng4 ming2 ma?!
Translation: That's a very interesting claim, but can you document it?

Chinese: 运动员们离开赛场时,被愤怒的人群推搡着
Pinyin: yun4 dong4 yuan2 men li2 kai1 sai4 chang3 shi2 bei4 fen4 nu4 de ren2 qun2 tui1 sang3 zhuo2
Translation: The players were jostled by an angry crowd as they left the field.

Chinese: 他像一只骄傲的孔雀一样在我前面趾高气扬地走着
Pinyin: ta1 xiang4 yi1 zhi3 jiao1 ao4 de kong3 que4 yi2 yang4 zai4 wo3 qian2 mian zhi3 gao1 qi4 yang2 de zou3 zhuo2
Translation: He strutted in front of me like a peacock.

Chinese: 我只是出于好奇,请问你买这辆车花了多少钱？
Pinyin: wo3 zhi3 shi4 chu1 yu2 hao4 qi2 qing3 wen4 ni3 mai3 zhe4 liang4 ju1 hua1 le duo1 shao qian2?
Translation: Just to satisfy my curiosity, how much did you pay for your car?

Chinese: 哥伦布按顺序仔细而详尽地记载了他的各次航程
Pinyin: ge1 lun2 bu4 an4 shun4 xu4 zi3 xi4 er2 xiang2 jin4 de ji4 zai3 le ta1 de ge4 ci4 hang2 cheng2
Translation: Columbus kept a careful and detailed chronicle of his voyages.

Chinese: 我们若决定购买这座别墅,就得重新进行装修
Pinyin: wo3 men ruo4 jue2 ding4 gou4 mai3 zhe4 zuo4 bie2 shu4 jiu4 de chong2 xin1 jin4 xing2 zhuang1 xiu1
Translation: If we decide to buy the cottage we'll have to do it up.

Chinese: 从我搬进城里以后,我有好几年没见过蚂蚱了
Pinyin: zong4 wo3 ban1 jin4 cheng2 li3 yi3 hou4 wo3 you3 hao3 ji3 nian2 mo4 xian4 guo4 ma4 zha4 le
Translation: I hadn't seen a grasshopper for years since I moved into the city.

Chinese: 储存的　物经常受损坏, 尤其是老鼠为患最甚
Pinyin: chu3 cun2 de　 wu4 jing1 chang2 shou4 sun3 huai4 you2 qi2 shi4 lao3 shu3 wei4 huan4 zui4 shen4!
Translation: Stores of grain are frequently attacked by pests, especially rats.

Chinese: 要参加体育活动--篮球, 冰球, 游泳之类的活动
Pinyin: yao4 can1 jia1 ti3 yu4 huo2 dong--4 lan2 qiu2 bing1 qiu2 you2 yong3 zhi1 lei4 de huo2 dong4!
Translation: Take any sport basketball, ice hockey, swimming or whatever.

Chinese: 这些儿童在早餐与午餐之间有牛奶与饼乾作点心
Pinyin: zhe4 xie er2 tong2 zai4 zao3 can1 yu4 wu3 can1 zhi1 jian1 you3 niu2 nai3 yu4 bing3 qian2 zuo4 dian3 xin1!
Translation: The children have a mid-morning snack of milk and biscuits.

Chinese: 我并不是自吹自擂,但所有的重要工作都是我干的
Pinyin: wo3 bing4 bu4 shi4 zi4 chui1 zi4 lei4 dan4 suo3 you3 de zhong4 yao4 gong1 zuo4 dou1 shi4 wo3 gan4 de
Translation: I'm not blowing my own trumpet, but I did all the top jobs.

Chinese: 他最初的反应是不同意。可是後来他改变了主意
Pinyin: ta1 zui4 chu1 de fan3 ying4 shi4 bu4 tong2 yi4. ke3 shi4 la2i ta1 ga3i bia4n le zhu3 yi
Translation: His first response was to say no!###Later, however, he changed his mind.

Chinese: 人们一提到维也纳就会联想到华尔兹圆舞曲和咖啡馆
Pinyin: ren2 men yi1 ti2 dao4 wei2 ye3 na4 jiu4 kuai4 lian2 xiang3 dao4 hua4 er3 zi1 yuan2 wu3 qu3 huo4 ka1 fei1 guan3!
Translation: People connect Vienna with waltzes and coffee-houses.

Chinese: 除了一本照相簿外, 我还给了他一支钢笔和一支铅笔
Pinyin: chu2 le yi1 ben3 zhao4 xiang4 bu4 wai4 wo3 huan2 ji3 le ta1 yi1 zhi1 gang1 bi3 huo4 yi1 zhi1 qian1 bi3
Translation: In addition to an album, I gave him a pen and a pencil.

Chinese: 往日激情将熄的余烬仍可从他的文章中看出来
Pinyin: wang3 ri4 ji1 qing2 jiang4 xi1 de yu2 jin4 reng2 ke3 zong4 ta1 de wen2 zhang1 zhong4 kan4 chu1 lai
Translation: The dying embers of a former passion can still be seen in his article.

Chinese: 这一段里面有很多名词,例如男孩,女孩和书本
Pinyin: zhe4 yi1 duan4 li3 mian4 you3 hen3 duo1 ming2 ci2 li4 ru2 nan2 hai2 nu:3 hai2 huo4 shu1 ben3
Translation: In this paragraph there are many nouns, such as boy, girl, and book.

Chinese: 你的书好像比我的有意思, 你愿意(和我)交换吗?
Pinyin: ni3 de shu1 hao3 xiang4 bi4 wo3 de you3 yi4 si ni3 yuan4 yi4 (huo4 wo)3 jiao1 huan4 ma?
Translation: Your book looks more interesting than mine: do you want to swap (with me)?

Chinese: 珍和玛丽是好朋友,前者是老师,后者是护士
Pinyin: zhen1 huo4 Ma3 li4 shi4 hao4 peng2 you qian2 zhe3 shi4 lao3 shi1 hou3 zhe3 shi4 hu4 shi
Translation: "Jane and Mary are good friends; the former is a teacher, the latter is a nurse."

Chinese: 刘师傅把每道工序做给我们看,然后让我们自己干
Pinyin: liu2 shi1 fu ba3 mei3 dao4 gong1 xu4 zuo4 ji3 wo3 men kan4 ran2 hou4 rang4 wo3 men zi4 ji3 gan4
Translation: Master Liu demonstrated to us each process, and let us do it ourselves.

Chinese: 利物浦队因对方一队员用手触球而得到一个罚球
Pinyin: li4 wu4 pu3 dui4 yin1 dui4 fang1 yi1 dui4 yuan2 yong4 shou3 chu4 qiu2 er2 de2 dao4 yi1 ge4 fa2 qiu2
Translation: Liverpool were given a penalty when one of their opponents handled the ball.

Chinese: 瞧,我这是怎么搞的！它本是辆新车。我怎么办好呢？
Pinyin: qiao2 wo3 zhe4 shi4 zen3 me gao3 de! ta1 be3n shi4 lia4ng xi1n ju1 wo3 ze3n me ba4n ha4o ne?!
Translation: Just look what I have done! It was a new car!###Whatever am I going to do?

Chinese: 你弟弟小小的年龄竟高出你一大截,真令人恼火！
Pinyin: ni3 di4 di xiao3 xiao3 de nian2 ling2 jing4 gao1 chu1 ni3 yi1 da4 jie2 zhen1 ling4 ren2 nao3 huo3!
Translation: How maddening to have your younger brother tower over you, at his age, too!

Chinese: 别老唠叨你的那些问题,还是做些实际工作解决它们吧！
Pinyin: bie4 lao3 lao2 tao1 ni3 de na4 xie1 wen4 ti2 hai2 shi4 zuo4 xie1 shi2 ji4 gong1 zuo4 jie3 jue2 ta1 men ba!
Translation: Stop dwelling on your problems and do something about them!

Chinese: 先把系帐篷的桩子打进地里,再把绳子系在桩子上
Pinyin: xian1 ba3 xi4 zhang4 peng de zhuang1 zi da3 jin4 de li3 zai4 ba3 sheng2 zi xi4 zai4 zhuang1 zi shang4
Translation: First hammer the tent pegs into the ground, then tie the ropes onto them.

Chinese: 店主给我们的分量不足: 应该10公斤我们只得到7.5公斤
Pinyin: dian4 zhu3 ji3 wo3 men de fen4 liang4 bu4 zu:2 ying1 gai101 gong1 jin1 wo3 men zhi3 de2 dao7.54 gong1 jin1!
Translation: The shopkeeper gave us short weight: we got 7.5 kilos instead of 10 kilos.

Chinese: 必须对那些专在足球比赛时打架的社会渣滓严加惩处！
Pinyin: bi4 xu1 dui4 na4 xie1 zhuan1 zai4 zu2 qiu2 bi3 sai4 shi2 da3 jia4 de she4 hui4 zha1 zi3 yan2 jia1 cheng2 chu4!
Translation: These scum who fight at the football matches must be severely dealt with!

Chinese: 他胜任新闻广播员的工作,在於他有当过记者的锻炼
Pinyin: ta1 sheng4 ren4 xin1 wen2 guang3 bo1 yuan2 de gong1 zuo4 zai4 yu1 ta1 you3 dang4 guo4 ji4 zhe3 de duan4 lian4
Translation: His strength as a news-reader lies in his training as a journalist.

Chinese: 真不幸,上午我的自行车丢了,下午钱包又被偷了！
Pinyin: zhen1 bu4 xing4 shang4 wu3 wo3 de zi4 xing2 che1 diu1 le xia4 wu3 qian2 bao1 you4 bei4 tou1 le!
Translation: It's luckless, I lost my bicycle in the morning and my wallet was stolen in the afternoon!

Chinese: 我那趟班机误点了, 我只好看书消磨时间[打发了两小时]
Pinyin: wo3 na4 tang4 ban1 ji1 wu4 dian3 le wo3 zhi3 hao3 kan4 shu1 xiao1 mo4 shi2 jian[1 da3 fa le liang3 xiao3 shi]2!
Translation: My flight was delayed, so I killed time/killed two hours reading a book.

Chinese: 史密斯小姐(去年访问了中国)打算嫁给爱尔伯特先生
Pinyin: shi3 mi4 si1 xiao3 jie (qu4 nian2 fang3 wen4 le Zhong1 guo)2 da3 suan4 jia4 ji3 ai4 er3 bo2 te4 xian1 sheng
Translation: Miss Smith( who visited china last year) is going to marry Mr!###Abbott.

Chinese: 我不知道地址,但地点是离SheratonHotel北边两条街的地方
Pinyin: wo3 bu4 zhi1 dao4 di4 zhi3 dan4 di4 dian3 shi4 li2 SheratonHotel bei3 bian1 liang3 tiao2 jie1 de di4 fang
Translation: I do not know the address, but it's two block north of the Sheraton hotel.

Chinese: 你从图书馆借的书上的戳记表明,这本书必须明天归还
Pinyin: ni3 zong4 tu2 shu1 guan3 jie4 de shu1 shang4 de chuo1 ji4 biao3 ming2 zhe4 ben3 shu1 bi4 xu1 ming2 tian1 gui1 huan2
Translation: The stamp in your library book shows it must be returned tomorrow.

Chinese: 我原以为自己画得不错, 可比起你的画儿来未免相形见绌
Pinyin: wo3 yuan2 yi3 wei2 zi4 ji3 hua4 de bu4 cuo4 ke3 bi3 qi3 ni3 de huar4 lai2 wei4 mian3 xiang4 xing2 xian4 chu4!
Translation: I thought I was quite a good artist, but your painting puts mine in the shade.

Chinese: 你看见语法书在哪儿呢吗? 词典都在正对著的书架上
Pinyin: ni3 kan4 jian4 yu3 fa3 shu1 zai4 na3 r ne ma?  ci2 dia3n do1u za4i zhe4ng dui4 de shu1 jia4 sha4ng!
Translation: Can you see where the grammar books are? The dictionaries are on the shelf directly opposite.

Chinese: 在日常会话中,你是请求别人做事,而不是命令他们
Pinyin: zai4 ri4 chang2 hui4 hua4 zhong4 ni3 shi4 qing3 qiu2 bie2 ren2 zuo4 shi4 er2 bu2 shi4 ming4 ling4 ta1 men
Translation: In everyday conversation, you request people to do things, not order them.

Chinese: 我基本上同意你的建议, 但是有几个小问题有待商榷
Pinyin: wo3 ji1 ben3 shang tong2 yi4 ni3 de jian4 yi4 dan4 shi4 you3 ji3 ge xiao3 wen4 ti2 you3 dai4 shang1 que4!
Translation: Basically I agree with your proposals, but there are a few small points I'd like to discuss.

Chinese: 当局答应给护士增加5%的工资, 但她们坚持要得到7%的增幅
Pinyin: dang1 ju2 da1 ying ji3 hu4 shi zeng1 jia5%1 de gong1 zi1 dan4 ta1 men jian1 chi2 yao4 de2 dao7%4 de zeng1 fu2!
Translation: The nurses have been offered an extra 5%, but they're standing out for a 7% pay rise.

Chinese: 要是太阳从西边出来,他就会通过考试－－他不可能通过考试
Pinyin: yao4 shi4 tai4 yang2 zong4 xi1 bian1 chu1 lai ta1 jiu4 kuai4 tong1 guo4 kao3 shi－－4 ta1 bu4 ke3 neng2 tong1 guo4 kao3 shi4
Translation: If the sun were to rise in the west, he would pass the exam.

Chinese: 中间休息时有些点心(如冰激凌, 炸土豆片, 巧克力)
Pinyin: zhong1 jian1 xiu1 xi shi2 you3 xie1 dian3 xin1 (ru2 bing1 ji1 ling2 zha4 tu3 dou4 pian4 qiao3 ke4 li)4!
Translation: Light refreshments (e.g. ice-cream, crisps, chocolate) are available during the interval.

Chinese: 她需要使请求语气柔婉,以便尽可能把它变成有礼貌与客气
Pinyin: ta1 xu1 yao4 shi3 qing3 qiu2 yu3 qi4 rou2 wan3 yi3 bian4 jin4 ke3 neng2 ba3 ta1 bian4 cheng2 you3 li3 mao4 yu4 ke4 qi4
Translation: She needed to soften her request to make it as polite and courteous as she could.

Chinese: 天文学家现在能看到的星星的数目,多得简直令人头晕目眩
Pinyin: tian1 wen2 xue2 jia1 xian4 zai4 neng2 kan4 dao4 de xing1 xing de shu4 mu4 duo1 de jian3 zhi2 ling4 ren2 tou2 yun1 mu4 xuan4
Translation: The number of stars now visible to the astronomers makes one's brain reel.

Chinese: 我们应该努力摆脱劳资关系中｀那群人和我们＇这种对立的态度
Pinyin: wo3 men ying1 gai1 nu3 li4 bai3 tuo1 lao2 zi1 guan1 xi zhong｀4 na4 qun2 ren2 huo4 wo3 men＇ zhe4 zhong3 dui4 li4 de tai4 du!
Translation: We should try to get away from a `them and us' attitude in industrial relations.

Chinese: 你飞回家度寒假的时刻不知不觉就会来到的,我都已经在盼望着啦！
Pinyin: ni3 fei1 hui2 jia1 du4 han2 jia4 de shi2 ke4 bu4 zhi1 bu4 jue2 jiu4 kuai4 lai2 dao4 de wo3 dou1 yi3 jing1 zai4 pan4 wang4 zhuo2 la!
Translation: Before you know it you'll be flying home for the winter holidays, I can hardly wait!

Chinese: 哲瑞米是初出茅庐,所以我们并不指望他在这次比赛中表现得很好
Pinyin: zhe2 rui4 mi3 shi4 chu1 chu1 mao2 lu2 suo3 yi3 wo3 men bing4 bu4 zhi3 wang4 ta1 zai4 zhe4 ci4 bi3 sai4 zhong4 biao3 xian4 de hen3 hao4
Translation: Jeremy's just being blooded, so we don't expect him to be very good at the game.

Chinese: 鸬鹚是一种长脖子黑颜色的大鸟,生活在海滨而且以吃鱼为生
Pinyin: lu鹚2 shi4 yi1 zhong4 zhang3 bo2 zi hei1 yan2 se4 de da4 niao3 sheng1 huo2 zai4 hai3 bin1 er2 qie3 yi3 ji2 yu2 wei2 sheng1
Translation: The cormorant is a large, long-necked, dark-colored bird which lives near sea coasts and eats fish.

Chinese: 一谈到别的事情时,他们的记性并不是很好,但他们却记得彗星
Pinyin: yi1 tan2 dao4 bie2 de shi4 qing shi2 ta1 men de ji4 xing4 bing4 bu4 shi4 hen3 hao3 dan4 ta1 men que4 ji4 de hui4 xing1
Translation: Their memory wasn't very good when it came to recalling other things, but they remembered the comet.

Chinese: 我们在晚会上要装扮得像电影中的角色,这是一个多么新奇的主意啊！
Pinyin: wo3 men zai4 wan3 hui4 shang4 yao4 zhuang1 ban4 de xiang4 dian4 ying3 zhong4 di4 jue2 se4 zhe4 shi4 yi1 ge4 duo1 me xin1 qi2 de zhu3 yi a!
Translation: We are supposed to dress up as movie characters for the party, what a novel idea!

Chinese: 把你们的学习室收拾一下,孩子们,妈妈说,你们把所有的书都弄得乱七八糟的了
Pinyin: ba3 ni3 men de xue2 xi2 shi4 shou1 shi yi1 xia4 hai2 zi men ma1 ma shuo1 ni3 men ba3 suo3 you3 de shu1 dou1 nong4 de luan4 qi1 ba1 zao1 de le
Translation: Tidy up your study, kids, Mother said, all your books are in a muddle.

Chinese: 尽管(她讲的)内容有些枯燥, 但由於她善於表达, 大家仍听得津津有味
Pinyin: jin3 guan3 (ta1 jiang3 de) nei4 rong2 you3 xie1 ku1 zao4 dan4 you2 yu1 ta1 shan4 yu1 biao3 da2 da4 jia1 reng2 ting4 de jin1 jin1 you3 wei4!
Translation: Although the subject-matter (of her talk) was rather dull her witty delivery kept the audience interested.

Chinese: 一道耀眼的闪光,把人们的眼睛都照花了……紧接着轰隆隆传来一声巨雷
Pinyin: yi1 dao4 yao4 yan3 de shan3 guang1 ba3 ren2 men de yan3 jing1 dou1 zhao4 hua1 le…… jin3 jie1 zhe hong1 long2 long2 zhuan4 lai2 yi1 sheng1 ju4 lei2
Translation: And then there came a blinding flash… and hard upon the heels of it, a great tow-row of thunder.

Chinese: 和大城市中的高楼大厦和喧嚣的街道相比,他更喜欢乡间的农庄和田野
Pinyin: huo4 da4 cheng2 shi4 zhong4 di4 gao1 lou2 da4 sha4 huo4 xuan1 xiao1 de jie1 dao4 xiang1 bi3 ta1 geng4 xi3 huan xiang1 jian4 de nong2 zhuang1 He2 tian2 ye3
Translation: He likes the farms and fields in the country better than the tall buildings and busy streets in the city.

Chinese: 我们太阳系的行星有水星,金星,地球,火星,木星,土星,天王星和海王星
Pinyin: wo3 men tai4 yang2 xi4 de xing2 xing1 you3 shui3 xing1 jin1 xing1 di4 qiu2 huo3 xing1 Mu4 xing1 tu3 xing1 tian1 wang2 xing1 huo4 hai3 wang2 xing1
Translation: The planets of our solar system are Mercury, Venus, Earth, Mars, Jupiter, Saturn, Uranus and Neptune.

Chinese: 告诉我:在任何一项工作中,是师傅说了算,还是助手说了算！那得看情况
Pinyin: gao4 su wo:3 zai4 ren4 he2 yi2 xiang4 gong1 zuo4 zhong4 shi4 shi1 fu shuo1 le suan4 hai2 shi4 zhu4 shou3 shuo1 le suan4! na4 de ka4n qi2ng kua4ng
Translation: Tell me this: In any job of work, should the master have the last word, or the assistant!  That depends.

Chinese: 他问道:你想日后到英国去住吗？我说:不会的,我已经断了这个念头了
Pinyin: ta1 wen4 dao:4 ni3 xiang3 ri4 hou4 dao4 Ying1 guo2 qu4 zhu4 ma?! wo3 shuo1: bu4 hui4 de, wo3 yi3 ji1ng dua4n le zhe4 ge4 nia4n tou le
Translation: Do you think you'll want to go back and live in England?  he asked!###I don't think so,  I said!###I think I've got that much out of my system.
